Master bathroom - place you can do hardcore thinking.
Loft - Full size Foosball table with 2 twin size sofa beds.
Wet bar with whiskey decanter and small fridge
Upstairs bedroom, king size bed - Adventure is waiting!
Upstairs bedroom, king size bed - free your dreams so they may become reality.
Upstairs bedroom, king size bed + closet- may the stars light your dream
Upstairs bathroom, all towels and lines are provided.
Second floor deck with mountain view - no matter how tall the mountain is, it cannot block the sun.
Second floor deck where you can enjoy morning coffee and greeting birds.
A private screened-in porch in first floor with hot tub.
Deck on first floor. Grill outdoors if you like!
This is the picture I took from the corner of our upstair deck.

hosts.about: We are a family of three, and we love to travel!

recent.comments: we had the best of both worlds with this place! it's super private and allowed for tranquil nights surrounded by nature, but was less than 30 minutes from downtown so we didn't feel isolated. Looks exactly like the pictures! Rain was super responsive and kind. Would definitely stay here again!

items.comments: we had the best of both worlds with this place! it's super private and allowed for tranquil nights surrounded by nature, but was less than 30 minutes from downtown so we didn't feel isolated. Looks exactly like the pictures! Rain was super responsive and kind. Would definitely stay here again!

The cabin was a great place to stay in! Although we had some bumps in the road it was a good trip! Andrew & Rain were helpful in getting any issues we had fixed! 

Overall it was a good vacation spot!!
We had a wonderful stay. Cabin was in a great secluded location but not too far from the main attractions. It had everything we needed for our stay.
Great place in the Smokey mountains.
It was exactly what we expected! Great host with prestige communication. I highly recommend booking!
Rain is very friendly, and her responds are very fast and helpful. A good experience.

Perfect location and beautiful area for us to visit with our daughter for a quick family vacation! The house was a perfect size, the kitchen was fully stocked with everything we could’ve needed, and we loved the foosball table on the top floor for a little family competition ◡̈ Andrew & Rain were absolutely incredible hosts - responded super quick to any questions we had, gave us heads up on bear activity (super appreciated - we even got to see one our last day!), and made coming and going flawless. We will definitely stay again if we return back to the area!! Highly recommend!

description.summary: Snuggle Up Cabn is a quintessential mountain log cabin; perfect for a romantic getaway or a relaxing family retreat!  Located between Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge (2 miles off the Parkway), it is within 10 miles of most of the natural beauty and entertainment that the Great Smoky Mountain area can offer. The cabin boasts two master suites, each with a Jacuzzi tub, and it offers very fast Wifi, free Netflix, Disney+, and Apple Arcade! Also a full size foosball table. All fun.
description.space:
Please read the entire listing before booking, let us know if you have any questions. Thank you for looking!

Snuggle Up is our family vacation cabin. We love both the cabin and the Great Smoky area so much, and can’t wait to share our experience with you! 

Kitchen:
- microwave
- stove
- toaster
- coffee maker
- coffee grinder
- blender
- fridge,
- and all the basics such as pots/pans/plates, etc to whip up that special meal.

Living area:
- Living room with propane fireplace   
- High Speed WiFi and Netflix, Disney+
- Free Apple Arcade (game controller provided)!
- Sound-bar
- Screen-in porch with Hot tub and rock chairs
- Large Wrap Around Porch w/Grill and 2 chairs to rock away your cares!
- Full size football table in loft area
- Wet bar with small fridge. 

Bedrooms:
- Two Bedrooms All with King Beds with en-suite bathrooms 
- Two Master Bathroom with Jacuzzi Tub
- Additional Two Twin-size Sleeper Sofa in loft area
- Perfect for 4 Adults and 2 Young Adults

Our cabin features dual Master Suites with King size beds. Both have en-suite bathrooms with large Jacuzzi tubs and stand alone showers. In addition to the flat-screen TVs in each room (with free access to Netflix, and Disney+ and Apple Arcade on the living room TV), the living room also has a BlueRay DVD player and a sound-bar, easy for you to play your favorite songs from your devices (via Bluetooth), we don't have traditional cable TV though. 

The gas fireplace has a timer, very easy to turn on/shut off (It is typical in the area for the propane valve to be shut off to the fireplace from April 1 through September 30).  The washer/dryer is in the living area, and the kitchen is fully stocked (including a blender). We just have new small appliances including a new Ninja coffee maker and a toaster. 

Upstairs is the loft area, complete with wet bar and under-counter refrigerator. There is a new full size football table also great view through the window.  The deck upstairs is a perfect place to enjoy morning coffee and the view, or relax on the porch chair and have some beer after a long day. 

The loft area has two twin-size sleeper sofas that are long enough to sleep adults (comforters, pillows and linen sheets are provided). 

(Note that the loft area has no window shades or curtains; Also provided is a portable crib.) 

The hot tub is off the living area in a screened porch, with partial mountain views and rockers for relaxing. The deck wraps onto the rear of the house with more seats and a charcoal grill for your time outside (the charcoals are not provided). 

All pictures on the listing were taken on site. We have some seasonal mountain view when the leaves are gone. We call tree people to cut trees but we really don't have control over how fast they grow back. 

As mentioned, this is our family vacation home, and we hope you love it as much as we do!
description.access: Guests enjoy the entire cabin except owner's closet. Each guest group is provided a secure electronic door access code, so no keys are necessary. Guests may arrive anytime after 4 pm for self check in.
description.notes:
Please read our house rules before booking:

No Illegal Activities.

No any kinds of animals (allergic concern).
We kindly ask please do NOT book with animals due to severe family allergies.  We stay at this vacation home during breaks. A fee of $250 per night, per unapproved pet, will be charged if our "no pet policy" is broken, since we need to do deep cleaning after. Please respect our situation. 

Max guests: 6 (including children older than 2 or visiting guests) 
No party or event

Please understand this is not a party house. Exceeding max number of occupants or bringing an animal(s) is a breach of contract and you will be asked to leave immediately without refund. 

Minimum age of primary renter: 23
Verified Government ID when booking (we will not see it)

No smoking, vaping, illicit drug use inside! Smoking only allowed on porch/deck
Security Deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $1000

Check-in: 4PM
Check-out: 11AM (late fee: $150)
Quiet hours after 10 PM

There is a security camera on the corner of the porch (above the Snuggle Up sign); it does not cover the area of hot tub/the screened porch or any interior spaces. It's just for security purpose. Damage or cover/disconnect the camera will be charged $150. 

Note that the square footage of the cabin is about 1,250. With the two large bathrooms taking up quite some space, the living room and kitchen area are on the small side. It is best for couples and small families (4 adults with 2 younger children). 

Also the area in general has very spotty cellular signals. It's recommended that you pre-download the area's map to your GPS/phone. 

Since the cabin is in a mountain area, once you get off the Parkway, the road becomes narrow and winding, but very typical in the region. We strongly recommend to drive 4x4 wheels during winter season. The last 300 yards or so has a steep uphill and two sharp turns. The first time driving up can be a bit unnerving, but once you get familiar with the road, it should be fine. Also driving down feels much easier.

No refund will be made due to power outages or malfunctions with TVs, internet service, hot tub, heater, water heater, or other equipment and appliances, or for carpet stains, or for the sighting of insects or other animals. We do not refund due to weather or road conditions or other acts of nature. We encourage guests to purchase a travel insurance to protect your trip and cover you when certain covered reasons prevent you from taking your trip.

iTunes Movies and TV Shows purchases are not included. (You can use the Apple TV to make the purchases, which will be billed to us, and we will need to ask for reimbursement.)

No fires inside or out. Unauthorized fires (including candles) will be charged $100 plus damages.

One more thing to mention, ladybugs are very common in this area especially during winter. It is against the law in Tennessee to kill ladybugs. We hire pest control to come over every month and spray the outside. Our cleaner always vacuums after each reservation but it's very difficult to keep 100% free of ladybugs as they are attracted to warmness and always find a way to get indoor. They are harmless though.

Guests are kindly requested to take full responsibility for any HOA fines that may accrue during their stay as a result of their actions.

By booking our cabin, you have agreed to our house rules stating, among other rules, that we do not allow pets, smoking, or parties in our home. We do have security cameras with both visual and audio features on the front of the cabin for the purpose of security. If this is an issue for you, please let us know as soon as possible.

We are so happy that you are considering staying in our cabin.  We do appreciate all feedback, and please privately let us know of any areas in which we can improve.
description.neighborhood:
The cabin is in the Sky Harbor subdivision of Pigeon Forge. It's really close to the Parkway (the main road connecting Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge); yet the area is very secluded. 

The broader Great Smoky area has so much to offer. The cabin is 8.5 miles to downtown Gatlinburg, and 11 miles to Sugarlands Visitor Center, the gateway to the GSMNP. Anakeesta Theme Park in Gatlinburg is our favorite, and so are the Village Shoppes. The new Gatlinburg Sky Bridge will lead you to breathtaking views! The area is absolutely outdoor lovers' paradise, with hiking, zipline, horse riding, kayaking, whitewater rafting, mountain biking, ATV,  and much more!

On the Pigeon Forge side, there are so many family fun activities! The cabin is 8.5 miles away from Dollywood and the water park, and 7 miles from The Island. Our favorite things to do include tubing, zorbing (yes, it's a thing!), go-kart, alpine coasters, Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Show & Adventure Park, and the list goes on!
description.transit: The area in general has very spotty cellular signals. It's recommended that you pre-download the area's map to your GPS/phone. Since the cabin is in a mountain area, once you get off the Parkway, the road becomes narrow and winding, but very typical in the region. The last 300 yards or so has a steep uphill and two sharp turns. The first time driving up can be a bit unnerving, but once you get familiar with the road, it should be fine. Also driving down feels much easier.
description.interaction:
For your convenience, we provide a complimentary “starter pack” to get you through the first day or two. 
   
It includes a few essentials like toilet paper, trash bags, Shampoo/soap, dish soap & dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, etc. Items are not replenished during your stay, if more are required there is a Publix close by.

All beds are made and fresh towels are provided in all of our rental homes.  The cabin is equipped with a washer and dryer too.

We provide dinnerware and flatware, a variety of utensils for cooking/baking/serving/etc. Also included are major and minor appliances including toaster, blender, coffee maker. Feel free to use the charcoal grill on the deck, you may need to bring your own supplies though. 

If this is the your first time being this area, feel free to checkout the guidebook we create for you. It may help to plan out a fun staying.

Please feel free to ask us any questions that will help you prepare.
description.house_rules:
By confirming your booking you agree to adhere to the Rental Rules set forth in this listing:

No Illegal Activities.
No Parties.

No any kinds of animals (allergic concern).
We kindly ask please do NOT book with animals due to severe family allergies. A fee of $250 per night, per unapproved pet, will be charged if our "no pet policy" is broken, since we need to do deep cleaning after. Please respect our situation. 

Max guests: 6 (including children older than 2 or visiting guests) 
Exceeding max number of occupants or bringing an animal(s) is a breach of contract and you will be asked to leave immediately without refund. 

Minimum age of primary renter: 23

No smoking, vaping, illicit drug use inside! Smoking only allowed on porch/deck.

No firework anytime

Please don't throw trash over the deck, it's our backyard and we want to keep it clean. 

Check-in: 4PM
Check-out: 11AM
Quiet hours after 10 PM

Housekeeping has a limited amount of time to get the cabin ready for the next guests, so please be on time. We would charge a fee of $100 with late check out before 12pm. After 12pm it will be charged for an additional night. 

Please don't turn on fireplace and AC at the same time, it will freeze the AC unit. Also please keep the doors/windows closed all the time. 

Security Deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $350

Hot Tub: 
Please read the instruction on the wall by the hot tub before entering. Children must be supervised by adults all the time. Please do not sit or stand on the cover, also remember to replace the cover after each use. Please understand you are using  the hot tub and jacuzzi at your own risk. 

Also, please take shower and remove make-up, sun-screen, insect repellent or any other oil-based products before entering. It will be extra $125 cleaning charge if the hot tub is left dirty or messy. 

Fireplace: 
The fireplace is a non-vented propane gas log fired firebox. Please do not throw any paper or other combustible materials in the fireplace. It is typical in the area for the propane valve to be shut off to the fireplace from April 1 through September 30.

Water and Septic: 
The cabin is on a well and septic systems. Please don't flush anything other than toilet paper. No feminine products or flushable wipes should be flushed at anytime. If it is found that feminine products or wipes have been flushed and clog the septic system, you could be charged damages of up to $1000. 

Storms and Weather: 
No refunds will be given for storms. Mountain roads can be curvy and steep. We highly recommend a four-wheel drive vehicle during the snow months. We do not refund due to road conditions.

REPAIRS & SERVICE CALLS: We take pride in maintaining our cabin & perform regular maintenance to keep everything in good working order. It is impossible, however, to guarantee that all appliances, hot tub, fireplaces, etc., will be in working order 100% of the time. We will, however, make every effort to correct any problem you encounter during your stay as soon as possible. Non-emergency maintenance issues will be handled during normal business hours. If you need emergency maintenance, please contact us through the platform. While we will attempt to correct all issues as quickly as possible, no refunds will be made for mechanical failures of hot tub, appliances/electronics, or interruption/loss of utilities, etc. Authorized repairmen have the right to enter the property to accomplish needed repairs even if the service call was made prior to your arrival. Thanks in advance for your understanding.

Before you leave, we ask that the items below be completed to help our housekeeper prepare for the next guest:

1. Please take your trash to the outside trash can. 
2. Please make sure to leave the game controller and all the remote in the tray on the coffee bench
3. Put all the dishes inside the dishwasher to start a wash cycle. 
4. No need to make beds. :-) It will be extremely helpful if you can start a load the towels (not the quilts).

Other than that, nothing to worry about. Just to enjoy your stay. :)

gallery.caption: Two bedroom off the main cave space
Stairs up to the modern bathroom
Enjoy the views on the private terrace
Rustic & comfortable caves with 2 bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen
A cosy kitchen with everything you need!

hosts.about: I am a London-based host who grew up on the island of Tenerife. I love creating 5* experiences for people and am passionate about hospitality & luxury travel.

recent.comments: Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder. Die Familie waren tolle Gastgeber.

items.comments: Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder. Die Familie waren tolle Gastgeber.

absolument superbe, cet endroit est magique !
la première montée est impressionnante, mais le lieu est loin de toutes perturbations sonores et visuelles. tout le confort nécessaire est présent, lit douillet, petit jardin et terrasse ensoleillé et surtout du frais à l'intérieur. 
accueil très sympa.
une vue magnifique pour regarder les étoiles !
allez y sans hésitation.

Sistemazione fuori dal normale in ogni senso, se volete qualcosa di diverso dal solito fa apposta per voi! Grotta in sasso splendida, alla mattina ci si sveglia con un paesaggio stupendo e i cavalli già svegli e alla sera un sacco di stelle cadenti! Unica pecca l’ultimo km di strada che porta alla casa, ma per il resto una settimana da Dio, pace e relax all’ordine del giorno! Consigliato!

Venez par la nuit. fatigués, le vent de face. Mettez les embûches de votre côté, la découverte et l'exploration du site seront parfaites. mieux : le lendemain vous découvrirez un autre endroit.
tout était parfait, le seul point négatif est peut être l'humidité contre le linge de lit malgré qu'il soit tres frais mais hé, si vous lisez ceci vous désirez dormir dans des grottes, donc. rien d'inattendu.
merci à nos hôtes, qu'on n'aura pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer mais qui ont été disponibles par message.

Wir haben für zwei Nächte bei Emma übernachtet und waren begeistert. Super charmantes Airbnb und absolut einzigartig. Das letzte Strassenstück ist holprig, aber gut machbar mit einem normalen Mietwagen. Ab und an hat der süsse Hund, Kira, vorbei geschaut.
We enjoyed our stay a lot. The place is cosy with amazing views!

Two wonderful days in the caves!
The place was really amazing with an impressive view. The caves were bigger that what we wondered and it was really a great experience.
All is done in the way that you immediately feel at home (games, staff for cooking etc..). Mark gave us all the indications to arrive at the good place (difficult to find without a precise localisation) and also good recommendations for restaurants in the area.
Kids loved the place!

description.summary: The caves are located 20 minutes from the nearest coast, inland at an altitude of 840m.  They are a series of four renovated caves, originally built nearly 100 years ago, with great views of the pine forest behind.  The property is ideally situated for hiking, climbing, and "get-away-from-it-all" and "back-basics" breaks.
description.transit: There is parking, and we do recommend having a car, as you will be pretty remote!  The nearest bus stop is a 40 minute walk uphill (and it's steep!).  Taxis can come up to the caves, but some are a bit reluctant.  And there is no Deliveroo here!  However, there are a number of great restaurants 15 minutes drive away.

name: Quiet Cave Room in luxurious nature of GranCanaria
title: Hoya Pineda, Spain

gallery.caption:
Entrada de la Cueva

Entrance from the Cave

Entrée de la grotte
corridor to the pond and more...
Idlis: Indian steam cooked rice cakes
Indian asian fusion: tomato chutney soup

hosts.about:
Hello!
My name is Baptiste, and I live at this wonderful place since beginning of 2019, trying to make it every day more confortable.
My passions are creating an eco-friendly environment, as well as healthy food and lifestyle.
I love cooking vegetarian food.
I'm looking forward to welcoming you at the "Finca de los Poetas".


¡Hola!
Me llamo Baptiste, y vivo en este maravilloso lugar desde principios del 2019, intentando convertirlo en un lugar más cómodo cada día.
Mis pasiones son crear un ambiente ecológico, y también un estilo de vida saludable.
Me encanta cocinar vegetariano.

Estaré encantado de recibirte pronto en la "Finca de los Poetas".

recent.comments: Excelente lugar para desconectar. El trabajo y el toque espectacular que le dieron los dueños a la cuevas es asombroso. Recomendado.

items.comments: Excelente lugar para desconectar. El trabajo y el toque espectacular que le dieron los dueños a la cuevas es asombroso. Recomendado.
ein unglaublich schöner ort mit viel liebe für nachhaltigkeit und ästhetik. ein besonderer ort!

Der Aufenthalt bei Baptiste und seiner Familie hat uns sehr gut gefallen! Er war ein sehr aufmerksamer, zuvorkommender und freundlicher Gastgeber! Besonders gut hat uns die ruhige, achtsame Atmosphäre auf dem Gelände gefallen. Schon beim Betreten der Finca wurde deutlich, wie viel Herz Baptiste in die Gestaltung gesteckt hat. Es gibt viele kleine versteckte Ecken die man erkunden kann und viele Möglichkeiten zur Ruhe zu kommen und die Natur zu genießen.  In der Höhle herrschte absolute Stille und die Temperatur war besonders angenehm (um die 21 Grad, bei um die 30 Grad Außentemperatur).  Wir haben buchstäblich wie ein Stein geschlafen. Die Tiere auf der Finca waren sehr lieb und wir haben uns sofort mit ihnen angefreundet. Wir würden auf jeden Fall noch mal wiederkommen!

I had a lovely stay here. The cave and space were great. It was really peaceful and Baptiste is a great host. You definitely want a car to stay here and the last bit of the drive is on a sloped gravel road so be prepared for that. The dog and cats were so friendly. Would definitely recommend staying here!

It was wonderful. Baptiste is definitely a superhost.  He takes care of the well-being of his guests. I have nothing to complain. The accommodations are very clean, modern, beautiful and handmade. The family lives very sustainably with two lovely cats and one super friendly dog. Our children had a lot of fun together. If you miss a pool, you can use several opportunities at the beach including natural pools.  I recommend this accommodation. Enjoy it :)

We think this is the perfect place when you really want to experience Gran Canaria. Every morning you wake up with the most amazing view from where you can enjoy your breakfast. 
Our stay was everything we could hope for. Baptiste is very friendly and helpful. He gave us some good recommendations and if we had any questions we could ask him easily as he was very responsive. 
During our stay the temperatures were high so the cool of the cave was very pleasant! The cave had everything we needed and the cats and dog were our happy friends during our stay :) . We always like to see new things when we travel but this place makes us want to come back. So thank you so much Baptiste for making our trip to Gran Canaria unforgettable! We’d definitely recommend it to anyone who loves nature, animals, good company and a little adventure.

Thank you Baptiste. Thank you for sharing with us such an experience. This is just somewhere and/or something you would not imagine to be able to do. Baptiste made it possible and created a delightful universe/environment. Finca de los Poetas has truely a genuine flair. Experiencing real nature in a space brilliantly arranged/furnished. The Cave was very comfortable. Thank you also for all these little touches and small attentions making you undoubtedly a great host. Antonia and I wish you best of luck in your upcoming projects/challenges to grow even more this place. We will miss Ayla & Marco.

description.summary:
A handcarved 22m2 room, digged in the mountain a hundred years ago. You will be dreaming in a comfortable double bed (160X200). 

You will find a bathroom for your individual use, with a shower and a ecofriendly compostable dry toilet.
Another conventional toilet is available in the shared Bathroom if you prefer.
description.space:
Spending a night in the cave room is like sleeping in the belly of the earth. 

Surrounded by luxurious nature, you will enjoy the peacefulness of the Canarian countryside.

Your room is part of a big property, on which I live with my family and children. There is lots os secret spots to discover and chill-out spaces in the gardens...We have a puppy dog, four cats and five chicken.

Common shared areas: kitchen, bathroom, terraces and outdoor areas.
description.access:
The main house and caves are surrounded by a big land and gardens. You can discover lots of little spots to chillout.

Common areas include: 

A shared kitchen between guests with everything necessary.
Big outdoor patio with dining area.
Common bathroom with a conventional toilet.
A terrace for taking sunbath or breakfast.
A pond with fishes and frogs.

...
description.notes:
I am a professional vegetarian chef with no secrets....
I'm more than happy to share my knowledge with you. You can see a little of my work on Fb or IG at Finca de los Poetas.
description.neighborhood: The Farm (Finca in Spanish) is situated on the territory of Santa Maria de Guía. It is in the northern part of Gran Canaria Island, surrounded by luxurious vegetation and very few but friendly and helpful neighbours.
description.transit:
My first advice to anyone coming to the Island is to rent a car ! I can help you finding the best option...

The Finca is located about 40 minutes away by car from the Capital Las Palmas de Gran Canaria ( It takes less than 1hour from the Airport).

By bus, from the central station at San Telmo Park, It will take you around 1h30 to reach my place ( bus n°105 to Gáldar and then n°106 to Hoya de Pineda).
description.interaction:
I am very passionate about sharing my Canarian experience and my favourite places ! 
Don't hesitate to ask anything you like.
description.house_rules: A short reminder of basic rules will be sent once you have booked...

name: casa cueva a orilla del mar " Brisas del Mar"
title: Chimaje, Spain

gallery.caption: Linda casa cueva muy cerca del mar..increíbles vista y mucha tranquilidad.

recent.comments: Natalia ha sido una gran casera: tiene una casa preciosa y consigue que las vacaciones sean muy agradables.

items.comments: Natalia ha sido una gran casera: tiene una casa preciosa y consigue que las vacaciones sean muy agradables.

Pour résumer Natalia réactive et sympathique.
Mais pas ventilateur ses dommage
Sous forte chaleur et vue que se n’est cas moitié un logement troglodyte pas totalement il aurait eu sont utilisé.
Bruits des vagues pour les personnes sensibles constant.
Mais on ne lui enlèvera pas sont charme
Mais il faut présider certain point que certaine personne serais surprise…

Wir waren sehr zufrieden in den 4 Tagen im Höhlenhaus. Die Gegend ist sehr ruhig, man hört größtenteils nur das Rauschen der Wellen. Der Naturpool der nur 10m entfernt ist, ist ein absolutes Highlight und von da aus kann man auch direkt ins Meer und die Wellen genießen und das superklare Wasser. Man ist allerdings unbedingt auf ein Mietauto angewiesen, da die ersten Geschäfte, sowie Restaurants ca. 6km und 10 Minuten Fahrt entfernt liegen. Auf jeden Fall war es die Erfahrung wert und Natalia hat immer sehr schnell reagiert und Fragen beantwortet sowie wünsche erfüllt. Vielen Dank!
Es war sehr schön und ruhig. Das Meer dort ist wunderschön!

11 unvergessliche Tage. Mit Mietauto sofort gefunden und oben geparkt. 62 Stufen runter/hoch sind auch mit schwerem Gepäck gut zu meistern, dafür bekommt man diesen überwältigenden Blick auf das Meer und bleibt erst mal stehen.
Die "Höhle" ist nur etwas im Felsen gebaut, die Stufen hoch zum Schlaf-/ Wohnbereich sicher, auch, wenn es nass ist, Fliesen können bei Wasser schon mal rutschig sein. 
Alles war blitzsauber, wir wussten nach 1 Woche Küstenwarnung, wieviel Mühe sich Natalia gegeben hat. Kleine Steinchen, Wasser + Salz werden immer wieder durch den Wind auf alle Flächen geweht.
Wir hatten uns Kaffee und Filtertüten mitgebracht, vermissten am 2. Tag doch eine Kaffeemaschine. Nach einer Anfrage bei Natalia hatten wir noch am Nachmittag eine.
Der alte Boiler hatte Kabelbrand Samstagnacht. Nur 3 Stunden nach Anruf kam der Techniker, baute den neuen am gleichen Tag ein. PERFEKT !
Wir haben jetzt schon Sehnsucht nach der Ruhe, dem Pool + Atlantikausblick. DANKE Natalia - Steffi & Gudy

Really a memorable stay. This is a unique place and there are some quirks: waves can be loud making sleep hard, debris/grit falls from the ceiling (it's a cave!), low ceilings- esp. if you are tall, doors on each floor only air except small window in bedroom making it a bit stuffy and damp.  All that said, we would stay there again.  It is really unusual and interesting - so close to rocks and waves; there is even a blow/thunder hole right off patio that thumps and shoots spray high in the air.  Kitchen adequate for simple meals, 2-burner stove, 2 pots and a frypan. Lots of dishes, flatware, glassware.  Only coffeemaker a mini stove top espresso. Downstairs shower in room with toilet and sink. Washer (didn't use) and small dry rack on upper patio. Upstairs toilet and sink next to bedroom. Bed: plastic over mattress, large and comfortable, good reading lights .  Parking easy on road above then 60 stairs down to apartment.  Dark at night. Well worth staying here-we won't soon forget it!

È stata un'esperienza incredibilmente rilassante e piacevole, raggiungere la casa è stato semplicissimo. Natalia è stata disponibile e gentile. Il posto è meraviglioso, intimo e perfetto per riposare al termine di una giornata di esplorazione. La casa ha tutto quello di cui si può avere bisogno (frigo, lavatrice, microonde, tostiera, fon, due bagni). La zona è servita dall'autobus, ma avere un'automobile a disposizione rende tutto più agevole, anche perché è necessario spostarsi per fare la spesa. 
È bellissimo dormire accompagnati dal rumore delle onde. Mi sono sentita nel posto giusto.

description.summary:
Ésta pequeña casa cueva en primera línea de mar está en  un lugar privilegiado para contemplar los  espectaculares amaneceres  y  atardeceres de esta encantadora isla. Es un  ambiente ideal para parejas muy romántico,  donde descansar, disfrutar de privacidad  y relajarte escuchando  del sonido constante del mar.
A muy pocos pasos a la derecha hay una pequeña piscina natural muy bonita.
description.space:
Al llegar a la estancia se encuentra un patio justo frente al mar, allí mismo en la planta baja se encuentra la cocina-comedor totalmente equipada , al fondo de este espacio  hay  una lavadora y un pequeño sofá .En ésta misma planta está un baño.
En la planta alta hay una terraza exterior, un dormitorio con una cama para dos personas, espacio de almacenamiento, un pequeño aseo y por último una acogedora sala de descanso.

recent.comments: Je vous conseille ce logement ! Une vue incroyable, un calme. Tout correspond à la description.

items.comments: Je vous conseille ce logement ! Une vue incroyable, un calme. Tout correspond à la description.

Excellent séjour, un environnement très reposant, tout est très bien pensé. Un coup de coeur car c'est bien maison atypique dans les gorges. (Barranco de Guayadeque). On peut rester dans cet endroit à rêver... ou bien randonner. De plus Juana a été très attentionnée et communicative. (Petits chocolats de bienvenue) l'intérieur est très joliment décoré. Personnellement, j'y retournerai volontiers.

Die Unterkunft ist wunderschön ruhig gelegen. Sie entspricht der Beschreibung und ist sehr schön kühl, auch wenn es draußen heiß ist. Abseits von normalen Mobilfunk – oder Internet Verbindungen ist man sehr schön mit entschleunigen beschäftigt und wenn es sein muss, gibt es sogar im Haus eine Internetverbindung über Satellit. Wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen und können diese Unterkunft einfach nur wärmstens empfehlen!

la cueva "el origen" de Juana es de verdad un alojamiento único! me he sentido privilegiada en poder quedarme, tiene mucha historia! me encantó! además nos salvó del gran calor que encontramos en la isla, justo hubo una ola de calor, ya que en la cueva siempre se mantiene una agradable temperatura. Juana una impecable anfitriona, siempre contestando rápido y amable! la zona es preciosa por la naturaleza, el silencio y la paz y unos cuantos agradable y ricos restaurantes también en cuevas. espero poder volver en primavera! gracias por todo Juana!
It’s such a beautiful place never got boring waking up to the beautiful scenery will really miss it

Nuestra experiencia en la casa cueva "El Origen" ha sido entrañable y de desconexión.
El hecho de estar en lo alto de la montaña nos permitió disfrutar del silencio, de unas vistas maravillosas hacia las paredes del barranco de Guayadeque e, incluso, del avistamiento de algunas aves de la zona.

La casa cueva está muy bien acondicionada y cuenta con todos los servicios que se anunciaban en la descripción. Al ser un espacio pequeño, resulta una casa muy acogedora: como si estuvieras en tu propio hogar.

Es cierto que, para acceder hay que subir unos cuantos escalones con el equipaje y dentro se nota la humedad; pero es algo normal y realista, puesto que accedemos a hospedarnos en una casita que está dentro de una cueva.

Juani ha sido una gran anfitriona desde el primer momento: ha sido amable, nos ha dado indicaciones precisas para el acceso y la estancia en la casa cueva, y ha cuidado al detalle nuestra llegada.

¡Muchas gracias por todo, Juani!
¡Volveremos pronto!
Laura y Davinia.

Nous avons passé un beau moment tranquille dans la maison troglodyte de Juana. Nous avons entre autre bien profité de l’espace extérieur intime avec une belle vue sur les montagnes et le champ des oiseaux.

description.summary: Bonita y auténtica casa-cueva  en el barranco de Guayadeque.  Compuesta de dos dormitorios, cocina independiente y terraza que permite disfrutar de las vistas a la montaña. Lugar perfecto para los que buscan tranquilidad, disfrutar de la naturaleza y realizar varias rutas de senderismo. Próxima a dos restaurantes-cueva. Las poblaciones más cercanas, Ingenio y Agüimes, están a 10 min. en coche, donde podrán encontrar todo lo necesario (tiendas y supermercados). Cercanía a varias playas.
description.space: Es una cueva auténtica, tranquila y con total privacidad.
description.neighborhood: El entorno natural es un espacio protegido de belleza espectacular, destacando la gran cantidad de casas cueva, dos bares/restaurantes que merece la pena visitar por estar cavados en la roca.
description.transit: No hay transporte público, indispensable coche de alquiler (muchas facilidades en el aeropuerto). No hay problema de aparcamiento (pasando la cueva a la izquierda).
description.interaction: Tf. de contacto: 620776719 Juana

name: Cedar Bluff Hobbit House-Lake View on 3 acres
title: Fayetteville, Arkansas

gallery.caption: Spring blooms on the Hobbit Roof
TV, firestick, high speed internet, ambiance fireplace with heat option, board games and hand carved chair
Plenty of open space to gather
Upstairs loft bedroom with king size bed and luxury linens
Downstairs custom hand crafted iron queen sized bed
Kids bedroom with two twin beds. Also have two pack and plays - one with a crib mattress and also a high chair
Beautiful custom Hand scraped cedar stair bannisters and balusters
Upstairs bath with unique special touches including a teak mushroom stool and a hidden tiny hobbit door.

recent.comments: Cedar Bluff Hobbit House was a wonderful vacation spot! The theme was unique and fun! The location was serene and away from the busyness of town, with a spectacular view! There was so much attention to detail in every room! We could tell the hosts put a lot of thought and care into this house.  Our 3 generations of family members who came to the house all really enjoyed it.  We hope to return one day!  We'd recommend it!!!

items.comments: Cedar Bluff Hobbit House was a wonderful vacation spot! The theme was unique and fun! The location was serene and away from the busyness of town, with a spectacular view! There was so much attention to detail in every room! We could tell the hosts put a lot of thought and care into this house.  Our 3 generations of family members who came to the house all really enjoyed it.  We hope to return one day!  We'd recommend it!!!
We all loved the place it was great!!

I especially liked the one of a kind house Tom and Cheryl have created. The kids loved the star projector that projects stars and northern lights onto the ceiling for a planetary-like feel. The day of arrival was my grandsons birthday, Cheryl provided a large birthday cookie for the celebration. These are the added touches that Tom and Cheryl provide to make their guest feel like family. Thank you

I can't say enough about how amazing this place is. The detail to the theme is absolutely incredible. It was spotless clean and smelled so clean as well. Gorgeous views and so peaceful and relaxing. There was so much to do at the home that you would never have to leave but it is also so close to so many local towns that are also amazing and beautiful to see.  The host were wonderful and beyond helpful with any questions you have and were great about recommendations from where to eat, shop, hiking trails, etc. This will be a yearly getaway for my family, I just can't say enough about it.
This was our third year returning to the Hobbit House, it's such a unique experience with the kindest hosts. Thanks so much y'all!
Absolutely delightful slice of the Shire, great for relaxing and enjoying both the indoor decor and scenery outside. Spotlessly clean and comfortable!

We have stayed at many Airbnb's over the years because it fits our family's needs best. However, the Hobbit House surpasses ALL the rest!! I would describe it as magical, enchanted, and memorable. The interior design from room to room in the house is genius and detailed. It is a better experience if you know the storyline of The Hobbit. But, if you were born in a barn in the last century you would still fall head over heels at the architectural details of this place. The care, thoughtfulness, and hard work stand out on this site. Don't forget about the wildlife. That's part of what makes The Shire so  charming. Our stay at the Hobbit House is etched in our family's memory forever and we would love to be back in The Shire in the future.

description.summary:
This property boasts 4 bedrooms 2 baths, fully equipped kitchen with copper sink, a unique large open living room - all within an underground geodesic dome w/4 foot tall tower with a clear dome at the top for natural sunlight. 

This unique vacation rental is geared for a fun home base for families & friends looking to explore the Fayetteville area. When not lounging at the shire watching birds, Eagles, deer & other wildlife head out to explore many special local attractions!
description.space:
Whether you want to make a visit to the University of Arkansas‘s campus or have a unique get away at this one of a kind property,  this unique Hobbit themed Fayetteville home set on 3 private acres on top of Cedar Bluff is set up to help you create a forever memory for you and your family and friends. 

There is one king bedroom upstairs and one king bedroom downstairs as well as a queen bedroom and a kids bunk room with two twin beds the living room has a twin daybed with a twin trundle bed. 

There is fire pit and outdoor seating with river views and propane barbecue grill. Facing the west you will experience beautiful sunsets. There is a smart TV, 2 dining tables and electronic fireplace for ambience warmth, central heat and a whole house dehumidifier there is air conditioning but it’s not really needed - the natural year-round temperature inside the underground geodesic dome averages 65°

The kitchen is fully equipped and has a dishwasher,  drip and Keurig coffee makers, stove, oven & microwave refrigerator & icemaker. High-speed Wi-Fi is included as well as Amazon Firestick.  We have plenty of linens and thick towels as well as a washer and dryer and a pack and play if needed. 

The private parking lot accommodates six vehicles * this is a family atmosphere specifically NOT geared or excepting for events or parties like bachelor or bachelorette parties.
description.access: Guest access includes the entire property
description.neighborhood: Set on 3 private gated acres with gated entry, lake view
description.interaction: We live at the property next-door and are available if needed. We will stay away and give you your privacy unless you need help

hosts.about: Casa Lola está gestionada por una familia que estará encantada de resolver sus dudas. Deseamos que disfruten de un espacio único, creado con cariño.

recent.comments: Ubicación fantástica, amplitud y comodidades inmejorables, habitaciones fresquitas en verano y una piscina con vistas increíbles. Durante el día intentamos no utilizar la piscina porque había muchas avispas, pero se iban en cuanto empezaba a caer el sol.

items.comments: Ubicación fantástica, amplitud y comodidades inmejorables, habitaciones fresquitas en verano y una piscina con vistas increíbles. Durante el día intentamos no utilizar la piscina porque había muchas avispas, pero se iban en cuanto empezaba a caer el sol.

This villa is idialic, set high in the mountains with breathtaking views. 
The hosts could not have done more for us. They met us when we arrived at 10pm and carried the cases to the villa for us. Nothing was too much trouble. 
We had a brilliant holiday. The Villa is a good 25 minute drive to Galdar, but once you get there the peace, tranquility and views are amazing. Thank you.

La verdad que desde que llegamos se respiraba tranquilidad. 
Me recordó a la casa de mis abuelos, de campo, con su talla, hacía tiempo que no veía una y lo primero que hice fue coger un vasito para beber de ella. El anfitrión súper amable. Cuidamos de la casa como si fuera nuestra, porque así se siente, como si fuera de uno. Seguramente repetiremos porque nos encantó

Salimos encantados tras pasar el fin de semana en casa Lola...un lugar donde nada más llegar te trae recuerdos de familia, en nuestro caso los abuelos porque mantenían la esencia en todo de lo que en su día sería la familia. Tranquilidad total,buen clima, la piscina,la limpieza y destacar la atención y buena comunicación del anfitrión, hizo todo mejor aún. Repetiremos seguro.
Gogle maps indicaba una entrada que tenía mucha pendiente y muy estrecha sin poder dar vuelta al coche...

what a location! absolutely stunning. very high in the mountains but with the instructions easy to find and sign posted while you are there. the poolside was incredible and we had a lovely day in the sun there. gets a bit colder in the evening than the coast but extra blankets and heater provided if required. if you are looking for a rural escape this is it.

Un lugar espectacular para una escapada a la naturaleza!! Unas vistas maravillosas y que permiten evadirte del ajetreo en el que vivimos!! 
El anfitrión, Aythami y su familia siempre estuvieron pendientes e hicieron de nuestra estancia en Casa Lola una experiencia que sin duda repetiremos!!!

description.summary: Casa Lola es una casa cueva ideal para familias y parejas. En ella encontraras todo lo que necesitas para desconectar del ritmo de la ciudad, sus instalciones te permiten disfrutar de vistas espectaculares hacia un valle encantador con el pinar de Tamadaba de fondo. Cada rincón se ha creado con cariño para el disfrute de nuestros huéspedes. Esperamos que disfruten y pasen una estancia como se merecen.
description.space: Fagajesto es un pueblo que da infinidad de posibilidades. En él puedes relajarte y disfrutar de la naturaleza. Tanto si quieres descansar como si quieres hacer deporte, Casa Lola es un lugar ideal para tus escapadas.
description.access: La casa está a entera disposición de los huéspedes.
description.notes: Casa Lola es una casa cueva situada en el valle de Fagajesto al norte de la isla y en épocas de invierno las temperaturas bajan considerablemente. Esto hace que puedas apreciar la diversidad que tiene la isla de Gran Canaria desde un espacio único y especial, por ello aconsejamos que traigan ropa de abrigo si quisieran hospedarse durante el invierno.
description.neighborhood: La casa se encuentra en Fagajesto, considerado uno de los pueblos más bonitos de la isla y muy conocido por los senderitas y motoristas que a menudo lo tienen como parada obligatoria en su ruta. Es muy tranquilo y familiar, por lo que es perfecto para descansar o si por otro lado lo deseas, poder hacer ciclismo, senderismo, trail runner... Es un pueblo con un único bar situado a 1 minuto de Casa Lola llamado Antonio Pinocha. Allí podrás encontrar comida típica Canaria como también algunos indispensables (carbón, pan, embutidos, agua...)
description.transit: Por la localización privilegiada de Casa Lola, el transporte público es muy escaso y no aconsejamos su uso. A dos minutos de la casa hay aparcamiento exterior gratuito.
description.interaction: En todo momento podrán contactar con nosotros si lo necesitaran y responderemos en la menor brevedad posible.

location.address: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canarias, Spain

Enjoy the comfort of a fully modernised cavehouse with home cinema, chimney, the biggest couch you've ever had, a rooftop deck for you to enjoy breathtaking sunrises, stargazing, a barbecue,a night by the fire, a cold beer after the beach or morning yoga facing the rising sun. The garden joining into the barranco is 2 hectares with a pool and playground ; around is only nature paradise with wild hiking trails.

hosts.about: Emocionada por descubrir lugares encantadores.

Soy psicoanalista, docente de la universidad, pintora, y todo esto me apasiona y me hace feliz, disfruto mucho la conversación, la arquitectura, la literatura. Mi esposo Ricardo y nuestra perrita Piaff y yo, estamos muy contentos de ser anfitriones de airbnb ha sido una experiencia preciosa, hemos conocido muchas personas encantadoras, todos interesados en disfrutar y conocer la cultura de México. Trato de que la estancia de mis huéspedes, sea parte del los mejores recuerdos de sus viajes.

recent.comments: Un sitio muy acogedor en la hermosa Coyoacán, muy accesible para traslados. un ambiente muy acogedor y especial, ideal para una estancia en la ciudad

todo estuvo bien
Magical place and amazing host! One of the highlights of our visits! Met amazing people and enjoyed the tranquility
luz’s place is peaceful and beautiful. it is a little far from “trendy” neighborhoods but coyoacan is a way more beautiful and authentic place to stay. beautiful place.
thank you so much for your hospitality, luz!! a wonderful stay, definitely worth it :) see you next time!
Pasamos un momento muy agradable en el lugar. Muy bonito y parece que duermes dentro de un museo. Volveremos a ir próximamente.
Desde que te pones en contacto con Luz hasta tu partida todo es perfecto, el lugar es precioso, todo lo que describen es lo que hay y las fotos no le hacen justicia a tan magnífico lugar.

description.summary:
Departamentito completo, casa cueva, cama matrimonial, cocina y baño privados, sala, mesa de trabajo, tv, wifi. Esculturas, oleos y tintas. Bien ubicado, a minutos caminando la Casa de Frida, y la de Trotsky, y el Ex Convento de Churubusco recinto del Siglo XVI.
Full apartment, double bed, kitchen and bathroom, living room, and desk. Sculptures, oil and ink. Well located, a few minutes walk from Casa de Frida, and Trotsky´s house, and the Ex Convento de Churubusco in a XVI century building.
description.space:
The Sculptor's Workshop is a cozy, beautiful and intimate space, cave house, It has all the amenities, and the location is excellent, you can visit in just a few minutes the House of Frida Kahlo, The House of Leon Trotsky, the Museum of Popular Cultures, and the Ex-convent of Churubusco building of the SXVI with a museography of the SXXI, as well as many attractions of Coyoacán. From here it is easy to visit the city center, taking the metro which is only 3 blocks  away. The Sculptor's Workshop itself is an unparalleled experience, it has surprises in every detail and the    with which it has been designed.
The decoration is unique which compensates its small size through its artisanal care, including the small window through which a fountain is beheld.
The sculptures are made in wood, likewise all the furniture in the kitchen and the headboard make an exceptionally cozy, harmonic combination. The sensation that this space produces is that of a trip to the past. The experience is like entering a monastic environment, in spite of not having windows, and its arches, sculptures, art and the luminosity organize a visual experiences that are a permanent delight.
Its access to the garden, where El Taller del Escultor has a table with benches is essential, to enjoy the sky, the fountain and the permanent bathing of droves of birds, the exceptional climate of Mexico City and the generous vegetation .


El Taller del Escultor, es un espacio acogedor, es una encantadora casa cueva bella, e íntima. Cuenta con todas las comodidades, y la ubicación es excelente, podrás visitar en sólo unos minutos la Casa de Frida Kahlo, La Casa de León Trotsky, el Museo de Culturas Populares, y el Ex convento de Churubusco edificio del SXVI con una museografía del SXXI, así como muchos atractivos de Coyoacán, desde aquí es fácil visitar el centro de la ciudad, a través del metro esta a solo a tres cuadras. El taller del Escultor en si mismo es una experiencia inigualable, es una sorpresa cada detalle y la dedicación con que ha sido ambientado.
La decoración es única compensa con su cuidado artesanal el tamaño, y la pequeña ventana por la que se al fondo una fuente. 
Las esculturas fueron realizadas en madera, así mismo todos los muebles de la cocina y la cabecera que hacen una liga armónica excepcionalmente acogedora. La sensación que produce  este espacio es un viaje al pasado. La experiencia es entrar a un ambiente monástico, a pesar de no contar con ventanas, los arcos, las esculturas, el arte que lo decora y la luminosidad organizan experiencias visuales que son un deleite permanente. 
Además el acceso al jardín donde El Taller del Escultor tiene asignada una mesa con sus bancos, es fundamental, para disfrutar: del cielo, la fuente y el baño permanente multiples aves, del excepcional clima de la Ciudad de México y de la generosa vegetación.
description.access:
The common areas are: the Patio de la Fuente de los Niños, the entrance hall, and the Garden with its fountain tables and chairs, where The Sculptor Workshop has precisely one assigned table. 

Las zonas comunes son: el Patio de la Fuente de los Niños, el hall de entrada, y el Jardín con su fuente mesas y sillas, donde El Taller del Escultor tiene precisamente una mesa asignada.
description.notes:
Recycled materials are the aesthetic axis of space, and are combined with art and comfort. They are a beautiful surprise, the sculptures and the textures. In a small space you can be very happy. And the equipment is so beautiful and complete that just entering will offer you the most endearing home experience. It is important to remember that it is a space without windows and the feeling of spaciousness and luminosity, has been achieved by the distribution of mobility and mirrors placed strategically producing an experience of spaciousness and intimacy. In addition the guests of the sculptor's workshop have access to the garden where they have a table and benches assigned to them


Los materiales reciclados son el eje estético del espacio, y se combinan con arte y comodidad. Son una bella sorpresa, las esculturas y las texturas . En un espacio pequeño se puede ser muy feliz. Y el equipamiento es tan bello y completo que solo entrar te ofrecerá la experiencia del hogar mas entrañable. Es importante recordar que es un espacio sin ventanas y las sensación de amplitud y luminosidad, se ha logrado por la distribución del moviliario y espejos colocados estrategicamente produciendo una experiencia de amplitud e intimidad. Además los huespedes del taller del escultor tienen acceso al jardín donde cuentan con una mesa y bancos asignados para ellos.
description.neighborhood:
The most outstanding thing is that the immediate neighbor, only 20 steps away, is an exceptional building from the 16th century, the Ex convent of Churubusco, where the National Museum of Interventions is housed, it is a museum with a museography of the SXXI. It is an exceptionally beautiful and well preserved building, surrounded by a generous grove.
The street is cobbled and a few steps further is the park of Xicoténcatl, where a spectacular sculptural group formed by: La Malinche, Hernan Cortez, and Diego is exhibited.
At about 15 minutes walking are: the house of Frida Kahlo, the house of Leon Trotsky, the Coyoacan market that is wonderful, in crafts and restaurants, flowers and fruits.
The center of Coyoacan is 25 minutes walking through colonial and tree-lined streets. The central square of Coyoacán concentrates the political center and gathers colonial buildings, fountains and gardens, surrounded by galleries, restaurants, cafes, and ice cream parlors. It's a delicious walk
Just three blocks from the Taller del Escultor is the metro station, this transport will allow you to travel to the center, as well as to areas of great tourist interest such as Chapultepec, the Anthropology Museum, or the political center of El Zócalo.
Mexico City is the city with the largest number of museums in the world.
Coyoacán has bars and several theaters off that make this neighborhood a delight of culture and nightlife.


Lo mas destacado es que el vecino inmediato a solo 20 pasos, es unexcepcional edificio del Siglo XVI el Ex convento de Churubusco, ahí se aloja el Museo Nacional de las Intervenciones, es un museo con museografía del SXXI. Es un edificio excepcionalmente bello y bien conservado, rodeado de una arboleda generosa.
La calle es adoquinada y a unos pasos más esta el parque de Xicoténcatl, ahi se exhibe un espectacular grupo escultórico formado por: La Malinche, Hernan Cortez, y Diego.
A unos 15 minutos caminando estan: la casa de Frida Kahlo, la casa de León Trotsky, el mercado de Coyoacan que es una maravilla, en artesanías y en restaurantes, flores y frutas.
El centro de Coyoacan esta a 25 minutos caminando por calles coloniales y arboladas. La plaza central de Coyoacán concentra el centro político y reúne edificios coloniales, fuentes y jardines, rodeados por galerias, restaurantes, cafes, y heladerías. Es un paseo delicioso
A solo tres cuadras del Taller del Escultor esta la estación del metro, este transporte les permitirá viajar a el centro, así como a zonas de gran interés turístico como Chapultepec, el Museo de antropología, o al centro politico de el País el Zócalo.
La Ciudad de México es la ciudad con el mayor numero de museos en el mundo.
Coyoacán tiene bares y varios teatros off que hacen de este barrio un deleite de cultura y de vida nocturna.
description.transit:
To know a city is to walk it and enjoy each step. Exit the Sculptor's Workshop with comfortable shoes and walk, visit the Exconvento and
The park of XIcotencatl, on AV División del Norte, you will find a variety of restaurants to choose from, even on the way to the Casa de Frida have opened delicious restaurant, and very close to the most important museums, the Museum of Popular Cultures, The Blue House or the House of Frida Kahlo and the house of Leon Trotsky
If you bring a car, you have to park it and the best thing is that on Xicoténcatl street, about three hundred meters from the house there is a parking lot, there you can leave your car.
Coyoacán is worth walking, or in any case take a taxi to the square and walk back, go through the Plaza del Carmen, or the Plaza de Santa Catarina and the market.

Conocer una ciudad es caminarla y disfrutar cada paso. Salir del Taller del Escultor con zapatos cómodos y caminar, visitar el Exconvento y 
El parque de XIcotencatl, sobre división del Norte tendrás una diversidad de restaurantes para elegir, y muy cerca los museos mas importantes , el museo de Culturas Populares, La casa Azul o la Casa de Frida Kahlo y la casa de León Trotsky
Si traes automóvil, habrá que estacionarlo y lo mejor es que sobre la calle Xicoténcatl a unos trescientos metros de la casa hay un estacionamiento, ahi pueden dejar su auto. 
Coyoacán vale la pena caminarlo, o en todo caso tomar un taxi a la plaza y regresar caminando, pasar por la plaza del Carmen, o por la plaza de Santa Catarina y por el mercado.
description.interaction:
Absoluto respeto a la intimidad e independencia de mis huéspedes. 
Tienen acceso al jardín donde el Taller del Escultor tiene una mesa asignada 
Si requieren  apoyo, pueden solicitarlo a través de la mensajería de Airbnb, vivo en la misma propiedad.
description.house_rules:
We are gay friendly,  and México City is gay friendly.
Prohibido almacenar tener y consumir las drogas prohibidas por la legislación Mexicana.
No se admiten mascotas, a menos de que sea un perro o un gato pequeños que no deberán dejar solos o sueltos por el jardín.
Si invitan amigos o hacer una pequeña fiesta lo podrán realizar siempre y cuando lo acuerden con su anfitriona con hora de inicio y de salida.
Pueden traer un bebe de hasta 2 años y deberán cuidarlo en todo momento y el huésped será responsable de la seguridad del bebé.
Los huéspedes deberán dejar lavados todos los utensilios de cocina que han utilizado.
Los huéspedes deberan dejar la basura en las bolsas que están dentro de los botes. 
Los huéspedes deberán colgar sus toallas en los tendederos designados. 
Él área de fumar es únicamente el jardín.
El huésped Tiene derecho a consumir todo lo que está en la cocina. 
El huésped tiene derecho a utilizar todos los enseres de cocina. 
El huésped deberá reportar a su anfitrión cualquier desperfecto que ocurra durante su estancia, para repararlo antes de la llegada del nuevo huésped.
La hora de salida es a las 12 am 
También les pido que apaguen las luces si no las están utilizando.
No parties. This is a beautiful, quiet part of the world, so please be respectful towards the neighbours and keep the noise down, especially between 10 pm and 7 am.
Please also respect the property and its contents. The owners are opening the doors of their property to people from around the world, and want as many as possible to enjoy its unique charm, so please take care around the apartment.
Our homes belong to us — not to Airbnb.
Please respect my neighbours, no loud music or parties or unknown overnight "GUESTS" or "Couch Surfers
La señal de Wifi es exclusivamente para comunicación familiar y de amigos o para esparcimiento, no es para comercializar.

Seguridad y salud: 

En caso de accidente o enfermedad durante su estancia y/o dentro de las instalaciones: 
El huésped debe hacerse 100% responsable de su seguridad, y atención medica, traer consigo los medicamentos que consume y que pudiera necesitar, y deberá dejar las instalaciones en el momento acordado. Los huéspedes se comprometen a hospedarse teniendo un seguro médico que los respalde. 

Anfitrión: Tiene a disposición de los huéspedes un botiquín de primeros auxilios, surtido y a la vista. Para curaciones básicas, (pequeñas cortadas, raspones, dolor de cabeza) cada huésped recibe información sobre farmacias y servicios médicos en la zona. El anfitrión coadyuvara a la resolución de cualquier incidente ofreciendo información, y todo aquello que, a su propio criterio, tenga a su alcance.
No es responsabilidad del anfitrión ni proveer atención médica, ni medicamentos, ni transporte a los huéspedes. No está obligado a extender el hospedaje en tiempo y forma alguna por razones de salud. Si lo hace sera por que su propio criterio y generosidad.

En caso de deceso del huésped:
Ya sea
El anfitrión deberá reportar el hecho ante airbnb y a las autoridades locales.
Los gastos de traslado y funerarios, son responsabilidad del huésped, y de sus familiares, y serán cubiertos por el seguro del huésped.
No es responsabilidad del anfitrión: cubrir los gastos que se deriven del deceso de los huéspedes, ni funerarios, ni indemnizar a familiares, ni socios, ni deudos. 
Los gastos legales que se deriven del deceso de los huéspedes o huésped deberán ser cubiertos por el huésped, y o su seguro.

Uso y seguridad de las instalaciones: Eléctrica, electrónicas, sanitarias y de gas

El huésped al recibir la suite deberá revisar el buen funcionamiento de  las instalaciones: eléctricas, electrónicas, sanitarias y de gas. Si encuentra algún desperfecto deberá reportarlo al anfitrión de inmediato. A partir de recibir las llaves, el uso de las instalaciones eléctricas, electrónicas, y sanitarias, todo quedan bajo la responsabilidad estricta del huésped.
Es una casa ecológica, todos los servicios se alimentan de energía solar, y no utilizamos gas.

name: Rare Cave Adventure : Peaceful & Natural Lifestyle
title: Hoya Pineda, Spain

gallery.caption: Gluten free bread made from rice
Entrada de la Finca de los Poetas

hosts.about:
Hello!
My name is Baptiste, and I live at this wonderful place since beginning of 2019, trying to make it every day more confortable.
My passions are creating an eco-friendly environment, as well as healthy food and lifestyle.
I love cooking vegetarian food.
I'm looking forward to welcoming you at the "Finca de los Poetas".


¡Hola!
Me llamo Baptiste, y vivo en este maravilloso lugar desde principios del 2019, intentando convertirlo en un lugar más cómodo cada día.
Mis pasiones son crear un ambiente ecológico, y también un estilo de vida saludable.
Me encanta cocinar vegetariano.

Estaré encantado de recibirte pronto en la "Finca de los Poetas".

recent.comments: De prachtige, rustgevende en frisse grot was zeer smaakvol ingericht. Baptiste zorgde voor een warm welkom en was steeds aanspreekbaar. De keuken was gedeeld met 1 andere kamer, maar ontzettend proper en had alles wat er nodig is. Op het domein zijn verschillende oases van rust om even te vertoeven en te genieten van de omgeving. Ondanks de hitte was de grot heerlijk fris en donker om in te slapen. We kregen fijne tips rond de omgeving en een zeer duidelijke instructies om de grotten te bereiken.

items.comments: De prachtige, rustgevende en frisse grot was zeer smaakvol ingericht. Baptiste zorgde voor een warm welkom en was steeds aanspreekbaar. De keuken was gedeeld met 1 andere kamer, maar ontzettend proper en had alles wat er nodig is. Op het domein zijn verschillende oases van rust om even te vertoeven en te genieten van de omgeving. Ondanks de hitte was de grot heerlijk fris en donker om in te slapen. We kregen fijne tips rond de omgeving en een zeer duidelijke instructies om de grotten te bereiken.

Tout a été parfait. Nous avons finalement passé plus de temps au logement plutôt qu’en balade tellement l’on se sentait bien dans ce petit coin de paradis. 
Baptiste, sa maman, sa femme et ses enfants sont vraiment adorables.
Encore merci beaucoup. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir.

Sehr schöne Unterkunft! 
Sehr freundliche Gastgeber! 
Ruhig und alles sehr sauber

Les lieux communs permettent de faire de belles rencontres. Aller chez Baptiste est une expérience. Il est passionné par le développement durable et son émerveillement pour l’île est contagieuse. Il est présent sans être envahissant, généreux et inspirant. Un mini Parc Guëll au cœur des Canaries.

Baptiste is an amazing host. He is very kind and helpful. He knows the island very well and has great tips on what to do and how to get there. The Airbnb is very beautiful and so is the area. A great experience being there in the middle of the nature! Also the dog and cats are very nice :)
非常非常非常特别的经历！！！非常非常漂亮的房间和非常非常友好的房东！很值得来！五星好评！

We had a lovely stay at Finca de los poetas and can really recommend this place. Baptiste was a great host and can recommend lots of great things to do around the island and the whole place with all his animals was a dream. Thank you for the good time

description.summary:
A handcarved 25m2 room, digged in the mountain a hundred years ago. You will be dreaming in a comfortable 160x200cm double bed. 

You will find a bathroom for your individual use, with a shower (soap, shampoo and hand-cream available) and a eco-friendly compostable dry toilet (a conventional toilet is available in the shared Bathroom if you prefer).
description.space:
Spending a night in the cave room is like sleeping in the belly of the earth. 

Surrounded by luxurious nature, you will enjoy the peacefulness of the Canarian countryside.

Your room is part of a big property, on which I live with my family and children. There is lots of secret spots to discover and chill out in the gardens...We have one dog, Ayla, 4 cats and a few chicken, fishes and frogs...

Common shared areas: kitchen, bathroom, terraces and outdoor areas.
description.access:
The main house and caves are surrounded by a big land and gardens. You can discover lots of little spots to chill out.

Common areas include: 

A shared kitchen exclusively for guests with everything necessary.
Big outdoor patio with dining area, Sofa...
Common bathroom with a conventional toilet.
A terrace with tables for couples...
description.notes:
I have been a professional vegetarian chef during a decade.
I dont like to keep secrets so...
I'll be more than happy to share my knowledge with you.
description.neighborhood: The Farm (Finca in Spanish) is situated on the territory of Santa Maria de Guía. It is in the northern part of Gran Canaria Island, surrounded by luxurious vegetation and very few but friendly and helpful neighbours.
description.transit:
My first advice to anyone coming to the Island is to rent a car ! I can help you finding the best option...

The Finca is located about 40 minutes away by car from the Capital Las Palmas de Gran Canaria ( It takes less than 1hour from the Airport).

By bus, from the central station at San Telmo Park, It will take you around 1h30 to reach my place ( bus n°105 to Gáldar and then n°106 to Hoya de Pineda).
description.interaction:
I am very passionate about sharing my Canarian experience and my favourite places ! 
Don't hesitate to ask anything you like.
description.house_rules: no outdoor shoes in the room...

Extrovertida, amante de la naturaleza, la familia, de carácter alegre, con don de gentes, entusiasta. Me gusta el cine, la cocina, la lectura, el campo, las tradiciones, el baile...

recent.comments:
Une hôte très agréable,  réactivé et très attentionnée. 
Le logement proposé et très atypique,  bien entretenu, au calme .
Bien équipé,  la literie excellente et très agréable. 
Peut-être un petit bémol,  l'accès au logement mais avec les explications fournies par Angela on trouve facilement,  il faut les suivre absolument. 
Encore un grand merci à Angela .

items.comments:
Une hôte très agréable,  réactivé et très attentionnée. 
Le logement proposé et très atypique,  bien entretenu, au calme .
Bien équipé,  la literie excellente et très agréable. 
Peut-être un petit bémol,  l'accès au logement mais avec les explications fournies par Angela on trouve facilement,  il faut les suivre absolument. 
Encore un grand merci à Angela .

LA CASA ES FABULOSA.COMODIDADES TODAS.TRAQUILIDAD ABSOLUTA. RECOMIENDO COBRE TO LA GENTE QUE TRAVAJA EN UN AMBIENTE  ESTRESADA. ESTO ES LA CURA .TENEIS QUE PROBAR. REALMENTE EL QUEN QUERE CALMA Y PAS EN LA NATURALESA.
Todo perfecto y súper contento, unas vacaciones inolvidables

Die Höhlenwohnung von Angela hat eine traumhafte Lage, in den Bergen, weit weg der Zivilisation mit wunderschönen Sonnenaufgängen und Sonnenuntergängen. 
Selbst im Mondschein haben wir das Draußensein sehr genossen. 
Die Anfahrt auf den engen, steilen Straßen ist spektakulär. Es war eine interessante Erfahrung. :)
Die Wohnung besteht aus 2 separaten Wohneinheiten, was wir (4 Personen) sehr schön fanden. Die Höhlenwohnungen sind, wie auch die Außenanlagen mit viel Liebe gebaut. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt. 
Vielen Dank Angela.

AMAZING!
Like a fairytale :)
Drive was a bit challenging, but the place was gorgeous. It was very well equipped (my son thought we could move in and we would have all we need :D ). Defenetly recommend if you are looking something special and not in the tourist centrum. The island is small so all the tourist attractions are near anyway :)
Hope to come back one day!

Sehr schöner Aufenthalt in der besonderen Location von Angela. Die Ruhe hat uns gefallen, die Höhlen liegen etwas abseits, aber mit dem Auto gut erreichbar. Es war ein besonderes Erlebnis, einmal in Höhlen zu wohnen.
Besondere Erfahrung. Sehr empfehlenswert. Top Aussicht!!!  Die Wohnung hat eine Vollausstattung. Kommunikation war easy. Gerne wieder

description.summary: It is a group of cave houses, which with an accredited antiquity of approximately 250 years, fully rehabilitated and equipped with everything necessary to spend a comfortable and quiet stay, in a dream place nestled in the mountain, on the edge of a ravine, surrounded by nature in its purest form and our farm of organic farming, from the terrace you can enjoy the most beautiful sunrises. VV-38-4-0093625
description.space: The house consists of several rooms made of the natural rock of the area, in which it has gardens, terrace, solarium, aromatic orchard, also you can access the ravine that is inside the property and go hiking and enjoy live from nature: birds, rabbits, lizards, perenquens, etc. It has its own parking and is fully fenced, which has security and total privacy during your stay.
description.access:
On Level 1 the first cave has a bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom, terrace with spectacular views and solarium with gardens.
On Level 2, the second cave has a room with double bedroom and bathroom
On Level 3, a third cave that has kitchen for family meals with barbecue
On the fourth level, there is the fourth cave where there is a washing machine, and dryer and area for natural drying of the laundry in the outdoor garden and access to the Barranco path.
description.notes:
It is a fully fenced 8000m2 rural estate, located on the edge of the Barranco de La Linde, the house is built on the rock, they are cave houses, the two caves that are used as guest residences have a window each , complying with the building regulations for this type of traditional housing in the area. As they are caves due to their construction and particularities, they only have an exterior wall, the rest are inside the mountain. It is important that you take into account all these details when booking, you can ask us any questions that may arise and the photographs of the house are also very helpful.
Regarding the interior and exterior temperature, due to the type of construction they are, they do not need heating or air conditioning, since the passenger compartment is always stable at 20-21º.
It is important to keep in mind that it is a place in the mountains, ideal for guests who want to be in contact with nature, rest without noise and without other people in the environment other than the guests who have booked.
Being in the place where it is located, it is important that they first look at the area of La Sombrera, and El Chamizo, so that they can get an idea of the orography, access road and services of the area, which are in the population center of Fasnia, although we detail it in the location and environment description section.
It is not the ideal destination for guests who need to have all the services of shops, transportation, and urban roads. It is a rural and agricultural area, with the old paved royal roads.
description.neighborhood: It is a rural town, very quiet and traditional, full of charm, with spectacular views surrounded by nature, 10 minutes from the nearest beach, with a network of trails for walking through the town and enjoying its charms, and gastronomy in the bars, markets and guachinches of the area. There is a nearby Climbing center and a route of Climbing places in the municipalities of Fasnia and Arico, as well as an area for scuba divers on Las Eras beach.
description.transit:
We are at your disposal to make it easier to find when you arrive, one day before your arrival we will send you a more detailed guided tour, regardless of the location of the ad.
Own vehicle is needed - rental, it is far from the last bus stop. The house is located at an altitude of 600m above sea level, in the mountains, so due to our orography there are mountain slopes along the first-class route.
It is accessed as in the entire area of the island by paved road to the property. The road is a single lane and two-way, with traffic only from neighbors, so it is not a road with fluid traffic, it has sidings to facilitate bidirectional circulation.
Please consult, before making the reservation, the area where the house is located, so that you know all the details of the access roads, especially for drivers who are not used to this type of road or driving.
description.interaction: Depending on the arrival time of the guests, we adapt to their needs, giving the option to collect the keys in the coded key box.
description.house_rules:
I hope that you respect the house as if it were your own, with due care, so that you can feel at home.
It is a quiet place to disconnect and enjoy nature, tranquility and the beauty of the place, respecting the environment.
Pets are welcome.
It is not allowed to make bonfires, or fires (except in the barbecue) or to cut down trees or bushes.

hosts.about: Con Bookiply puede encontrar fácilmente su casa de alquiler vacacional ideal. ¿Una bonita casa de campo con vistas a las montañas de Mallorca? ¿Un acogedor apartamento en las islas Canarias? o ¿Una casa de playa en la costa de Andalucía? Para ofrecerle una estancia relajante en las regiones más bellas de España, nos centramos en trabajar con propietarios certificados, cuyos alojamientos cumplen con nuestros criterios de alta calidad. Además de centrarnos en la calidad, ofrecemos un servicio de atención al cliente que lo asiste de forma rápida y directa con todas las preguntas e inquietudes los siete días de la semana.

description.summary:
The holiday apartment "Cueva El Desvelo" is situated in Tijarafe and creates a unique setting for your stay with a sea view. The 40 m² property consists of a living room, a well-equipped kitchen, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom and can accommodate 2 people. On-site amenities include high-speed Wi-Fi (suitable for video calls), a smart TV with streaming services and a washing machine.
The apartment boasts 3 furnished private open terraces and an outdoor shower which runs on solar energy.
description.notes:
The property is incorporated into a cave and boasts an enjoyable and tranquil location. The nearby destinations include El Poris, de Candelaria andLa Veta beach.
A parking space is available on the property.
Families with children are welcome.
Pets are not allowed.
Air conditioning is not available.
Beach/pool towels are provided.
The property offers homemade/homegrown produce.
This property has light and water-saving features.
description.house_rules:
Please keep in mind that you will be requested to submit both your arrival data (passport data, flight data, contact information) after booking so that the homeowner can plan your stay and check-in accordingly.
Possible extra fees specified in the description need to be paid on site.

recent.comments: Restorative place, very peaceful, people in the area are welcoming. Definitely would return again with a car to see even more and spend a week there. Host was very good with responding and supporting with things to do.

items.comments: Restorative place, very peaceful, people in the area are welcoming. Definitely would return again with a car to see even more and spend a week there. Host was very good with responding and supporting with things to do.
Cuevas Las a aguadas es un sueño en todos los aspectos
Acusa seca es un sueno Francois y Leila
Marta is an excellent host whose home is a must visit when visiting Gran Canaria.  Highly recommend!

Pepe fui super amable desde el primer momento
Nos explicó todo con detalle, entregado y serio.
The view, the spaciousness, the hospitality, the decor. The only place worth staying on the island in my opinion!

Thank you very mich for this beautiful stay. The terrasse with the great view over the mountains is a perfect place to calm down and recharge. We used the outdoor fireplace to cook and were discovering the cave area. Pepe was very nice to chat to and explained a lot about the surroundings. We didn’t miss anything and definitely come back!

description.summary: Lovely and cosy cave house in the heart of the island. Great interior temperature that it keeps warm in winter and cool in summer without necessity of any technology. The cave house is located in a pre-hipanic aboriginal settlement with amazing views to the central caldera of Gran Canaria

Parking

description.notes: Es un yacimiento arqueológico prehispánico de asentamientos trogloditas con templos y marcadores de claras connotaciones astronómicas. En el barrio de Acusa Seca se han encontrado las momias más antiguas de Gran Canaria (siglo VI D.C.)
description.neighborhood: El más antiguo asentamiento troglodita prehispánico de la Isla de Gran Canaria, dentro del municipio de Artenara.
description.transit: Access only by car. Plenty of hiking options near to the house location.
description.interaction: Total freedom to the guest. Host around for help as needed.
