hosts.about:
Hola, somos una pareja que nos hace feliz ofrecer a nuestros huéspedes una experiencia única, cuidamos todo al detalle para que se sientan como en casa.
Será un placer recibiros.

recent.comments: Die Unterkunft ist einfach total schön und etwas ganz besonderes! Juan und seine Frau haben die Höhle mit vie Liebe renoviert und eingerichtet. Außerdem gaben sie gute Tipps und haben immer schnell geantwortet.

items.comments: Die Unterkunft ist einfach total schön und etwas ganz besonderes! Juan und seine Frau haben die Höhle mit vie Liebe renoviert und eingerichtet. Außerdem gaben sie gute Tipps und haben immer schnell geantwortet.

We had a wonderful time in this beautiful cave house. It is in a village in the mountains far away from the tourist places, which was right what we were looking for. The cave house is a special place and it also had everything that we needed. The well-equipped kitchen has even a mixer to make nice fresh smoothies. And we enjoyed very much having breakfast in the courtyard. At night you sometimes have an amazing night sky. When we arrived there was even wine and apple cider as a welcome gift waiting for us. Moreover,  we felt very well taken care of.  We can highly recommend it!
notre deuxième expériences dans une cueva , de très bonnes ondes et une très bonne aération, des hôtes accessibles et très chaleureux, une très bonne expérience

We stayed in Juan's cave for a bit more then a week and really enjoyed our stay. The location is remote and not in the busy tourist areas which was a big plus for us. With the directions Juan gave us, it was easy to find and only half an hour away from Tenerife South Airport. Do note however, that some roads in the vicinity are a bit narrow and steep and require some driving skills (which we thought was fun ;)). The house itself contains everything we needed, hot (open) shower, kitchen, nice beds. We did woke up early the first morning because of the two roosters across the street, but got used to them at the end. 

Communication with the owners was great and pro-active. When we had problems with the warm water (which turned out to be our own fault in the end), he assisted us quickly.

Thanks Juan for letting us stay and thanks for the bottle of wine and the snacks! We really felt welcome!

I spent 1 month at Casa Cueva with my partner in March and it was a very nice time.  The host - Juan, was excellent, very friendly and attending to any communication promptly and from afar so as to not disturb us.  Juan was even kind enough to lend us a bike to get around, and provided advice and recommendations.

The cave house is amazing, the perfect place to get away.  It is very beautiful inside and out, and I enjoyed watching the incredible sunrises each morning from the outdoor seating area - you can see out across the ocean all the way to Gran Canaria.  One thing to keep in mind is that while very peaceful, there are two roosters directly opposite the accommodation that like to begin at 5am... but if you use earplugs you will be fine.

The location is quite remote and the buses are unreliable so you need a car to visit other parts of the island.

All in all a great accommodation and a great host.  The cave house is everything it claims to be and a wonderful place to find peace.

We spent 2 full weeks on this island of paradise and we loved everything about the cave. In my opinion, it looks way more beautiful than on the pictures, its at a local, remote space, up in the mountains but close to the ocean and the highway, so everything is easily reachable. The view in the morning on one of the upper terraces is unbeatable and the cave has everything you need for cooking comfortably, to work, relax and for everything really. Juan was responsive, kind and caring, we had the best time here ! We are already planning our trip back next Winter. :) :) Thank you so much, Juan !!

Juan's cave house is extraordinary. I enjoyed every day of my stay and I will definitely come back.
The furnishing and installations are really well-matching and comfortable. You find everything you need in the house. Juan is a really nice and  attentive host, who really cares for his guests.

description.summary: Acogedora casa cueva en entorno rural, un lugar ideal para compartir en pareja o con la familia y disfrutar de la tranquilidad y naturaleza de Tenerife. Con mas de un siglo de antigüedad esta casa cueva, antiguamente vivienda familiar, ha sido re-modelada de una forma especial para que los huéspedes disfruten de la esencia de Tenerife.
description.space:
La casa cueva dispone de todo lo necesario para unas vacaciones o simplemente para unos días de descanso.
Amplio salón con chimenea y zona de estar y un dormitorio independiente con dos camas. Además, la cocina con todo lo necesario para cocinar.
Tiene muebles de alta calidad, y detalles que los hacen un lugar especial.
description.access: En el exterior, una amplia terraza para disfrutar del  clima agradable y limpio de la zona y  una escalera para acceder a la parte alta de la cueva y disfrutar de las bellas vistas al  mar y, en la noche, del cielo estrellado
description.neighborhood:
A tan solo 5 minutos caminando esta el centro del pueblo de La Zarza, en Fasnia,  con una pequeña tienda aunque bien surtida, con productos locales y un bar-cafeteria
Ademas, la plaza, centro medico..casa de la juventud
Un pueblo tranquilo, con población autóctona y personas amables donde prevalece la paz y la tranquilidad, con bonitas vistas al mar y a la montaña, lugares para hacer senderismo, parapente, escalada y a tan solo 10 minutos de la playa Los Roques y Las Eras,  playas tranquilas donde se puede hacer pesca, submarinismo y disfrutar de un buen día de sol, a tan solo 8 minutos de la autopista general.
En Fasnia hay diversidad de bares, bancos, supermercados, farmacias etc.
description.transit: Es más fácil y cómodo si tienes un coche de alquiler, aunque también hay trasporte público
description.interaction: Nosotros estaremos siempre a vuestro servicio. Para cualquier cosa que necesiten solo deben de escribirnos.
description.house_rules:
• Se pedirá documentación para verificar su registro.

.En el alojamiento solo pueden estar y pernoctar los dos  huéspedes que la reservan. No se admiten visitas

.Se admiten mascotas previa consulta al  anfitrion y pudiera tener un coste adicional

- Por favor, no tirar papeles o toallas higiénicas en el WC, podria obstruirse, tírelos en la papelera del baño. 

- El uso de la calefacción es gratuito hasta un cierto consumo razonable. Si el consumo es excesivo se cobrará un coste adicional

• Solo se permite fumar en la terraza y en zonas exteriores del alojamiento 

• Cerrar las puertas de la casa cada vez que entren o salgan

• Apague luces o cualquier aparato eléctrico mientras no lo use. 
Sea considerado con el derroche innecesario de agua o luz.

• Eviten darle de comer a los gatos callejeros cerca de la casa, ya que no están desparasitados y podrían obtener chinches.   

• Al abandonar la casa dejar todo en las mismas condiciones como la encontró

• Mantener el orden y la limpieza de la casa durante su estancia.

• Eviten ruidos y fiestas después de las 22:00

- Se proporciona una cantidad de leña para la chimenea, si deseara mas, tendria que adquirirla en una tienda, pedirla al anfitrion, que tendria un costo o, tambien, puede recogerla de lugares proximos a las calles, etc. y este abandonada. La madera que esta en las terrazas encima del alojamiento no son para uso de la chimenes
Gracias por vuestra comprension

name: Cueva El Desvelo, coqueta cueva en piedra viva
title: Tijarafe, Spain

recent.comments: Quelle perle rare. Merveilleuse grotte avec tout le confort possible et la cuisine est comme neuve. Le lit est tellement agréable. Terrasse avec vue sur la mer et tranquillité absolue. Nolva est une hote hors paire. Elle est gentille et nous a accueillie avec des fruits de son jardin. Je reviendrait volontiers pour renouveler ce merveilleux séjour. Merci mille fois.

items.comments: Quelle perle rare. Merveilleuse grotte avec tout le confort possible et la cuisine est comme neuve. Le lit est tellement agréable. Terrasse avec vue sur la mer et tranquillité absolue. Nolva est une hote hors paire. Elle est gentille et nous a accueillie avec des fruits de son jardin. Je reviendrait volontiers pour renouveler ce merveilleux séjour. Merci mille fois.

Nous avons passé un séjour incroyable dans cette petite cave avec vue splendide, dans un calme absolu, parfait pour des vacances reposantes.
Nolva a été adorable du début à la fin, très arrangeante sur notre arrivée qui a dû être décalée suite à un imprévu de voyage. Elle et sa famille ont rénové cette ancienne cave qui appartenait à sa famille et en ont fait un logement super cosy. Tout a été intelligemment pensé et rénové avec beaucoup de goût. 
Tout était parfait ! Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir et recommanderons ce logement a nos proches de passage à La Palma sans hésiter !

Nolva ist super freundlich und eine sehr tolle Gastgeberin. Die Höhle ist sehr sauber, die Einrichtung ist sehr schön und es ist alles vorhanden, was benötigt wird. Uns hat es total gut gefallen und wir werden das nächste Mal wieder kommen!

Sehr gelungene Unterkunft.
Trotz der außergewöhnlichen Art, nämlich einer Höhle, fehlt es an nichts und es ist absolut ruhig. 
Wir werden Nolva sehr gerne weiterempfehlen und wünschen Ihr noch viele Gäste.

Sehr liebevoll und hochwertig ausgestattete Höhle. Festes Bett, neues Sofa, toller Gasherd
Ganztags Sonne und Blick aufs Meer.  Und wenn die Sonne Abends verschwindet beginnt die absolute Dunkelheit und Ruhe.

Wir hatten eine wirklich schöne Zeit in der Höhle von Nolva! Sie hat uns so lieb empfangen, uns alles gezeigt und uns sogar ein paar Leckereien zur Begrüßung bereit gestellt. Die Orangen aus ihrem Garten haben einfach toll geschmeckt :-) 
Es ist alles da was man braucht und es war wirklich sehr sauber. Die Kommunikation mit Nolva war schnell, unkompliziert und freundlich :-) 
Jedem, der eine gemütliche Unterkunft auf La Palma sucht, können wir diese Höhle empfehlen! Vielen Dank Nolva!

Super-sauber, sehr freundlich!
Tolle Tips zur Umgebung/ was sich lohnt zu besuchen!
DANKE!

description.summary:
Coqueta cueva la cual esta tallada en piedra viva,  te sentirás  parte de ella, ya que abraza al lugar donde esta.
 Muy tranquila, ideal para desconectar estando en plena naturaleza, o una escapada romántica.
Enclavada en un barranco, con aparcamiento y fácil acceso. 
En ella encontraras paz, podrás relajarte tomando el sol en su terraza.

name: Dolphins Ocean Cave (10 minutes from the airport)
title: Alfredo V. Bonfil, Mexico

location.address: Alfredo V. Bonfil, Cancun, Quintana Roo, Mexico

gallery.caption: Entrance to the Dolphins Ocean Cave
Table for dinner or card games

recent.comments:
deze plaats is adembenemend mooi,
prachtige creaties wat die man "Carlos" zelf maakt en nog eens een zeer vriendelijke man! alles naar wens geweest gewoon WOW

items.comments:
deze plaats is adembenemend mooi,
prachtige creaties wat die man "Carlos" zelf maakt en nog eens een zeer vriendelijke man! alles naar wens geweest gewoon WOW

What a place! We had an incredibly warm welcome from Chris and Carlos and felt like we were coming home. As everyone else has said below, the accommodation and gardens are like nothing you will have seen before with stylish, quirky and wonderful features everywhere you look. We spent a glorious afternoon relaxing by the pool and enjoying the peaceful sanctuary. We would recommend this place 100%!!
have to see it to believe it! we had a blast.  super kind and welcoming host.

Carlos’ place was truly incredible. Such a beautiful property with lots of unique construction and an amazing garden. The place was so peaceful and you truly felt isolated in a little paradise. The property is kind of difficult to find but once you get there you will really appreciate it. The room made you feel like you were living in Ariel’s room from The Little Mermaid. Carlos was waiting for us on our arrival and was helpful with organizing taxis from the property since cell service is not great from the location.

OMG! it was like all off the guests that have stayed at Chris & Carlos MAGICAL. 
And like the one person posted the Photos didn't do it JUSTICE To see in PERSON was so Amazing. They really took time and they care and so detailed and have a great gardening and Paradise like Retreat of an Air B N B. 

It was super like Bali vibes zen, Majestic, Just So worth the MONEY!!! Like I felt bad after I was thinking of cancelling because me and My daughter just wanted to do a cheap in expensive get away before I returned back to work, So was Literally IN & OUT One Day!!! But guess what I would have done for a FEW HOURS how Nice and Beautiful their place is! We Definitely Will BE RETURNING. And plan to enjoy the other Themed Bedrooms . We did the Dolphin Cave which was so beautiful.

Carlos was telling us of the projects he is working on. That will OMG make their place even more Wonderful it is a Wonderland Paradise! So looking forward to returning and taking in some more of this Beautiful place!

This place has an outstanding architecture but it’s like a museum. He made an OMG place but uncomfortable for guests to stay in the middle of nowhere. He doesn’t allow cooking, neither offers anything like coffee at least or water. Everything is far away and WiFi only works outside your room. Bathroom outside the room and no hot water. No A/C in the room either and it was extremely hot. I wasn’t able to sleep at all and didn’t take a shower at night and left early in the morning. The hospitality you expect in Mexico with warm people is not here. The place is inside his property and he locked the door early at night without asking if I needed a key or may want to go out. I felt like kidnapped and next morning I even had to ask him to unlock the door so I could leave to eat something. He was having breakfast and didn’t even bother to offer anything to drink ( in the middle of nowhere). Very sad because it was my last night in Mexico. Notice the place is not in Cancun. Not worth it.
Carlos is awesome. He decorated the place so nice, he gave us recommendations, his home is VERY nice and just a pleasure to stay in. Would highly recommend

description.summary: Double your fun!  Guests describe their experience like visiting a popular theme park garden while sleeping in a unique earth house room. This hidden paradise is located in the jungle away from the noise, yet only a 10-minute drive to the Cancun International airport.  Your room has been created with the beauties of the ocean environment that literally transports you to a world under the sea.
description.space: You will enjoy your own earthhouse room designed to get away from the normal everyday distractions.  Fresh air and quiet sounds will relax the mind and rejuvenate your spirit.
description.access: We have several areas for you to enjoy. You will have access to the infinity pool that has a waterfall. The large garden allows for several photo opportunities to capture your memories to this jungle paradise. Lay on the grassy bed in the evening to watch the stars or enjoy the outdoor living room with a fireplace. You will also have access to Buddha lounge; our newest addition on the property which includes a living area to relax while enjoying your favorite cocktail. This area is located next to the pool and also includes refrigerator/freezer, microwave. (not designed for cooking)
description.notes:
We have noticed that some of our guests do not have Internet service in Mexico or do not have a good signal so make sure to copy all our instructions when booking.

As another observation, if you like to watch movies or programs, it is preferable that you download them before you arrive.
description.neighborhood:
Chris & Carlos’s home is located in Alfredo V. Bonfil, Cancun, Quintana Roo, Mexico.
The property is located in a safe and peaceful neighborhood completely surrounded with closed circuit security. Just 15 minutes from downtown Cancun and only 10 minutes from the Cancun International Airport. We recommend that you bring food and drink since the closest convenient store is 10 minutes away.
description.transit:
Renting a car is your best option, otherwise taxi service is available.  Free Parking is available on the street. We can also provide recommendations for private transportation. 

Special Note for Spring Breakers: We are a 30 minute drive to the Hotel Zone where the night clubs are located. If you are looking to relax , this place is perfect.
description.interaction: The guests will have their privacy and we will be available to help them if they require it. Feel safe that there will always be someone available for assistance 24/7.
description.house_rules:
1.  Please understand that addresses in Mexico Do Not work in GPS Map Applications.  You will be sent a special link to use.  You must save this link prior to your travel making it easy to arrive directly to our property. 
2.	You will have access to the garden, pool and all seated area's. These areas are available until 10pm unless you have communicated prior arrangements. 
3.	When leaving your room please turn off all lights and the ceiling fan.
4.	Due to the warm climate in Cancun and the location of the water supply being on top off the roof, the water is consisting warm naturally or at least at room temperature therefore the water is not heated by a water heater.
5.	As with most businesses and houses in Mexico, all paper products should go into the trash can and not into the toilet. 
6.	You will have access to the refrigerator and microwave in the shared lounge area if you wish to use these appliances.
7. We also recommend bringing food, snacks and drinks before arriving as there are no nearby shops. The closest is a 10-minute drive.
8. Smoking is only permitted outside of the rooms.  We do not allow smoking inside the rooms.

title: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

gallery.caption:
zona común de disfrute para Maday 2 pax
 y 2 cuevas mas..... Guayarmina / Bencomo que se encuentran en la misma área
Area privada desde la entrada de Maday hasta los sillones, mecedora de madera y hamaca colgada para hacer del descanso una realidad
Barbacoa comunitaria ,puede ser que se comparta en su estancia o puede ser que no hayan reservas y disponga de ella en exclusiva como la piscina.
zona de aparcamientos vigilada entrada y salida.
En cualquiera de las cuevas de  Arico Cave Experience tendrán información de cómo adquirir productos locales de la zona que usted esta visitando, Arico, Santa Cruz deTenerife .

hosts.about:
Hola, soy un canario que junto con otro canario aunamos recursos y hemos creado la mejor experiencia de Tenerife.
 Promotor turístico, guía, monitor Sup, deporte adaptado y gestor de Arico Cave Experience

recent.comments:
A really remote and tranquil location. The drive to get to the cave is an adventure in itself. 

It’s a basic place to rejuvenate and a great base for hiking as well as exploring by road.

If you want a switch off away from it all, this is a wonderful spot. Stock up on food and drink and enjoy the remoteness of the mountain!

items.comments:
A really remote and tranquil location. The drive to get to the cave is an adventure in itself. 

It’s a basic place to rejuvenate and a great base for hiking as well as exploring by road.

If you want a switch off away from it all, this is a wonderful spot. Stock up on food and drink and enjoy the remoteness of the mountain!

This place is pretty remote, you need a  car. But beside that, it's amazing! Very cosy, in the calm of the mountains, I had a great few days of quietness and the area.

Also, the way those caves are done is amazing.

Thank you Aaron for the hosting :)
Great host. Excellent accommodation and communication
A melhor estadia que tivemos em toda a nossa vida! Grande experiência ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ para voltar!!!
Un lugar de lo más tranquilo, muy limpio, equipado y muy acogedor. 100/10

Wat een pareltje! 
Verborgen in de prachtige natuur en zo fantastisch rustig..  er waren zelfs momenten ´s avonds dat de stilte ons overviel! Het uitzicht vanop het terras is adembenemend. De woning zelf is klein, maar super praktisch en cosy ingericht. Het brubbelbad vonden wij een enorm pluspunt! Aaron weet enorm veel over de omgeving en staat steeds klaar om te helpen.
Great spot! Definitely recommend, just make you have a car.

description.summary:
Enamórate de esta cueva  tan romántica situada en plena naturaleza.
Maday se encuentra en Arico, El Bueno, en Santa Cruz de Tenerife.
Un lugar idílico que marca la diferencia por su localización remota y sus servicios, disfruta de una experiencia única en la isla de Tenerife.

hosts.about: Me gustan las actividades como la bici de montaña, caminar con nuestros perros, aventura en moto de doble propósito por los remotos rincones de nuestro hermoso país, velear y estamos explorando distintas propuestas de desarrollar espacios alternativos y creativos en Valle de Bravo.

recent.comments: Verdaderamente este es uno de los lugares más bonitos que he visitado en Valle de Bravo, la atención y vibra del sr Francisco siempre fue excelente, las fotos no le hacen justicia a la casa! Si lo que buscas es un spot para tomar drinks en una terraza espectacular con amigos definitivamente esta es la opción. Recomiendo totalmente los servicios de la señora soledad, siempre muy amable y muy dispuesta, hizo que nuestra estadía fuera más linda. Si recomiendo llevar una camioneta que resista pendientes pronunciadas, por que es un poco complicado el acceso, fuera de eso todo todo excelente, definitivamente regresaremos.

Gran alojamiento!

description.summary: Enjoy the beauty of nature and the charming village with stunning views of the lake and mountains from this private gated house surrounded by trees and boasting a sunny orientation. The house features a spacious open and covered terrace and a delightful jacuzzi for relaxation, heats up in a matter of 15 minutes. The house is up high on a very quiet street, but close enough to get down to the main avenue to walk into town, where you will find nice restaurants and shops.
description.space: The house has three comfortable bedrooms, all with incredible views of the lake and nature, each with its own full bathroom, two of them with mezzanine and balcony. The kitchen is open for socializing and enjoyment, connecting with the dining room and living room on a spacious covered terrace and another uncovered terrace with a grill. The house features a powerful jacuzzi on the terrace with a boiler, a guest bathroom with shower, laundry area, and a bicycle storage room. The house is located within a gated community, surrounded by beautiful trees and plants, with a sunny southern orientation.
description.access: You will have access to all areas of the space during your stay. This includes the bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchen, dining and living areas, as well as the outdoor terraces and hot tub. We want you to feel at home and make the most of your stay, so please don't hesitate to ask if you need anything. Enjoy your stay!
description.notes:
The house is located in the upper part of the town, the climb is steep and in poor condition, it is convenient to have a suitable car, but in return it has a beautiful view from the entire house, there is space for several cars inside the private street. It has a magnificent cook and maid, the jacuzzi operates with a powerful boiler. The house is oriented to the south therefore it is warm and dry with many corners to relax and rest.

Guests are in charge of bringing the inputs/ingredients for the preparation of their meals.
description.neighborhood: Up high on a very quiet street, but close enough to get down to the main avenue to walk into town.
description.transit: Ideally by car, however if you enjoy walking you are close enough to get down to the main avenue into town
description.house_rules: No Smoking only please.

hosts.about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

recent.comments: Lovely home with a beautiful view! Has everything you could imagine or need, from cleaning supplies to yard games! Great location in a quaint small town!

items.comments: Lovely home with a beautiful view! Has everything you could imagine or need, from cleaning supplies to yard games! Great location in a quaint small town!

Our weekend getaway girls trip was wonderful! Close enough to the Elk River where we went floating (It was very nice have the privacy from all the other people in town to float). Sherry was extremely welcoming even offered to greet us and show us the ends and outs of the property. This place was pure BLISS! The backyard was so peaceful to hear the creek water and birds singing in the morning. Perfect was to spend drinking my morning coffee. The cabin had plenty of room and the beds were really comfortable. Huge deck… I could go on and on. We WILL be back. Thank you for your hospitality Sherry!
Great place!
Second time staying at this house.  Love the area, and it was another amazing stay.  The host checks in and makes sure you have everything you need. We will be back for sure

We had an awesome time in Pineville, the house was so nice! Donna the host was very welcoming, we had a small issue with the code, it all worked out! The house was immaculate, the beds were comfy and the kitchen well stocked with anything you could need. It was a wonderful experience, my grandson’s loved the creek! Would come back again!
Very beautiful, peaceful place. Pictures do not do it justice. Donna was an awesome host. Highly recommend. Would definitely stay again!

This is a truly beautiful spot. Ample room for a family, but also a great getaway for two.  The house is equipped with everything you need to function, really nice attention to detail. We really loved it.

description.summary: Leave the day-to-day behind for a relaxing trip to scenic Missouri when you stay at this Pineville cabin. This 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental boasts a unique outdoor space complete with a fire pit, a creek, a swing, children's toys, and more. Settle into the contemporary cabin interior that lets you whip up dinner in the fully equipped kitchen or cozy up to the electric fireplace. With outdoor attractions like Elk River, Bluff Dwellers Cavern, and more nearby, you'll love this peaceful spot!
description.space:
Fire Pit | Washer & Dryer | 1,400 Sq Ft | Pet Friendly w/ a Fee

Ideal for a quiet family getaway, this Pineville hideaway combines all the comforts of home with a fantastic outdoor space.

Bedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2: King Bed | Bedroom 3: Twin/Full Bunk Bed, Lofted Twin Bed | Additional Sleeping: Pack 'n Play

OUTDOOR LIVING: Furnished deck, large yard, swings, children's outdoor toys, outdoor seating, front porch, on-site creek
INDOOR LIVING: Smart TVs, recessed lighting, wood-paneled walls, contemporary decor, sliding-glass doors
KITCHEN: Fully equipped w/ cooking basics, microwave, dishwasher, drip coffee maker, dishware/flatware, island w/ seating
GENERAL: Free WiFi, complimentary toiletries, towels/linens, cleaning essentials, central A/C & heating
FAQ: 2-step entry, 2-story cabin, pet fee (paid pre-trip), no T-Mobile or Sprint cell service
PARKING: Driveway (1 vehicle), gravel parking (10 vehicles)
description.neighborhood:
OUTDOOR SPOTS: Pineville Bike Park (0.6 miles), Elk River (0.9 miles), Outlaw Ridge Skeet Shooting (0.9 miles), Ponderosa Trails (3.5 miles), Huckleberry Ridge Conservation Area (5.8 miles), Chinquapin Walking Trail (6.5 miles), Big Sugar Creek State Park (6.6 miles), Bluff Dwellers Cave (10.5 miles), 6 18-hole golf courses (~13 miles), biking & hiking trails (~20 miles)
AREA EATS: Burger Time (1.9 miles), Haven 55 (2.0 miles), MaryDean's Cafe (4.9 miles), Antojitos La Monarca (6.8 miles), The Jane Store (7.1 miles), Los Mariachis (7.7 miles), The Greenes Bar & Grill (9.3 miles), Bubbas BBq (11.2 miles)
WORTH A TRIP: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art (27 miles), Branson (93.8 miles), Springfield (101 miles), Ozark National Forest (103 miles)
AIRPORT: Northwest Arkansas National Airport (28.2 miles)
description.interaction: Evolve makes it easy to find and book properties you’ll never want to leave. You can relax knowing that our properties will always be ready for you and that we’ll answer the phone 24/7. Even better, if anything is off about your stay, we’ll make it right. You can count on our homes and our people to make you feel welcome--because we know what vacation means to you.
description.house_rules:
- No smoking
- Pet friendly w/ $50 fee (+ fees & taxes)
- No events, parties, or large gatherings
- Must be at least 25 years old to book
- Additional fees and taxes may apply
- Photo ID may be required upon check-in
- NOTE: There is no T-Mobile or Sprint cell service at the property

View of volcano Atitlan, volcano Toliman and volcan San Pedro from patio.
The indoor kitchen area at Casa en la Piedra has an apartment sized fridge and toaster oven, and many small appliances.
Open concept living room and kitchen area. The couch folds flat for use as a bed.
Bathroom with hot shower and bathtub. As you can see, the house is built right into the rock!
The front of the house from the terrace outside the downstairs bedroom.
View of round window from patio.
The sitting area on the terrace outside downstairs bedroom.
The sun deck closer to the lake.
The gate at the top of the property, at the path that leads to the village.
Casa en la Piedra main house and guest house, Jaibalito, Lake Atitlán, Guatemala.

hosts.about: I live in Los Angeles and enjoy traveling.

items.comments: Hem estat com a casa. Tant l'Alberto com l'Humberto ens han ajudat molt i la casa és genial, en una localització fantàstica i està molt ben equipada i neta.
3 time in Albert place, great host....impecable place
Wouw, Haven on Earth !!
This is the place to be if you like to relax and get the nicest view of the lake. We travelling for a while now and this was our favorite spot, thanks!!

Pictures do not do Casa de la Piedra justice. This home is surreal and an incredible experience if you’re visiting Lake Atitlan. Albert and his property manager, Humberto were both helpful and available throughout our stay.

Casa en la Piedra is a magical place. 

Albert and Humberto are fantastic hosts. 

We loved the privacy, seclusion, the beauty of the architecture of the home, the private dock to swim in the lake and catch boat taxis, and the ease to walk to the very quaint nearby town of Jaibalito. 

Albert is a super communicative host and offers amazing recommendations and resources. 

Humberto, his staff on-site, is a really nice and helpful person. 

Honestly we didn’t want to leave, could see ourselves spending months here, & enjoyed every moment of our time in this amazing home. 

You want to be fit for lots of stairs. This is not a good place for people with mobility issues. It’s a good place to get stronger and move daily! We loved it. 

Kitchen is fully equipped & we cooked lots.

Views are insane. You can get to other towns easily and cheaply by boat. It’s a great place to reset, rest, have solitude & peace in one of the most beautiful homes/locations I’ve traveled to. 

Thank you so much!

What an incredible place that is Casa en La Piedra! From the start, Albert sent us detailed instructions and recommendations prior to our arrival which made us feel at ease and totally prepared to travel to such a remote location. Humberto met us at our boat and, despite his limited English and our limited Spanish, was available for our every need. Lastly, what a view and peaceful ambiance. We took total advantage just sitting and looking out over the lake and at the volcanos. Highly recommend!|

description.summary: This amazing lakeside home has a spectacular view of the volcanoes at Lake Atitlán. Situated just west of the Jaibalito dock, the main house at Casa en la Piedra is about 75 feet up from the water's edge, with beautiful gardens and landscaping.
description.space:
The main house at Casa en la Piedra is quiet, private, and ruggedly remote. The surroundings are lush and green all year around. 

This house is unique! It is located lakeside on a mountain just west of the small village of Jaibalito. 

The house gets its name from the fact that it is literally built into rocks. It is located high above the lake-shore with spectacular views of three volcanoes, and all the activities on the lake, with beautiful sunrises and romantic sunsets. It has two levels with the main living area on the first floor and a cozy bedroom and wonderful patio below. It has queen size bed.

The house is fully equipped for comfortable living and includes regular housekeeping services.

It is much quieter than being in the village itself. 

There are spiders and other insects common to the region.  Please be advised that you might be seeing them inside the house.
description.access: There is a private dock for swimming, and a terrace just above the dock for sunbathing (shared with the guests of the guest house).
description.notes:
We provide your drinking water (agua pura), as the tap water is not drinkable. Complimentary locally grown and roasted coffee is provided. Housecleaning is provided weekly. This includes a changing of bed linens and towels. Personal laundry service is available by the caretaker. Garbage and recycling is removed for guests. 
The oven in the stove does not work and cannot be repaired. However, a large toaster oven is provided.

CLEANUP AFTER YOUR STAY:
We ask that guests do their dishes following their stay. 

Please note: the internet is not 100% reliable in Jaibalito, so trying to stream Netflix is not recommended, and (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)ing can be challenging at times.
description.neighborhood: The residents of Jaibalito are mainly Mayan with a population of 800-900 people. There is a small friendly community of foreigners who reside there year around. It is one of the smallest communities on Lake Atitlán. Residents speak Kakchiqel with some Spanish. The women still dress in traditional Guatemalan traje. Jaibalito is only accessible by "lancha" (water taxi), with no roads leading in or out of the village. So there are no cars in the village, just one tuk-tuk (auto-ricksaw). There are four restaurants, and one small locally-owned café. The lake is the deepest in Central America, and is cool but wonderful for swimming.  Kayaks are available for rent in the neighboring village of Santa Cruz, a 30-minute hike over the mountain east of Jaibalito, or a short boat ride.
description.transit:
Getting to Jaibalito: 

At the Panajachel dock, ask for a "publico" lancha to Jaibalito. When you arrive at the Jaibalito dock, simply ask the captain of the lancha to bring you to Casa en la Piedra, just one minute to the west. There are orange flags on the dock itself so it is easily recognized. You can tell the captain "Casa en la Piedra" and/or "las banderas naranja", and point west towards our dock, which you can see from the Jaibalito dock. 

There is a scale for lancha prices. Locals pay the least, expat residents pay a little more, and tourists pay the most. 

Approximate lancha prices: 
Panajachel to Jaibalito: Q10-20 
Jaibalito to our dock: Q5
Jaibalito to Santa Cruz: Q10 
Jaibalito to San Marcos: Q20 
Jaibalito to San Juan: Q20-25
Jaibalito to San Pedro: Q20-25 

Getting around: 

It is a 10-minute walk to the village. It is a somewhat challenging but short hike up 100+ stairs and then down over the side of the mountain. Just continue going up the stairs past the caretaker's home until you reach the gate to the path above, turn right, and go east into the village. If you travel west on the path, you will reach the village of Tzununa in about 30 minutes. Hike another 3 hours and you will reach San Marcos, a mecca for yoga/massage/meditation enthusiasts. These villages can be reached by lanchas from the dock. Private lanchas are also available. 

To visit the village of Jaibalito from Casa en la Piedra, it is a one-minute boat ride. The orange flags on our dock can be removed and used to flag down a lancha. They come at least every 20 minutes. If the lancha arrives from the right of our dock, it will then go to Jaibalito and eventually back to Panajachel. If the lancha is coming from the left (after having stopped at the Jaibalito dock), it will go on to Tzununa, San Marcos, etc. until it gets to San Pedro, and then it will return via the same route back to Panajachel. 

Please note: Because we have many, many stairs, this house is best suited for able-bodied people who enjoy a bit of a physical challenge. :)
description.interaction: Hosts may or may not be on the property at the time of your visit, but there is a caretaker ("guardian") who lives on the property.
description.house_rules: We expect our guests to have respect for our belongings, and for the environment, during their stay. No pets, no smoking inside house.

recent.comments: muy lindo, las personas son muy amables y el lugar es hermoso, tiene una vista muy linda también 💕

items.comments: muy lindo, las personas son muy amables y el lugar es hermoso, tiene una vista muy linda también 💕
Excelente hospedaje, servicio el mejor, y el taller con Hernán el mejor! E Inés la mejor! 100% recomendado.

Tienen que visitar este maravilloso lugar!! llevaron el concepto de glamping domo a otro nivel!! Amamos este lugar! desde que lo vimos a lo lejos   no paramos de sonreír! los detalles de decoración, la funcionalidad, la iluminación, la comodidad, lo fresco, el imponente baño en medio de una roca natural hacen de este un lugar inolvidable!!! la coherencia del diseño inspirado en la arcilla es admirable y la visita al taller de arcilla con Hernán donde aprendimos y moldeamos nuestra propia figura nos dejó enamorados de Raquira y orgullosos de Colombia y de nuestros artesanos. Estás palabras no alcanzan a describir la magia que sentimos, le doy a este lugar todas las estrellas del firmamento! gracias por compartir este lugar!

description.summary: Hermosa Domo entre la montaña rodeada de bosque nativo y una vista relajante e inolvidable donde podrás disfruta de la naturaleza que rodea cada uno de los espacios y el mejor clima del país a solo 24 Km de Villa de Leyva. Ubicada en Ráquira, capital artesanal de Colombia donde podrás realizar actividades tales como talleres demostrativos para interactuar y conocer todo el proceso de la arcilla, visitar Almacenes con enorme variedad de artesanías, Patio de Brujas entre otros.

name: La Cueva, eco-house for 4 close to the beaches
title: Las Galeras, Dominican Republic

hosts.about:
Over the past 20 years I have lived in several places with different cultures. I enjoy sharing travel experiences and showing guests the beauty of Las Galeras, and I take great pleasure in knowing I have helped someone experience a wonderful Caribbean vacation.
I am a proud father of a daughter, whom I'm raising to be an independent young woman.
Aside from rentals, I also keep busy with property maintenance and construction.

recent.comments: La Cueva está en una zona de mucha tranquilidad, pero al mismo tiempo cerca de las playas del centro del puebo, excelente lugar. La casa es muy confortable, y permite disfrutar del ambiente tropical. Una gran experiencia!

items.comments: La Cueva está en una zona de mucha tranquilidad, pero al mismo tiempo cerca de las playas del centro del puebo, excelente lugar. La casa es muy confortable, y permite disfrutar del ambiente tropical. Una gran experiencia!

Hans’ place is extremely gorgeous! The photos cannot do justice to how unique and lovely the property. Hans is also a very kind host, who is happy to help with great local recommendations and anything you might need. Would definitely go back here and highly recommend his place!
A very relaxing stay, this Airbnb was very nice. A close walk to beaches and restaurants. Peaceful and quiet location with a nice patio for relaxation.

Hans es un tremendo anfitrión. Sin dudas, volveremos muy pronto a este alojamiento. Nos encantó el servicio de primera que recibimos. Todo estaba impecable y hasta una canasta con frutas nos dejaron de sorpresa. La cueva es sumamente fresca. Si deseas estar en un lugar seguro con mucha privacidad y tranquilidad, esta es tu opción ideal.
Es un lugar precioso! Volvería

Hans is the greatest host you could find in Las Galeras/Las Terrenas area! He is available at anytime for you and knows so many things about the life around.
I highly recommend you to book any place he is managing, you will feel safe and at home with someone that know what service means. When you are far from where you live, trust me, you want this guy and his team among you. My next travels in DR will be in one of his houses for sure. I will be a loyal customer forever! Thanks to you Hans, wish you the best and I hope see you soon!
PS: Hans travelled a lot in his life and have incredible stories to share!

This is a beautiful and unique home very close to great beaches and an easy walk to all the restaurants in downtown Las Galeras. The outdoor veranda is a great place to hang out and the outdoor shower is a highlight. We were there in the hot season right after Hurricane Fiona, so there were definitely mosquitoes due to the standing water around town, but when there was a breeze outside they weren't terrible (combined with liberal use of bug spray). Hans, who is very helpful and accommodating, loaned us a standing fan which helped a ton. For travelers that are used to using credit cards, be aware that most places in Las Galeras do not accept them, so you need pesos at restaurants and shops. There is an ATM in town, but it ran out of money each day (maybe due to people rebuilding from the hurricane). You can also get money off a credit card in the bank which is a great option, but check the hours - they close at 1pm on Friday, so we would have been out of luck for the weekend if Hans hadn't given us a heads-up so we could get there in time. Thanks for a great stay, Hans!

description.summary:
La Cueva is a unique eco-house, built around a rock formation with a spacious cave used as a bathroom.
The spacious house has a zen atmosphere and is surrounded by luscious green. It's conveniently situated in a quiet and safe residential area, close to several gorgeous beaches and the town center.
The 2 bedrooms provide sleeping for 4 people. The kitchen is very functional and directly connects with the living room, while the outdoor terrace invites you to enjoy the outdoor Caribbean lifestyle.
description.access: Guests have access to the entire property.
description.neighborhood: The neighborhood is a quite and safe corner of Las Galeras, close to the main street and to several gorgeous beaches.
description.transit: Beaches and the town center are very close by, so a car is not required. However, a car is recommendable if you want to explore the area.
description.interaction: I am there when guests check in and check out.  Throughout your stay I remain available if you need anything. I respect your privacy but I'm happy to swing by if you need me.

hosts.about:
Jubilado, padre de 6 hijos, abuelo de 12 nietos y 1 biznieta 
77 años y con ganas de seguir dando guerra.

recent.comments: Très beau logement troglodyte. Très bien équipé et situé.

items.comments: Très beau logement troglodyte. Très bien équipé et situé.
Disfruté tanto que me hubiera quedado varios días más.

Una experiencia fantástica. La zona es muy tranquila, solo se escucha el cantar de los pájaros y la brisa. El paisaje que brinda el lugar parece sacado de una postal. A menudo las nubes rodearán la casa y te verás literalmente dentro de ellas. Es difícil elegir entre comer dentro de la cueva junto a la chimenea o en la parte posterior de la casa con la barbacoa y viendo el valle. Recomiendo que al atardecer subas a la punta de arriba de las escaleras, ya que si tienes suerte y no hay muchas nubes,  podrás ver el atardecer como nunca antes. La casa está muy cerca del Roque Nublo y otros parajes naturales. A nuestro perrito también le encantó el lugar. Los anfitriones han sido muy atentos y serviciales, nos solucionaban cualquier duda en cuestión de minutos. Repetiremos sin duda.

We spent 2 weeks in this beautiful setting. The descriptions of the house are just right and we had everything we needed for our entire stay. The kitchen is well equipped for cooking at home and eating on the terrace is a treat - even on chilly evenings. Of course, the cave setting is great fun. The steps down to the property are steep, so be prepared, but so worth the walk down. We took advantage of so many of the nearby trails and got quick accustomed to traveling to Tejeda - about 20 mins away - for anything we needed to buy. Iballa was responsive always responsive about any questions I had and made us feel right at home. This is such a fun and unique property.

Hemos tenido una estancia muy agradable en un entorno único. La casa es muy acogedora, estaba muy limpia, con muchos detalles y la cocina totalmente equipada. Nuestra mascota fue bien recibida. Totalmente recomendable.

el alojamiento estoy aceptable. La barandilla a la casa no era segura, se movía al igual que alguna piedra, lo que hizo la bajada muy difícil con un bebé y una niña de 3 años. 
Las vistas son maravillosas pero el alojamiento estaba  sucio y al solo tener puertas sin mosquiteras, o te entraba la luz o los mosquitos.

Logement atypique et agreable tout proche du roque nublo et autres points de vue, magnifiques de Gran canaria.
Ceci dit, ca se merite :-) La route du centre de Gran Canaria est tres sinueuse et comme le precise Iballa dans ses consignes d'arrivée, il est important de prevoir ses courses avant d'arriver vers Tejeda, car les trajets sont longs... mais beaux. :-)

description.summary: The Pedregal is a lovely cave house located in the Gran Canaria mountains, in the heart of the island. The spectacular set of the property provides you a very close contact with nature in an amazing enviroment especially recommend for countryside lovers.
description.space: The property includes three zones. The kitchen and the dining room are inside a really nice cave provided with a chimney. In this room you will find a table for meals, a sofa and a totally renovated and well equipped kitchen (fridge, microwaves, oven, etc). The second part is a little cave with a good equipped bathroom totally new. And the third area is an independent house with a big double bed, a sofa, and a litera at the top for six people. There is a terrace with superb views  and a old olive tree in the middle.
description.access:
The house is equipped with WIFI, smart tv, a big telescope, books related with trekking and rural routes through the mountains. There are also table games, DVDs and books . There is a safe to store your valuable things during your stay.

To combat the cold we have heating, 3 heaters and a fireplace (ask for firewood availability), also in the house you can find all the bedding so that your nights are warm. Also has air conditioning for hot days.

If you are traveling as a family, we also have a crib with mattress and bedding, a portable high chair and a bathtub. You also have a backpack chair for hiking around the island.
description.notes:
There is a parking in the road. The distance between the parking lot and the house is approximately 50 meters along a path with handrails and stairs. 
It´s not allowed to make a fire, but you have an iron, paella pan, gas barbacue, fireplace and the ceramic hob to make your meals.
The gas barbecue and the gas paella pan must be used outside (if traces of smoke are located anywhere else or inside walls, we will notify Airbnb)
description.neighborhood:
The cave house is in Road GC 60. PK 13. Is a 12 km from Tejeda, included in the official list of the most beautiful villages in Spain. In 2019 it is part of the World Heritage site because it is one of the municipalities that is included in "Risco Caído y Montañas Sagradas de Gran Canaria".
There is a nice lake 11,2 km from our house calle Embalse de las Niñas, especially recommended for taking a bath in summer. A similar distance is to the peak called Picos de las Nieves, the highest one in the island with 1.956 meters, with a wonderful sight of the Teide volcano in Tenerife.
description.transit: The best way to get to the house is by car although there is also a public bus service to the village of Ayacata, the nearest town to the house set only 1 km walking distance. If you come from the airport it will take you around 1 hour to come to The Pedregal villa.
description.interaction: We love our landscape and are very aware on the protection of nature so that we ask our guests to be especially careful with the maintenance of the enviroment of the house.
description.house_rules:
Fire prohibited (Protected Rural Park)
- Pets are allowed as long as they do not climb on beds or armchairs
- The firewood must be purchased before going up to the accommodation (you can contact us for more info)

hosts.about:
Profesor jubilado, 3 hijos, 
5 cosas sin las que no podría vivir: novelas, música, ajedrez, montaña, el mar.
peliculas: Blade runner,  La vita e bella, Last tango in Paris, La Grande Bellezza...
canciones: Strawberry Fields, Killer Queen, Pigs (three differents ones), La Grange, Bella Ciao.

recent.comments: Sehr witzige Anfahrt, extrem freundlicher Gastgeber, himmlische Ruhe, üppige und wunderschöne Vegetation direkt vor und auf dem Haus. Das Haus ist geräumiger als erwartet, hatte mit meinen 2,06m, weder Kopfstoßgefahr noch Platzangst. Die Ausstattung ist spitze, es ist alles da, was man braucht, samt windfestem Strandschirm und Ferngläser zum Sterne schauen!

items.comments: Sehr witzige Anfahrt, extrem freundlicher Gastgeber, himmlische Ruhe, üppige und wunderschöne Vegetation direkt vor und auf dem Haus. Das Haus ist geräumiger als erwartet, hatte mit meinen 2,06m, weder Kopfstoßgefahr noch Platzangst. Die Ausstattung ist spitze, es ist alles da, was man braucht, samt windfestem Strandschirm und Ferngläser zum Sterne schauen!
Very nice, thats what you call calm and quiet!

Wir hatten einen wundervollen Urlaub in der zauberhaften "Höhle". Es war alles da, was man brauchte. Es ist toll eingerichtet, sodass man sich gleich wie zuhause gefühlt hat. Alles war super sauber. Der Ausblick ist wunderschön, man hat absolute Ruhe und kann wunderbar entspannen. Die Anfahrt ist etwas abenteuerlich, aber dank Juan Carlos Wegbeschreibung gut machbar. Die einzigen Besucher, die ab und zu in den schönen Vorgarten kamen, waren eine Katze, ein paar Hasen und die zwei Hunde von Juan Carlos. Juan Carlos ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Wir können einen Aufenthalt hier zu 100% weiterempfehlen und freuen uns darauf, wieder zu kommen.

This is a really fantastic Airbnb and we will definitely be returning!

Juan Carlos was lovely and helpful, and communicated everything really clearly. 

The location is quite remote, so definitely needs a car to get there, but well worth the journey - it’s so peaceful and relaxing here. It’s a great base to explore the island from. 

A truly unique place to stay and a brilliant find!

9 Tage gehen einfach viel zu schnell um. Wären gerne länger geblieben. Die Höhle liegt wunderbar gelegen, weit ab von Lärm und Massentourismus. Ein Mietwagen ist notwendig. Der Weg zur Höhle ist zum Teil sehr abenteuerlich,  man gewöhnt sich aber schnell daran. Der fantastische Ausblick ist es alle Male wert. Die Höhle ist mit allem ausgestattet was man benötigt. Juan ist immer in der Nähe und gibt wertvolle Ausflug Tips. Seine 2 Hunde sind super und bewachen das Grundstück. Zum Frühstück schauen sie gerne mal vorbei und freuen sich über Kuschel Einheiten. 
Wir können die Unterkunft mit bestem Gewissen weiter empfehlen.

We had a very calm and relaxing time in the cave house. The view and the surrounding were just amazing, perfect to calm down, read, hike and cook. The cave was surprisingly big, clean and very well equipped. The contact with Juan Carlos and his wife was very friendly and they very helpful. I’m sure we’re will come back!

We stayed at the Cueva for a whole month and it was the best decison we could make. The apartment is something really special and way more spacious then we expected. It is equipment with everything you need to spent a wonderfull time at Gran Canaria. Juan was a great Host and was always fast to respond to any of our questions. 

Thank you Juan!

description.summary: Hobbit style cave house, in the midlands of Gran Canaria, at the end of a secluded rural road. 70 m2. It has a simple and comfortable decoration, counting all its rooms with large windows. It has a bedroom with two beds (possible folding and baby crib), kitchen, bathroom with shower, and living room with sofa, TV, stereo and acoustic piano. Outside you have a garden-terrace, barbecue, breakfast table and sun beds for sunbathing, or to enjoy the views of the mountains and yhe sea. Own parking.
description.space: The silence and the peaceful tranquility of your nights are incomparable advantages. The interior temperature of the accommodation is pleasant.
description.access: Guests enjoy total privacy on their own terrace.
description.notes: Ideal as a base to visit the island, move to the beaches, make "hiking" routes. Preferred by musicians and bird-wachers.
description.neighborhood: In the natural environment you can contemplate the varied native Canarian flora, and listen to the song of many birds. The views are beautiful, with no buildings or roads nearby.
description.transit: It is necessary to have a rental car. If you ask, the hosts will drive you to the accommodation from the meeting point in the nearby town of La Atalaya and, after that first time, there will be no problem getting anywhere on the island.
description.interaction: The housing of the hosts is close (200 mts.), And they are available to help, or resolve any question or incident.
description.house_rules: Smoking is allowed only in the terrace/garden, outdoors, not inside the house.

location.address: El Roque, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

hosts.about: I do not really know how to write about myself since I'm an art person. It's easier for me to express myself through sculptures or things that I like to do. But I think it was so before I met a person with whom I tied up my life. And my life has changed. It depends a lot on who you meet on your way.  I did not once think that I would speak many languages. But thanks to him our children and I speak in almost five languages. We all travel together and our work is connected with the study of other cultures and their national art. The most interesting is not only to travel and see amazing nature but also to meet interesting people. We are all so different and similar at the same time.

recent.comments:
Una lugar único en un paraje impresionante, sin duda alguna, tras cruzar la primera puerta entras en una dimensión de historia, fantasía, recuerdos, y aprendizaje 
El trato fue maravilloso, las instalaciones mejor aún que en las fotos 
Es fácil llegar siguiendo el Gps, hay un buen aparcamiento y la zona está llena de tranquilidad y vida
Repetiremos sin duda
Gracias!!

Una lugar único en un paraje impresionante, sin duda alguna, tras cruzar la primera puerta entras en una dimensión de historia, fantasía, recuerdos, y aprendizaje
