Chouette week-end au Passage secret.. un monde à découvrir, temps d'échanges enrichissant, nous recommandons la visite !
Endroit atypique, calme, bien placé pour visiter la partie sud ouest de l'île. accueil sympathique de la famille

Het is een zeer bijzondere ervaring.
Deze lieve mensen hebben een zeer feeërieke omgeving geschapen.

Un endroit déroutant, et impressionnant! Empli de magie. Un gite bien aménagé où tout est fait pour se sentir comme chez soi. Nous y sommes resté 2 jours et sommes repartis avec des étoiles pleins les yeux. Merci encore pour votre accueil et gentillesse.

This place is out of this world! The photos absolutely don't do it justice. it's magical, fun, really big and full of surprises! Anganova is really generous with her time and knowledge and the whole family are super friendly, respectful and kind. I can't recommend their place enough. It's also really peaceful, clean and easy to walk to local villages and bus stops.

The apartment was clean, beds were comfortable and we had everything we needed.

My daughter could even play outside as there is some fun stuff available for children. Besides the two kind doggies.

The Secret Passage is a must for anyone interested in the world beyond the visible. A very special experience.

description.summary: Una escapada rural que esconde miles de aventuras.
description.interaction: Hola buenos días! En esto momento tenemos problema con Internet. La compania cambia  las antenas. Disculpa por las molestias. Gracias!

recent.comments: Buen alojamiento para desconectar y descansar. Temperatura perfecta en la casa cueva. Vistas espectaculares.

items.comments: Buen alojamiento para desconectar y descansar. Temperatura perfecta en la casa cueva. Vistas espectaculares.
¡La estancia fue maravillosa! Cuevas Maguadas es un auténtico remanso de paz y Marta la mejor anfitriona.
Sencillamente perfecto. Ideal para desconectar, con unas vistas y una energía maravillosa. Muchas gracias!
Si hay oportunidad repetiremos
Its just an amazing location and the cave is very nicely decorated. The view in the sun was just breathtaking and an honour to be able stay in a place like this.

La casa de Marta es increíble no solo porque es preciosa y cuenta con todo lo necesario para la estancia si no también por las vistas increíbles, la intimidad y la tranquilidad. Marta estuvo muy atenta en todo momento a todas las dudas que pudieran surgir y fue muy amable y atenta, así como Pepe que fue el encargado de hacernos la acogida en la casa. 100% recomendable para todas aquellas personas que quieran desconectar y disfrutar de un espacio tan mágico. Muchas gracias!!
Just perfect for us. Would love to return

description.summary:
Enclavada en el reciente Patrimonio de la Humanidad “Risco Caído y las montañas sagradas de Gran Canaria”, Arai es una casa cueva con buena temperatura interior, se mantiene casi constante entre los 17 y 22ºC. Cálida en invierno y fresca en verano. Increibles vistas a la caldera central de la Isla de Gran Canaria.
HAY WIFI

recent.comments:
Rien à dire négatif sur cette maison originale avec ses chambres troglodytes. Son immense terrasse avec une vue sur la côte (on peut voir jusqu'a las palmas) et le barranco.
La maison est très propre.

items.comments:
Rien à dire négatif sur cette maison originale avec ses chambres troglodytes. Son immense terrasse avec une vue sur la côte (on peut voir jusqu'a las palmas) et le barranco.
La maison est très propre.
Casa perfecta para descubrir la zona norte de Gran Canaria. La terraza/mirador es espectacular, las fotos no le hacen justicia :-)

La maison de Christina est très confortable et en très bon état ( à part la machine à laver, un peu fatiguée, mais elle marche ! ). Un emplacement qui nous a paru exceptionnel, dans un quartier en pleine rénovation (nous avons cependant réussi à nous garer à un peu moins de 100 m de l'appartement) , et un environnement chargé d'histoire.  Si vous vous intéressez à l'histoire des premiers habitants des Canaries, il vous faut passer quelques nuits chez Cristina, visiter le "Cénobio" de Valeron, situé dans la falaise en-dessous, où nous avons rencontré un passionné à l'accueil, et aller voir le "Tagoror", à 2 minutes à pied.
Perfecto! Clean earth house with an *awesome* mountain view. Full 5 stars.

Dit is voor ons de beste en mooist gelegen plaats waar we ooit geweest zijn. 
Alles was aanwezig om het verblijf te laten slagen, en dan krijg je er nog een zalig terras met een adembenemend zicht bovenop.
En slapen in een grot is ook een belevenis.
Hadden we geweten wat we nu weten, waren we er langer gebleven…
Beautiful terrace!

Cristina's place is lovely as was her welcome - all on all a pretty unique experience.  We were unlucky with the weather - a cold wind prevented us from gaining maximum benefit from the terrace - but enjoyed our stay nonetheless.  The area is far from touristy which led to some interesting and fun interactions with the local population but there's enough history and character to retain interest and that's without the trekking and cycling opportunities.  Car parking is at a distance of about 50m but works ok - we had a C3 which could be turned around in the narrow lane without too much bother - anything bigger would need either some fancy reversing or parking about another 30m or so away.  Definitely a go for it sort of place - ideal if that's what you're looking for...

description.space: En el exterior tiene un amplio patio con barbacoa, horno de leña y mobiliario apropiado para poder disfrutar de las preciosas vistas de la zona norte de la isla incluyendo sus playas y barrancos.
description.access: La casa ofrece los siguientes servicios y comodidades: las habitaciones de la vivienda están construidas en piedra volcánica. Tiene tres dormitorios dobles, un baño amplio con lavadora y toallas,  sala de estar con equipo de música, TV con canal satélite, internet y juegos de mesa. La cocina dispone de: horno, microondas, exprimidor, tostadora y todo lo imprescindible. También dispone de: mesa de planchado, mantas, ropa de cama y calefacción.
description.neighborhood: Situada en el municipio de Sª María de Guía en el pueblo de San Juan, la costa del municipio se caracteriza por sus piscinas naturales, y por la Fiesta de las Marías.
description.transit: Hay aparcamiento gratuito cerca de la casa. Además, se encuentra a 20 minutos de la capital grancanaria y 40 minutos desde el aeropuerto.
description.house_rules:
El precio de los alojamientos será por noche ocupada. En el precio se incluye los gastos de agua, electricidad, gas, sábanas y toallas. El alquiler será de un mínimo de 1 noches. 
Todos los usuarios, sin excepción, deben llevar en regla su documentación personal y familiar correspondiente, sea el pasaporte o D.N.I., según la nacionalidad del visitante. 
Las irregularidades y/o deficiencias que el cliente pueda encontrar en la propiedad alquilada deberán ser comunicadas, lo antes posible y siempre durante la estancia, al propietario. Éste solucionará en breve plazo cualquier anomalía o deficiencia e incluso procederá al cambio de la propiedad si así se estimara, siempre que las causas aducidas sean comprobadas como ciertas. Toda reclamación efectuada después de abandonar la propiedad no podrá ser atendida por carecer de los más elementales criterios que pudieran tramitar la reclamación. 
Es responsabilidad del cliente dejar la propiedad en el mismo estado en el que la encontró, respondiendo de todos aquellos daños y menoscabos producidos por la acción negligente. Asimismo, es responsabilidad del cliente ajustarse en todo momento al número exacto de ocupantes con que efectuó la reserva. Bajo ningún concepto aumentará el número de personas máximo reservado; este hecho permitirá al propietario o encargado la ejecución de las medidas pertinentes (cobro supletorio ó desalojo).

name: (K2) Ocean & Mountain Views, Pool, Near Beaches
title: Las Terrenas, Dominican Republic

gallery.caption: Open living room, to dining room, to kitchen.
Master bedroom with a King bed.
Second bedroom with a Single bed. It has it's own private balcony.
Kona is a second floor apartment overlooking the pool.
Pool area with 2 separate areas for lounging and dining.
Stairs leading to the interior cave chamber.
Interior cave quiet and cool for meditation.

hosts.about:
Welcome to MONTE HOME RENTALS PLACIDO and SHIVA'S CAVE YOGA RETREAT CENTER.  We can accommodate up to 24 guests in our 6 homes on our mountain top ocean view gated residence.
Don and Diana Married in 1999 and moved to the Dominican Republic in 2002. Don grew up in Paris, France and Diana on Long Island, New York. We built Monte Placido and the six houses as a family residence. In 2011 we began our rental home business.   Diana enjoys yoga. She organizes yoga retreats in what we call  SHIVAS's CAVE.   When Don is not gardening he goes sailing.   
Come and join us, relax and enjoy!

recent.comments:
Recommendation!!
Monte Placido is truly a Paradise on Earth. We have had the vacation of a lifetime in this incredible location. The flats are located on the top of a small hill, surounded by the most beautiful nature and embedded in a lovely garden with pool and barbecue area. Don and Diana are great hosts and were helpful with recommendations for anything in and around Samana. Monte Placido has enough space to allow for everyone's privacy, on the other hand, meeting Don and Diana as well as the other guests for some drinks by the pool definitely gave us a feeling of community that we enjoyed.
Thank you for the outstanding stay!

items.comments:
Recommendation!!
Monte Placido is truly a Paradise on Earth. We have had the vacation of a lifetime in this incredible location. The flats are located on the top of a small hill, surounded by the most beautiful nature and embedded in a lovely garden with pool and barbecue area. Don and Diana are great hosts and were helpful with recommendations for anything in and around Samana. Monte Placido has enough space to allow for everyone's privacy, on the other hand, meeting Don and Diana as well as the other guests for some drinks by the pool definitely gave us a feeling of community that we enjoyed.
Thank you for the outstanding stay!

Amazing place to stay near Las Terrance. Glad we stayed here instead of a overcrowded resort. The property is so beautiful and the view from the top is breathtaking. Don and Diana were very gracious and informed us about the area and how they created this magical place. We would definitely come back and stay if we are ever in the area again.

Don and Diana’s place is wonderful. Its full of natural beauty and kept in great condition. They are both great hosts and are available for much of the day. 
Things to keep in mind
1. Having a mode of transportation is paramount unless you plan on staying on the property. Its a steep driveway with tight turns so  its best not to bring anything too big.
2. You are very close to nature. Since theres no AC, we had the windows and doors open for much of the time. It gets fairly cool at night, so it wasn’t that big of a deal. But be prepared to deal with a moderate amount of insects and wildlife noise. Some can handle it, some can’t.
 In total, i would 100% book with Don and Diana again. We had a very fun and relaxing time and i wish i could have stayed longer.

The location is perfect.  It is incredibly peaceful and beautiful.  Even a panoramic photo wouldn't do it justice.  Because there are a handful of long term guests, we really felt a sense of community at Monte Placido.  This was important, especially during a pandemic.  Don't hesitate to book this space.

This is our second visit to Monte Placido. This time it was for my wife’s 30th birthday. I’m glad I picked Don and Diana’s place. She loved it! They have everything you need: beautiful pool, views, grill and a massage therapist on site. Be sure to get a car that can climb steep hills. Getting around was very easy. Monte Placido is centrally located with plenty things to do nearby.
Absolutely breath taking views.   Super great hosts helped with a problem with my rental car. If it wouldn't be for Don lending me his car it would have been a terrible weekend.

Our stay was really perfect. The pre-arrival communication was clear and very informative. The location is stunning and accommodation great value. Diana and Don were so helpful, booking restaurants, helping to make the house more comfortable for us and our baby and with their fantastic local knowledge.  Thank you!

description.summary: MONTE PLACIDO is a small boutique residence of 7 homes and a shared infinity pool. Our hilltop offers lush tropical gardens with ocean and mountain views. We are a short drive or nice hike to pristine beaches, and only 12 minutes from Las Terrenas. By combining homes, we can host up to 28 guests. To view all homes available, click “view profile” by our photo. Meditate in our yoga studio, BBQ by the pool, book a massage or a hike the hills. At MONTE PLACIDO you are reserving an experience!
description.space: Villa KONA is a second-floor apartment (has stairs).  Relax on the balcony rocking chairs and enjoy the magnificent view of the ocean and our colorful garden. The kitchen is fully equipped. We are proud to offer fiber optic cable internet service, ideal for working remotely. You can use the flat screen TV to view your streaming accounts like Netflix. Sleep comfortably with both ocean and mountain breeze. Rooms have ceiling fans. Beds are equipped with nets, however with the hilltop breeze there are truly very few mosquitoes.  The Master bedroom holds a king bed. The second bedroom holds one single bed. If requested a child’s cot or baby crib can be added. The price shown is for 2. There is an additional charge for extra guests. Our residence is “GREEN” using solar power, with both city power and a generator for back up! You will not experience any long-term power outages here. Please respect the neighbors and keep the music volume down especially after 10PM.
description.access: MONTE PLACIDO guests have access to the pool and barbecue, also the yoga studio. After a busy day, return to our hilltop paradise and relax in the refreshing infinity pool. A favorite pastime is to hang on the edge where the water cascades and sip on a cool beverage. A pool cabana and two separate lounging, and dining areas offer privacy. Inside the pool, you will find a shallow area for children and a deep area for swimming. SHIVA’S CAVE YOGA STUDIO is on site. Experience this mystical, magical place with interesting rock formations and special energy. The interior cave chamber is perfect for quiet meditation Look out over the ocean and enjoy your own personal workout on the large wooden deck. The studio can also be used for special events such as weddings, dance lessons and seminars. Guests at MONTE PLACIDO have access to a variety of services both on and off site. Our massage room is available for booking. Order a meal through the KOMIDA app. Have groceries conveniently delivered by Supermercado Lindo. We can help you organize activities you will not find through a tour operator like: hiking in the hills just behind MONTE PLACIDO, fishing with a local from our village, private yoga or belly dance lessons, or horseback riding just 5 minutes from us. Guests will also enjoy free membership at the Las Terrenas Beach and Sailing Club.
description.notes: We provide coffee, tea, milk, sugar for your first morning. You will have complimentary salt and pepper, small bottles of oil and vinegar and one 5-gallon bottle of water. More 5-gallon bottles are available for sale on site. PLEASE TAKE DRIVING DIRECTIONS EVEN IS YOU ARE TAKING A TAXI FROM THE AIRPORT. DO NOT ALWAYS DEPEND ON GPS.
description.neighborhood: MONTE PLACIDO is a private residence that overlooks the ocean. We are not a hotel. We are not open to the public. We are gated and safe.  Our little mountain top is always open to the refreshing Atlantic Trade winds thus virtually mosquito fee. We are in pastoral setting close to the typical Dominican village of La Barbacoa. You will discover local culture and meet our charming and friendly neighbors.  There is a Elementary school, and if you feel inclined, they are so very happy to accept donations.
description.transit:
MONTE PLACIDO offers a Shuttle Van Service to Las Terrenas three days a week, on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. Thee van seats 6 adults and needs to be booked with our manager, Jean Claude a day ahead or early the same morning. It will leave Monte Placido promptly at 11:30 am. The drop off is at  Fisherman's Village parking lot (by the painted wall). The van WILL NOT GO FURTHER INTO TOWN. Pick up is from Fisherman's Village parking lot at at 3:30pm. The cost per person is $100 pesos ($2 dollars) each way. Round trip $200 pesos (4 dollars). The van can drop you and pick you up at nearby Playa Carolima or Mosquito Bar at El Portillo along the way. The cost is the same. 

MONTE PLACIDO is served by inexpensive public transport. If you are in good physical shape it is convenient to walk up and down our hill to the main road intersection at Calle Luna. There you will find communal taxis (called a guagua) from dawn to dusk, motorbike taxis (called moto concho) from early morning to late night. Also connect to and from Santo Domingo with timed bus departures.

We can help you arrange rentals of a car, motorbike, scooter, or ATV. There is free parking available within the residence.
description.interaction:
Diana and Don are proud to be AIRBNB “Super Hosts” for the past five years.  We have lived here since 2002 and we are happy to share our knowledge of the area.  We live on site part of the year but make it a point to be hands off and respect our guest’s privacy. The same applies to our staff that is at your service 7 days a week. Our home has a reception area with games, literature about our area, DVD’s so please feel at ease to drop by.

A housekeeper will be come into your home once a week to provide routine maintenance and change linens.  The maid will not wash your dishes or personal clothes. A washing machine is available for your personal items.  A very comprehensive “Guest Book” is in each home with frequently asked questions and information about excursions, shopping, and bus schedules.
description.house_rules:
- We will not tolerate loud music. Music level must be reasonable and turned down after 10 pm. No personal sound speakers and systems allowed.
- No more than 4 guests allowed in this home. Not permitted to bring air mattresses for extra guests.
- Events and parties are for paying guests only, not for people coming from outside the residence. 
-The main gate is locked at dusk. You will have a key. Please lock behind you.
-Delivery people are not allowed on the property. Please meet them at the main gate for pick up.
 - If you use the pool area, please clean up when you are done, turn off the gas barbecue, turn off pool lights.
- No pets in Villa Kona.
- No toleraremos música alta. El nivel de la música debe ser razonable y estar bajado después de las 10 pm. No se permiten altavoces ni sistemas de sonido personales.
 - No se permiten más de 4 invitados en esta casa. No se permite traer colchones de aire para invitados adicionales. 
- Los eventos y fiestas son solo para huéspedes que pagan, no para personas que vienen de fuera de la residencia.
 -La puerta principal se cierra al anochecer. Tendrás una llave. Bloquea detrás de ti. -Las personas de reparto no están permitidas en la propiedad. Reúnase con ellos en la puerta principal para que los recojan.
 - Si usa el área de la piscina, limpie cuando haya terminado, apague la barbacoa de gas, apague las luces de la piscina.
 - No mascotas en Villa Kona.

name: Cave house with ocean views and tranquility.
title: Tijarafe, Spain

gallery.caption: Die gemauerte Dusche im Badezimmer mit einem Dachfenster und einem Panorama-Fenster
Der Eingang vom Wohnzimmer zum Badezimmer
Die gemauerte Dusche mit den Natursteinen der Höhle
Der Weg vom hinteren Garten am Grillplatz vorbei zum Häuschen
Der Parkplatz und der Aufgang zum Häuschen

hosts.about:
Hola, wir sind Linda & Marc.

Das Reisen hat uns nach La Palma geführt um hier zu merken, dass dies ein magischer Ort zum Verweilen ist. Die Natur, das Wandern, das Klima und die Herzlichkeit der Palmeros haben es uns angetan.

recent.comments:
Hemos tenido una estancia tan BONITA como la propia isla. 
La casa-cueva ha cumplido todas nuestras expectativas. Entorno PRECIOSO y extremadamente acogedor. 
Marc&Linda, anfitriones excelentes!
Muchísimas gracias por vuestra amabilidad, por la limpieza y cuidado de todas las instalaciones.
Recomendable 100%.

items.comments:
Hemos tenido una estancia tan BONITA como la propia isla. 
La casa-cueva ha cumplido todas nuestras expectativas. Entorno PRECIOSO y extremadamente acogedor. 
Marc&Linda, anfitriones excelentes!
Muchísimas gracias por vuestra amabilidad, por la limpieza y cuidado de todas las instalaciones.
Recomendable 100%.

Eine wirklich außergewöhnliche Unterkunft mit einer Felswand, die sich quer durch das Häuschen vom Bad bis in das Schlafzimmer zieht, und in der wir uns unglaublich wohl gefühlt haben. Auf eine sehr angenehme Art schlicht, aber hochwertig eingerichtet. Die Ausstattung ist sehr stimmig und durchdacht, uns fehlte es an nichts. Der wunderbare angelegte Garten, der in einer kleinen Hütte befindliche (zusätzliche) Koch- und Grillbereich, die Hängematten, die Ruhe, der Blick in die Weite auf die Umgebung und vor allem das Meer lädt zum Verweilen ein. Wir sind ansonsten recht umtriebig, hier wollten wir aber auch einfach mal ganze Tage an dem Häuschen verbringen, Nichtstun und entspannen. Der Kontakt zu Linda war super und unkompliziert. Wir wollen auf jeden Fall wiederkommen, das nächste Mal aber länger ;-)
Es ist eine außergewöhnliche Finca, mit einem wunderschönen Garten, sehr ruhig gelegen. Hat uns sehr gut gefallen.
Lovely ‘cave’ cottage in a beautiful garden. The terrace has a lot of privacy and perfect views. There is also a very nice outdoor kitchen. A couple of restaurant within a 10-15 minute drive.

Abends sehr ruhig gelegen tagsüber Mo bis Fr von 8 bis 18 Uhr ein Bagger und Pressluftbohrer sehr störend (weit weg, trotzdem laut - da sonst sehr ruhig) . Im Blickfeld von der Terrasse aufs Meer ein grosses Betonwasserreservoir und eine Stromleitung. Toller Sternenhimmel (Feldstecher mitnehmen),  wunderschöner sehr gepflegter Garten, Küche sehr klein wie auch WC und Dusche aber funktionell, Toaster vorhanden,
We really enjoyed our stay in this charming place. We strongly recommend. Great communication with Linda and Marc; we felt warmly welcomed

Die Unterkunft von Linda& Marc war ein Traum! Ich wünschte ich wäre dort länger geblieben. Habe mich sehr in die kleine Höhle verliebt und würde gern wieder kommen. Auch die Kommunikation mit Marc lief super! Vielen Dank.

description.summary:
This charming small cave house with great ocean views and sunsets, Cueva Magica,  is for people seeking peace, tranquility and simplicity.  Fine location in the area El Jesus.
A lovely spot on the island. Centrally located on the west coast and an ideal vacation spot for hiking tours. Only 20 minutes by car to the sandy beach of Tazacorte.
description.space:
Natural cave with extension to a little house. The cottage is small and cosy and you have everything you need.
Cueva Mágica is located on a terrace, so it is easy to be outside where you find fruit trees and cactus gardens.
1 bedroom in the cave part with a double bed (1,60 by 2,00m) , very nice living room with a high ceiling  and light. Small kitchen with a view of the ocean. Separate shower and toilet inside. 
In front of this little house is a nice terrace with outstanding ocean views and sunsets.
A BBQ place where you can cook outside is located just next to the cottage.
Outside shower.  Lounge chairs. Hammocks.
An idyllic vacation spot.
description.access:
You have access to the entire house and surrounding area. There is a covered BBQ area.
Lots of privacy.
description.notes:
There are lounge chairs.
You cook inside on a 2-burner stove and there is a lovely covered BBQ place outside also with a 2-burner.
The path to reach the cavehouse that is not suitable for people with walking difficulties.
description.neighborhood:
The nature in this lovely setting is amazing. The immediate vicinity of the Cueva is quiet and you can enjoy stunning ocean views and sunsets. Many walks in the immediate area, but also a good starting point for hikes in the rugged north and at the same time not far  (15 minutes) from the little cute seaside village Tazacorte.
Shops nearby  (5 minutes).
description.transit:
There is public transport with a bus stop roughly one kilometer up the steep road, but we always  recommended to hire a rental car directly at the airport.
There is good parking directly at the cottage.
description.interaction: We will welcome you personally and if there are any questions, don't hesitate to contact us.
description.house_rules: Bei Abreise: Den MÜLL entsorgen und das GESCHIRR bitte spülen.

gallery.caption: Banheira Sala de Banho Suite Nascer

hosts.about: Me chamo Marilidia, moro na Chapada Diamantina a mais de vinte anos. Quero compartilhar tudo que vivi e experienciei aqui com você!

recent.comments: A casa é uma delícia, bonita e agradável de estar. Marilidia foi atenciosa e flexível. A única observação que faria é com relação ao Wi-Fi, que nunca funciona. Como o sinal na região é precário, ficávamos praticamente incomunicáveis enquanto na casa. Um modem de maior alcance resolveria o problema. Tirando isso, foi tudo perfeito.

items.comments: A casa é uma delícia, bonita e agradável de estar. Marilidia foi atenciosa e flexível. A única observação que faria é com relação ao Wi-Fi, que nunca funciona. Como o sinal na região é precário, ficávamos praticamente incomunicáveis enquanto na casa. Um modem de maior alcance resolveria o problema. Tirando isso, foi tudo perfeito.

A casa de Marilidia é encantadora e ainda mais bonita pessoalmente (a vista então, nem se fala!). É um lugar acolhedor e, como fica um pouco afastado da vila, tivemos muita privacidade. 

A casa é bem equipada, principalmente a cozinha. Nosso cachorro adorou o grande jardim e a casa tem uma horta. 

Vale destacar que Marilidia foi muito gentil e atenciosa, mesmo estando em viagem com a família. 

Se você busca um lugar para ficar em paz, esse é o lugar ideal! Definitivamente voltaremos.
Casa bastante acolhedora e com energia bem legal.
Experiência incrível de ficar hospedada no meio das pedras da Chapada Diamantina! Cada detalhe da casa é um charme, nos sentimos muito bem lá!
Casa acolhedora assim como os anfitriões. Toda a experiência foi inesquecível! Obrigado Marilidia e Lúcio por terem nos doado tanto conhecimento e amor!
O espaço é mágico, a estadia foi incrível! A comunicação com Marilidia foi super tranquila, correu tudo perfeitamente bem! Esperamos voltar!
Lindo o lugar, mágico!

description.summary: The House "Alto das Estrelas" is a calm place for those who want to enjoy nature retreat. Located in the Village of Igatu in a comfortable and charmplace, the house offers several spaces, gardens and the exclusivity of being integrated on the rocks.
description.space:
Our house offers a peaceful retreat to enjoy nature, living in total integration with the environment .In a comfortable atmosphere of coziness of the family environment , you can experience the tranquility and simplicity of life in Bahia .
Our house can accommodate up to 6 people in a comfortable stay , with several accommodation options in shared and private rooms specially located under rocks ( caves ) of Chapada Diamantina. We have cellular connection (claro) , internet WI - FI and TV. Hot shower with Mineral Water, ôfuro , TV room , parking in the Village , backyard with fruit trees and large green area, lawn and Gardenshower . Within the picturesque village of Igatu Xique Xique, the house offers all the comfort and warmth to the daily practices of meditation and Yoga. Our environment promotes well-being and connection with the present. Located in the Chapada Diamantina National Park, the Village of Igatu Xique Xique, offers tours and trails to incredible places, with waterfalls, caves and the whole culture of diamond mining in the region. The house offers telephone, internet and cable TV. Come and enjoy a meeting between you and the exuberant nature of the Chapada Diamantina.
description.access: Our hotel guests are invited to integrate our space, having access to all areas of the house.
description.notes: The house offers several external and internal environments. We opened the home to friendly people who have affinity with the proposed self-knowing, who like the particular nature of the Chapada Diamantina, who appreciate the arts, the beauty and simplicity of a community of 400 inhabitants of prospecting origin.
description.neighborhood:
The Casa Alto das Estrelas is located at the top of Igatu Village, a small historical village of just over 370 inhabitants, located in Andaraí, in the Chapada Diamantina National Park. Living museum of panning, Igatu has a set of ruins of gold mining houses made of stones and listed by national heritage. Has several attractions such as rivers, waterfalls and lookouts, and a great potential to practice climbing and mountaineering. Cultural tourism is also a highlight for anyone visiting the small village points. Igatu has good hotels and restaurants for comfort food, and traditional bars. 

(URL HIDDEN)
description.transit:
Getting to Andaraí coming from Salvador :

We do transfer Andaraí - Igatu

Car : Exit Salvador through BR- 324 , cross Feira de Santana (115 km ) and follow the BR- 116 South to the " Tour Paraguassu " (35 km ) , junction with Br -242 (via St. Stephen - BA ) . In Br -242 Brasilia direction is approx . 110 km to 90 km and more Itaberaba until the junction for Andaraí . Hence there are 50 km to the History Center .

Aircraft : Via Company Trip Linhas Aéreas from the airport of Salvador Thursdays and Sundays and arriving at the airport Chapada ( LEC ) . To return to Salvador consider flying in the same day . Check flights in (URL HIDDEN) . The airport is 80 km from Andaraí and this transfer can be scheduled with us.

By Bus : The following schedule options with the White Water Company .

See : (URL HIDDEN) :

Salvador - Itaberaba | Itaberaba - Andarai - Saida daily 8:00 bus from Salvador and arrival to 16:00 .

Salvador - Itaberaba | Itaberaba - Andarai - Drive on Mondays, Fridays and Sundays at 21:15 Road Salvador and expected arrival at 3:30 .

Andarai - Itaberaba | Itaberaba - Salvador - Saida the daily and 5:10 to 15:00 arrival at the bus station in Salvador .

Andarai - Itaberaba | Itaberaba - Salvador
description.interaction: We can be present at the listing during our Guests stay. Situated in the National Park of Chapada Diamantina, Igatu, offers tours and trails to amazing places, baths in waterfalls, caves and the whole culture of the region. Going from this historic setting you can venture out in the most coveted attractions Chapada Diamantina National Park. You will visit places like the Pati Valley, Blue Lagoon, Enchanted Well, Pai Inácio, Buracão Waterfall, Waterfall Ramalho, Cachoeira Encantada, Pantanal Marimbus, Village Igatu, among other great places, featuring a tabbed structure prepared and a Land Rover, which follow only one script: your destination.
description.house_rules:
Delicadeza, que ao acaso, fume nas áreas externas propriedade. 
Preservamos um ambiente livre de produtos tóxicos.
Entretanto, apreciamos os bons vinhos nas noites da Chapada. Solicitamos um comportamento discreto, visto que estamos em uma área com rochas e penhascos. Não escavar, retirar, pedras, arrancar flores, folhas ou galhos.  Preservamos intacto nosso ecossistema. Favor não pendurar roupas nas plantas. Para secar roupas ou toalhas use o varal ou a lavanderia.

Nossos hóspedes são únicos, para proporcionar um melhor atendimento, exclusivo. A Casa Alto das Estrelas está a vossa disposição, com os proprietários servido.

Não somos pousada e nosso conceito é baseado em dois princípios, hospitalidade familiar e privacidade. Somos uma casa que hospeda e prepara por encomenda uma alimentação saudável com carinho e atenção necessárias para promover aos hóspedes uma vivência positiva na sua estadia.

Nossa política de hospedagem é simples: hospedamos e compartilhamos nossa casa aos amigos que apreciam a privacidade e o silêncio da natureza.
Crianças até 6 anos é cortesia.
Crianças de 7 anos aos 12 anos pagam meia diária.
É obrigatória pagamento de taxa de limpeza para contratação de uma diarista de nossa confiança, ela conhece todas as nuances da casa.

hosts.about:
Soy jubilado bancario. Estas Cuevas siempre han pertenecido a mi familia. Durante años hemos rehabilitado Las Cuevas y las hemos disfrutado como segunda vivienda durante los fines de semanas y periodos vacacionales. 
Actualmente mi hobby es seguir repoblando la finca con plantas y árboles canarios, así como cultivar plantas medicinales y de uso gastronómico.

recent.comments: Such a special spot, a beautiful place to call home for a short stay, and wonderful amenities all accurately shown as described, host is extremely responsive and communicative and provided local information and instructions as needed -- 100% would stay again! Thank you so much.

Wow!  The cave is the most wonderfully, fun and unique place to stay.  Located in stunning surroundings with animals to feed and fruit to pick  it provides the perfect base for a relaxing, get away from it all holiday.  We were very impressed with the quality of the furniture and equipment and the attention to detail throughout the cave, plus there were a few little extras that really added to our stay.  Slippers and dressing gowns were provided, for example,  a coffee machine and plenty of blankets.   Luis was the perfect host.  He was so friendly and welcoming.   We didn’t have a car so Luis checked each day that we had everything we needed and organised taxis for us for day trips.  One of our favourite places ever … Thank you Luis.
Luis was AMAZING!! We recommend this place as it is huge and beautiful! Everything was perfect and the peacocks were just stunning, they came to the place every morning!

Nous étions une famille de 9 personnes 
Logement atypique très grand et bien conçu des abords magnifiquement fleuris plantes méridionales 
tout était parfait et le propriétaire très abordable 
personne ne se gênait dans le logement suffisamment de chambres et salles de bains et des jeux pour nos grands ados billard jeux divers spa très apprécié 
nous avons passé un très bon séjour sous le soleil 
avec nos voitures nous avons circulé dans l'ile et passé de bons moments 
un grand merci à LUIS

Nous avons été  enchantés par notre séjour . 
Tout était parfait et agréable . Le logement est dans un cadre paradisiaque, tout est tres confortable . 
Luis est un hôte adorable . 
Merci beaucoup !

It’s a little drive up to magic. 
Greeted by peacocks (I was in heaven) They came to be fed twice a day, it was wonderful to experience.
This is a cave ….. IT IS 
HUGE, only 2 of us I got lost a few times. 
Kitchen so well equipped,  and so clean, plenty of utensils pots pans etc., also bbq outside to enjoy too. 
The ‘cave’…. Every man  who hankers after a man 
cave it’s your dream, pool table, table tennis, beer pumps, & exceptional wifi TV. Netflix  HDMI …it’s got it all. 
Beds are comfy & the shower(s) were wonderful 
hot & powerful. No expense has been spared on this ‘cave’, very impressed with all.
It’s a cave so a little damp feeling initially, but Luis 
has installed loads of heaters and dehumidifiers to accommodate this, to make his guests feel welcomed & happy. 
Washing machine and dryer was a great bonus, as was the lovely bottle of wine & beers he kindly provided. 
Outside:
A beautiful hot tub, it was so tranquil & perfectly situated for our lazy afternoons.  
The gardens are gorgeous with indigenous planting and year round interest (we picked some Lemons to go with our seafood & they were off the scale juicy). There’s orange trees, rosemary bushes, and much more depending on the season. 
Walked around the gardens as they were a true joy. 
Luis goats are on the land below the top fence, he trusted us to feed them, and it was the best experience. They loved a good scratch and we were happy to oblige. 
This isn’t your usual run of the mill ‘stay’ this is special and not to be missed.
I really want to come back to this piece of paradise & Luis is a great host ❤️
Lugar perfecto para desconectar con familia y amigos. Las cuevas preciosas y muy bien cuidado con todo detalle. Luis de muy fácil trato y muy atento.

description.summary: Turismo Rural, Casa Cueva situada en el centro de una finca de 27.000 m/2 repoblada con flora de la Laurisilva Canaria, árboles frutales, plantas ornamentales,  pavos reales, corral con ovejas pelibuey y un pequeño invernadero. Está ubicada dentro del Parque Rural de Doramas, con vistas al mar y a la montaña. Ideal para practicar senderismo.
description.space:
Las Cuevas de Barreto cuenta con las siguientes instalaciones, accediendo desde un pasillo principal de unos 25 m. de profundidad y una campana interior para iluminación y ventilación, dispone de:

COCINAS:

COCINA GRANDE. Vitrocerámica de 4 fuegos, horno, microondas, cafetera eléctrica, lavavajillas,calentador de agua, batidora, tostadora. Una mesa grande de mosaico, banco de madera y sillas. De la terraza exterior se entra directamente a la cocina a través de una doble puerta.

COCINA PEQUEÑA. Placa de inducción de 4 fuegos, microondas, mesa abatible con 5 taburetes. También tiene acceso directo al exterior.

SALONES - COMEDORES

SALÓN-COMEDOR PRINCIPAL con mesa larga y sillas de madera, un sillón de dos plazas, TV satélite de pantalla plana, nevera, armario de madera. Del salón-comedor se pasa al Mini-Bar con nevera para refrescos, decoración con antiguedades, banco de mampostería. El Mini-Bar lleva a un patio interior de forma redonda con una gran claraboya en el techo que da claridad y ventilación a la cueva, dispone de una mesa con 4 sillas tipo terraza.

SEGUNDO SALÓN. Un salón acogedor en la zona de los dormitorios, con banco largo de mampostería y cojines, sofá de 3 plazas, 2 sillones, mesa y TV satélite de pantalla plana con MOVISTAR + . Hay un rincón con una mesa y silla, equipo de música con Bluetooth.

TERCER SALÓN. Delante del dormitorio 5 con un sofá-cama de 2 personas, mesa.


DORMITORIOS

Las cuevas disponen de 6 DORMITORIOS:

DORMITORIO 1, con dos camas individuales de 90x200 cm, calefactor, deshumidificador, armario de mampostería sin puertas, espejo grande.

DORMITORIO 2, con dos camas individuales de 90 x 200 cm, calefactor, deshumidificador, armario de mampostería sin puertas, espejo grande.

DORMITORIO 3, con dos camas individuales de 90 x 200 cm, espejo, perchero móvil, calefactor, deshumidificador.

DORMITORIO 4, cama doble de mampostería 160 x 200 cm, ropero empotrado sin puertas, espejo. calefactor y deshumidificador.

DORMITORIO 5, con 2 camas individuales de 90 x 200 cm, armario de mampostería sin puertas, espejo, calefactor y deshumidificador.

DORMITORIO 6, con 2 camas individuales de 90 x200 cm, perchero móvil, espejo, calefactor, deshumidificador.

BAÑOS

Hay 5 baños (dormitorio 1 y 2 comparten un baño), todos con ducha, inodoro y un lavabo con espejo (el baño del dormitorio 1 se puede acceder desde la terraza y es el único que es accesible para personas en silla de ruedas). También tenemos 1 aseo exterior.

EXTERIOR - TERRAZA

Gran terraza con banco largo de mampostería para 10 personas bajo una pérgola de madera, cojines, una mesa larga y sillas. Toldo y lona protectora entre la pérgola y la entrada a la Cueva,  barbacoa de carbón.

ADMITE MASCOTAS No.

Aparcamiento Si, para 20/30 coches.

ACCESIBLE Es accesible para silla de ruedas, pero no esta adaptada.

OTROS EQUIPAMIENTOS

Wifi gratis en toda La Cueva (9 redes), deshumidificadores y calefactores, un cuarto de lavadora y secadora. Secador de pelo, plancha y tabla para planchar, cuna y trona a petición (gratis).
SALA DE JUEGOS: con 1 mesa y 4 sillas, 1 sofá de 3 plazas, una mesa de billar/ping pong, acceso directo desde la terraza y desde la cocina.
description.access: El alquiler es íntegro, pueden acceder a todas las zonas tanto interiores como exteriores
description.notes: Firgas: "Casa cueva Barreto", agradable, confortable. barbacoa. Privado: terreno 27'000 m2, terreno con árboles frutales, aparcamiento junto a la casa. Campo de golf 12 km. Atracciones en los alrededores: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria 13 km, Puerto Rico 37 km, Campo de Golf Bandama 12 km, Parque Arqueológico Cueva Pintada 12 km, Playa las Canteras 17 km.
description.neighborhood:
La Finca donde se encuentran Las Cuevas pertenece al municipio de Firgas y está dentro del Parque Rural de Doramas que es un paisaje protegido situado al norte de Gran Canaria (Islas Canarias, España). Ocupa parte de los municipios de Santa Mª de Guía, Moya, Firgas, Valleseco, Arucas y Teror. Parte de esta zona era conocida antiguamente como la Selva de Doramas, en referencia al guerrero Doramas. A pesar de que la zona está afectada por la actividad agrícola, todavía conserva espacios naturales bien preservados como el Barranco de los Tilos, Azuaje y Barranco Oscuro. En ellos se pueden encontrar algunos de los últimos relictos de la laurisilva en Gran Canaria y dentro de la finca de Cuevas de Barreto, pueden encontrar muchas de las plantas y árboles que formaban esos bosques.
La Villa de Firgas es un lugar donde el paisaje y la naturaleza te cautivan, donde la historia y las tradiciones permanecen en su pueblo y sus gentes, donde se disfruta de su exquisita gastronomía. Un lugar de sensaciones, que cuando las descubres te enamoras.

Wir haben unseren Kurzurlaub in der Höhle sehr genossen. Sie ist warm und gemütlich und war uns auch bei wechselhaften Wetter ein perfekter Zufluchtsort. Die Hängematte mit Blick aufs Meer ist bei Sonne natürlich ein besonderes Highlight. Mit der Außenküche kamen wir super zurecht. Von der Unterkunft aus lassen sich für Wander-affine zwei Strände und kleinere Dörfer gut erkunden. Wir waren ohne Auto da und kamen mit den Bussen gut zurecht und der Hilfe von Thomas. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder und empfehlen die Höhle wärmstens!

description.summary:
In unserer schönen Studio-Höhle mit Vorbau befindet man sich im wilden Nordwesten der Insel La Palma. 

Die Unterkunft ist einfach gehalten und mit der simplen Außenküche wie gemacht für Naturfans. Das WC mit Dusche ist im Haupthaus, ca. 15 m entfernt. Nachts ist der Weg beleuchtet.

Auf dem Gelände gibt es drei Wohneinheiten, wobei diese Höhle die abgeschiedenste ist. Zur Höhle führen 10 Stufen ohne Geländer.

Thomas & Pudel-Mix-Hundedame Tiffy sind, wenn ich nicht vor Ort bin, eure Gastgeber.
description.space:
Die Höhle wurde vor ca. 70 Jahren im typischen kanarischen Stil erbaut. Sie hat ein 1.40m Doppelbett, einen Rattan-Esstisch mit 2 Stühlen und eine Garderobe zum Verstauen eurer Sachen.

Strom und Internet sind in der Höhle vorhanden. Bei Schlechtwetter schwankt der Empfang in der Gegen leider etwas. Der Kühlschrank steht ebenfalls witterungsgeschützt in Höhle, wird nachts per Zeitschaltuhr abgeschaltet. 

Es gibt eine einfache Außenküche mit Gas-Kocher (Camping-Style) und einer DIY-Spüle mit Kalt-Wasseranschluss (kein Trinkwasser). Alle zusätzliche Ausstattung wie Toaster, Kaffeekocher etc. könnt ihr gern auf Anfrage erhalten. Den Ofen im Haupthaus dürft ihr auf Anfrage auch gern nutzen. 

Dazu teilt ihr ein kleines Bad mit Dusche & WC und Warmwasser mit den restlichen Bewohnern. Das Bad ist ca. 15m von der Höhle entfernt und über die erwähnten 10 Stufen zu erreichen. Der Weg wird bei Dunkelheit mit Bewegungsmeldern beleuchtet.

Unsere Waschmaschine kann auf Anfrage mitbenutzt werden.
description.access:
An dem Eingangsbereich, neben der Auffahrt, entsteht gerade die neue Außenküche, die später allen Gästen als Gemeinschatfsraum zur Verfügung stehen wird. 

Hier geht es eine kleine Rampe hinauf, vorbei an der Höhle von Thomas & Tiffy, die auch hier wohnen und vorbei an dem Haupthaus, in dem ich mit Familie wohne, wenn wir auf der Insel sind. Dort ist auch das WC mit Dusche, das von außen begehbar ist.

Euer Studio ist am äußersten Part des Hangs gelegen, sodass ihr in eurer Unterkunft ungestört seid. Einen separaten Eingang zum Studio, ohne dass ihr an den anderen Gebäuden entlang geht, gibt es nicht.
description.notes:
An der neuen Außenküche, die am Eingang des Grundstücks liegt, wird gerade gebaut. Dadurch kann es tagsüber ab 10 Uhr zu Baustellen-Geräuschen kommen. Wir nehmen immer Rücksicht auf unsere Gäste und arbeiten nur bis 16 Uhr.

Die LP114 mit Bushaltestelle ist direkt vor der Tür - wird aber wenig befahren.

Ihr seid meistens nicht allein auf dem Grundstück, wenn ihr als absolute Ruhe Abgeschiedenheit sucht, wäre dies nicht der richtige Ort.
description.neighborhood:
Unser Haus liegt in der Nähe der Stadt Santo Domingo, buchstäblich am Ende der Insel. Hier ist es sehr "tranquillo" und naturnah mit einem wunderschönen Sonnenuntergang jeden Tag.

Das Klima auf 330m Höhe ist im Winter mild und durch die Nähe zum Norden im Sommer nicht zu heiß. 

Rund herum könnt ihr in alle Richtungen wandern: entweder zu den Hippiedörfern in den Bergen oder zu den erstaunlichen Steilklippen, wo die Einheimischen ihre Wochenendhöhlen haben.

Der nächste Strand ist 30 Minuten steil bergab zu Fuß erreichbar. Und zumindest laut meiner Mutter nicht ganz schwindelfrei. :)

Der nächste kleine Supermarkt ist in 6 Minuten mit dem Auto zu erreichen.

Zum Flughafen und Hafen in Santa Cruz sind es ca. 90 Minuten je nach Fahrstil.
Ein Mietauto ist sehr zu empfehlen.

ACHTUNG: Im gesamten Nordosten der Insel gibt es bei Regenwetter kleine schwarze Regen-Würmer, die aus dem feuchten Erdreich kommen. Zu dieser Zeit sollte die Tür zum Studio tagsüber geschlossen bleiben.
description.transit:
Man sollte sich eher ein Auto mieten um die Gegend zu erkunden.

Zur Not geht es aber auch mit dem Bus, der 10 Min von dem Haus entfernt eine Haltestelle hat und jede Stunde fährt.

Samuel was always quick to respond and very helpful. We especially enjoyed all the hikes we did around the area and the friendly locals we encountered.

nochmals vielen Dank an Guaci!

The house itself is gorgeous, very clean and with the comfiest bed. It has easily the best views on the island! We loved sitting out on the porch surrounded by nature and greenery. Truly a magical place and the pictures don’t do it justice!! 
Would definitely love to come back in the future and will recommend to our friends.

description.summary: Would you like to enjoy nature and sleep in a Canarian cave house? This is your site! Our beautiful Canarian cave house is newly renovated. Located in Valsequillo, with mountain views, perfect for enjoying a few days of total disconnection with nature, hiking... and much more. You will have a bedroom, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom and the outdoor area with a table, chairs and more! We are here for whatever you need
description.space: Welcome to our beautiful Canarian cave house located in a quiet area of Valsequillo, the perfect place to disconnect and be in contact with nature. The house is newly renovated and consists of a bedroom with a double bed, perfect for couples; a kitchen equipped with the necessary to prepare and eat your delicious meals; a living room with a TV, a seating area and a bunk bed in case you need more space to sleep; a bathroom with shower; and a beautiful outdoor area where you can eat with views of the mountains, play ping pong or enjoy our beautiful weather. The house has a total occupancy of 4 people. The entire property has WIFI. You can use our washing machine if you wish. We provide bed linen and towels free of charge.

Perfecto para realizar deportes al aire libre como correr, bicicleta de montaña,  rutas a caballo , rutas de senderismo, observar plantas y flores, disfrutar de los sabores auténticos (miel, queso, vino, fresas...) de nuestros campesinos, disfrutar de nuestras tradiciones canarias vivas y conocer un poquito más sobre nuestra historia.

No se permite hacer fuego ni barbacoas.
No se puede poner musica muy alta y despues de las 20 h debera estar apagada.

hosts.about: I do not really know how to write about myself since I'm an art person. It's easier for me to express myself through sculptures or things that I like to do. But I think it was so before I met a person with whom I tied up my life. And my life has changed. It depends a lot on who you meet on your way.  I did not once think that I would speak many languages. But thanks to him our children and I speak in almost five languages. We all travel together and our work is connected with the study of other cultures and their national art. The most interesting is not only to travel and see amazing nature but also to meet interesting people. We are all so different and similar at the same time.

description.summary:
-- This place is  a Thematic park. there are many caves, a garden, a pool, a barbecue area. pinpong, pool and trampoline. There are several houses in the area. This is a historical place with rock engravings and a great history of the Canary Islands. This is an old Canarian house that is over 200 years old. 
 in this house there are four rooms or three apartments each with a mezzanine and with a small kitchen they have a shower and a toilet. each apartment has a separate exit and separate keys.
description.space:
This place is very different from the tourist areas by its tranquility and proximity to the mountain ,nature of Tenerife. This house has syzons. from November to May this time of year this house is good for a group of people who like to walk on the mountains or for paragliding people.it is also possible for cyclists activity. from June to October is just for leisure .
 The garden and the caves are decorated with sculptures in the style of Canarian legends. the caves are guarded by dragons. A great place for a large family or for a large group of people. especially for those who love hiking in the mountains. groups of artists or meditation.  On the Territory will be other customers. the owners also live on the same place.
 big cave open after three in the afternoon from september. In summer its open.

description.notes:
There's nothing better than a client report
"if you  don't like those big, annonymous hotels down the beach, but you are looking for something special and personal, this is it! A wonderful place, a bit higher up the mountains. The lady of the house is a great artist and her paintings and sculptures bring this house to life. A tour around the property can easily take 2 hours because of all the stories behind her work. This house has some amazing features: a large cave system where you can play table tennis and snooker, watch a movie or have a small party. There are smaller caves where you can sleep overnight. A small supermarket and a restaurant is nearby. The studio that we occupied is simple but funtional with a good bed, a small kitchen, toilet and shower. Open the front door and you have an amazing view in front of you. We really enjoyed eating breakfast at the picknick table just outside our studio. El Roque is a great starting place for long walks over the mountains and into the canyons. The daugther of the house owners guided us up the mountain in front of the house, which gives a spectacular view over the area. Although there is a bus stop in El Roque, a rental car is highly recommended to reach this place. But you definitely want to drive over some of these amazing roads, especially up to the vulcano and to the other side. The views change rapidly and there are many places where you can park the car, walk and take pictures. We stayed here in the end of March and it can be a bit chilly. In general, the weather was great for walking and sight seeing, but bring something warm to wear. The owners were more than friendly, willing to help you in any way they can. They are very international and speak several languages and even their dog has a warm heart. We felt at home during the whole stay and recommend this place to everybody who wants to enjoy the nature of Tenerife. We will definitely come back!"
description.neighborhood:
Welcome to  El Roquito! If you want to live quiet and away from the masses with the mountain nature and feel the history of Tenerife, or simply experiment life in an unusual place, then El Roquito is the right place to stay.

The house is inside a domain of 10,000 sq. Meters located in the mountains at an altitude of 650 meters, in the south of Tenerife. Our domain reveals a lot of encarvings
on the rocks of our mountain, you can visit grottes, walk aroung and climp the El Roque mountain nearby. Here is also a paradise for cycling and paragliding and simply for nature lovers.
The house is full of Paintings, sculptures, decorations related to the history and to tge style of life of the Canary Islands.

This is an ecological house that is more than 200 years old, equipped with solar energy, a rainwater storage system, an ecological garden together with a green house, a swimming pool, billiards, ping-pong and barbecue and more.

The barely rookito is 15 km from the beach in a small Canarian village, where there is a small supermarket and restaurants. Nearby in 5 kilometers there are two towns where you can find everything you need; Large supermarkets, many cafes, pizzerias, restaurants, banks and all kinds of shops.

Come alone or with friends we will be happy to give you a warm welcome
description.transit: There is an opportunity to use the bus but its 1 kilometre away from the house. The best option is to rent a car .You can rent it in the airport ahead of time , or there are others places on the island
description.interaction:
since this is a historical place and the design of this place is performed in the style of legends and the history of the Canary Islands upon your arrival you will be offered a visit throughout the territory.  where you will be told about all the legends that were made in sculptures.  it is really a very unusual place. visiting time is an hour and a half. We will always be here when the guests will need our help
 We will be happy to give you a warm welcome!!!
description.house_rules:
Le pedimos que deje todo limpio y saque la basura. Si quiere hacer ruido.  Pueden hacerlo en la cueva.
También  es posible fumar pero no en interiores.Este es un lugar de arte y le pedimos que tenga cuidado y preste atancion a todo.  puede celebrar y hacer cumpleaños con respecto a este citio y la jente .

recent.comments:
Nachts hatten wir meistens kein Strom.
Das Leitungswasser stank nach Schwefel.
Da ist nix los & sowas von am A.. der Welt.
Draußen sind überall Eidechsen ,Kaninchen und andere Tiere.
Die Unterkunft ist eine Höhle und keine richtige ,,ordentliche“ Wohnung!
Zusammenfassend müssen wir sagen:
! Mietet die Unterkunft nicht !

damit sie nicht immer ausgebucht ist,denn wir würden wahnsinnig gerne noch mal wiederkommen, denn das war der beste Urlaub, die Allergeilste Unterkunft und die nettesten Gastgeber die wir je hatten !!!

Natur pur, Sternenhimmel, ruhe - perfekt um abzuschalten und zur Ruhe zu kommen. Oder für Ausflüge in die Natur.
Abends und morgens kann es etwas kühler sein, entweder Pulli überziehen oder sich in eine Wolldecke hüllen 😉 Oder abends ein Feuer im Kamin machen.
Tagsüber raschelt es durch die kleinen (und etwas größeren) Echsen überall, und abends sieht man Fledermäuse.

Wir können die Höhle jedem weiterempfehlen, dem die Natur erleben wichtig ist und der seine Ruhe haben möchte.

Who wants to be just by her/himself/themselves - this is the place. Okay maybe if you’re lucky a cat will come by and share the fireplace with you at night. Unfortunately the sun did not show up at my time in the mountains so it was quite cold, also because the heater was broken. So bring a winter jacket, depending where you are on the island you might need it again. Nature, candles,  silence, fire and three hot water bottles for myself, the perfect start to take a break from busy work life. Katja is the best, always gave me directions to great places on the island - noch einmal vielen Dank dafür!!!

Katja's cave is unique - like nothing I've seen on AirBnB. The location is unimaginably beautiful and peaceful. The cave is quite well equipped and comfortable, but the garden and grounds are the highlight for me. The plumbing and electricity systems are quirky. But the secret is to regard the cave as an unusual and delightful form of glamping. I will be back.

Wir hatten einen wahnsinnig schönen Aufenthalt in der lauschigen Höhle!
Auch dass spontan noch zwei Freunde mitgekommen sind war kein Problem und die Kommunikation mit Katja war super gut und wir haben viele tolle Tipps bekommen!
Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder!

Die Höhle liegt mitten in der Natur, oberhalb von Arico Viejo. Man kann hier sehr gemütlich wohnen, am Abend den Sternenhimmel betrachten, ein romantisches Feuer anmachen und einfach die Ruhe genießen.
Die Höhle ist genau das richtige für unkomplizierte Naturliebhaber, die auch auf Komfort verzichten können.
Die beiden Besitzer sind sehr gastfreundlich und engagiert. Wir haben als Willkommensgeschenk frische Eier und Wein erhalten. 
Auch während unseres Aufenthaltes wurden wir gut betreut. In die Verwendung des Solarstromes und der Batterie wurden wir gut eingewiesen. Wir konnten damit prima den Kühlschrank betreiben.

Charming little cave in a beautiful and peaceful location. Katja and Mark very friendly, welcoming, helpful. Perfectly situated for climbing but would be great for hiking, cycling or any getaway. Amazing night sky!

description.summary:
Fuer alle Naturfreunde, Ruhesuchende, Sternenhimmelgucker, Wanderer, Strandliebhaber, Kletterer und alle die das Besondere suchen,  ist unser Platz fuer euch genau das Richtige!
Unsere kleine Hoehle in den Bergen von La Sabinita ist einfach ein Wohlfuehlort.
Es gibt viel Platz und einen kleinen Pinienwald auf der Finca, mit wunderschoenen Ausblicken auf das Meer, Gran Canaria und die Berge   - bei Nacht auf einen ueberwaeltigenden Sternenhimmel!
description.space:
In der Hoehle befinden sich die Kueche, Essbereich und Schlafsofa, sowie ein kleines Badezimmer mit Dusche.  Ein seperates Schlafzimmer findet ihr aussen angebaut, sowie ein Barbecueofen und  eine ueberdachte Terasse. Im Garten gibt es auch noch einen Esstisch unter freiem Himmel.

Auf der ein Hectar grossen Finca findet ihr viele schoene Plaetzchen zum entspannen unter den dicken Pinien oder im Garten. Hier koennt ihr ueberall die friedliche laendliche Umgebung und die Panoramaussichten geniessen.

Unsere Hoehle ist gemuetlich und einfach ausgestattet, aber mit viel Liebe und wir haben nur Solarstrom. Ihr Luxus liegt in der bezaubernden und einzigartigen Umgebung.
description.access: Gelaende: 12000m2 (davon 5000m2 eigener Wald)
description.notes:
Gleich in der Nahe findet man den all-year-around-Spot in der Kletterwelt – die Schlucht von Arico “el Valle de Ortiz” sowie herrliche Wanderwege (z.B. El Contador, Valle Ortiz).
Es kann passieren, das es wenig Wasserdruck gibt, so dass beim Duschen manchmal sogar ein bis zwei Tage nicht so viel Wasser kommt und dann auch kein heisses Wasser funktioniert.
Unsere Hoehle hat Solarstrom fuer Kuehlschrank, Licht, kleinere Elektrogeraete und zum Handy aufladen. Bei schlechtem Wetter kann dieser auch mal ausfallen - fuer diesen Fall gibt es genug Kerzen, Gasofen und Gaskocher, Taschenlampe und Kuehlbox.
Wer das Abenteuer Hoehlenwohnung trotzdem wagen will, ist herzlich willkommen.
description.neighborhood:
Zum ruhigen  Kuestendorf  Poris de Abona mit seinem Leuchturm,  Promenade und der kleinen Sandbucht  mit Fischerbooten sind es  15 Minuten mit dem Auto. Die Vulkansandstraende von Abades, mit netten kleinen Restaurants und Tauchschule auf der kleinen Plaza sind auch ganz in der Naehe.

Im Ort Arico Viejo (5 minuten entfernt) findet ihr alles, von kleinen und einem grossen Supermarkt, einem Baecker, Cafes, Tankstelle, Apotheke und Restaurants & Guachinche mit leckerer kanarischer Hausmanskost.

Die Windsurfstraende von Medano sind auch nicht weit entfernt, dort gibt es ein lebhafteres Treiben und viel Abwechslung.
description.transit: Mietwagen ist dringend erforderlich.
description.interaction: Gerne helfen wir Ihnen bei jeglichen Aspekten Ihres Aufenthaltes,z.B  wo fnden Sie die Straende und Restaurants der Einheimischen, wo die Attraktionen, wo findet man noch versteckte Schaetze, wo die Schildkroeten und Engelshaie, die Surf - und Kletterspots, etc....
description.house_rules:
- No littering
- Kein Muell auf dem Gelaende, wie Umgebung hinterlassen
- No campfire 
- Kein Lagerfeuer im Wald, wie auf dem Gelaende, bitte nur an vorgesehender Stelle (Ofen neben Hoehle)

hosts.about:
Desde siempre ha habido personas que han perseguido un sueño con su esfuerzo y su dedicación, por eso confiamos en nuestro proyecto VIVELORURAL.
Si sumamos nuestra ilusión de fomentar Gran Canaria en el ámbito rural + nuestros conocimientos en el sector turístico + todos los profesionales y amigos que nos están ayudando en este fascinante camino, ya podríamos decir, que tenemos una parte del éxito asegurado.

“VIVELORURAL es una sociedad nacida en Gran Canaria dedicada a la comercialización y gestión de alojamientos con encanto, también, a la organización de eventos y ofertas de actividades de ocio.

Ofrecemos calidad y buenos precios en casas rurales de arquitectura tradicional, viviendas vacacionales en un entorno rural y pequeños hoteles. Espacios únicos donde poder disfrutar y descansar, rodeada de una asombrosa naturaleza y belleza paisajística. ¡Mucho más que sólo sol y playa!

Si buscas lugares diferentes para tus eventos como retiros, convivencias, jornadas, bodas u otras celebraciones, también podemos ayudarte a encontrar tu rincón rural en nuestra isla. Además,tienes más alternativas para elegir solamente tu descanso o combinarlo con actividades de ocio como senderismo guiado, escalada, bicicleta….etc
 Nuria y Emma

There have always been people who endeavour to follow their dreams with dedication and hard work. That is why we believe in our project VIVELORURAL.

We are already halfway there to achieving our dream thanks to our enthusiasm in promoting rural Gran Canaria + our experience in the tourism sector + all the professionals and friends who are helping us on this exciting journey!

VIVELORURAL is a company that launched in Gran Canaria to manage and rent holiday cottages and organize events and leisure activities.

We offer high quality and reasonable prices for traditional rustic properties, holiday homes in rural settings and small hotels. Unique locations to enjoy and find rest, immersed in wonderful countryside and beautiful landscape. There is so much more to Gran Canaria than just sun and beaches!

We can also help you find a rural setting for your event such as weddings and other celebrations, spiritual and personal development retreats, etc. We also offer the possibility of combining your relaxing holiday with fun activities such as guided walking, climbing and cycling.

You are all welcome to join us and live new experiences on this amazing island!

The Team at VIVELORURAL

recent.comments:
A great stay......very comfortable........very peaceful and great for walking in the local hills 
Beatrix was always available and happy to help

items.comments:
A great stay......very comfortable........very peaceful and great for walking in the local hills 
Beatrix was always available and happy to help

The kind of place where you immediately feel at home. A wonderful base for all of Gran Canaria- we enjoyed visiting places during they day then just relaxing and cooking in the evening.  
There's plenty of beautiful living space indoor and out, kitchen is well stocked and we enjoyed the personal touches and lovely hosting from Beatriz - which made our stay memorable.
Thank you...
Very nice stay in a lovely appartment very close to the sea. A small beach is at a 3minutes walk. The appart is perfect for a couple who wants te stay away from crowd !
Los propietarios han sido mas que atentos con nosotros, por lo que les estamos muy agradecidos. Las vistas y el espacio fantásticos. Nosotros volveríamos sin dudarlo.

La Cuevita es una casa pintoresca,  situada en un bonito  entorno natural,  y decorada con un gusto exquisito. Tiene  un jardín con vistas a la montaña que es una verdadera delicia. En ella nos hemos sentido cómodos y felices. 
La cuevita está en un lugar tranquilo y a la vez bien comunicado para explorar la isla.
Beatriz y Dimas son dos anfitriones excepcionales: amables,  discretos, buenos conversadores, cercanos y detallistas.

La Cuevita is truly amazing! It is located in a beautiful hilly part of the island, in a valley and you will wake up to a spectacular view each morning. It is a cave property that had been carved out of the mountainside! And the pictures of La Cuevita don't show quite how wonderful it is. Beatriz and her husband Dinas were the most generous and accomodating hosts, they offered many great recommendations for us during our stay. It's difficult to describe how fantastic it was there - you just need to go for yourself! We had the best time and miss La Cuevita and Beatriz and Dinas already!

We had a wonderful stay at Beatriz's cave house. It is beautifully furnished, with great attention to detail, and everything you need is there and even more. We were very kindly welcomed, with homemade tortilla from Beatriz's husband, which was super tasty. They live in a cave house above, but you always have your privacy. The view of the mountains is just fantastic! Staying in a cave house is definitely a unique experience. The ceilings are relatively low, so you might not want to be too tall a person :) I tend to be claustrophobic, but felt super comfortable at all times. There are no doors in the house, only curtains between the rooms, just as an information. Beatriz was always very easy to reach and very helpful. I can highly recommend it!

description.summary:
La Cuevita, como así la llamamos, está situada en la ladera soleada del barranco de las Goteras, a 450 metros de altitud y a 15 minutos caminando, del barrio alfarero de La Atalaya, en el municipio de Santa Brígida en la isla de Gran Canaria.
Este lugar está catalogado como Paisaje Protegido y  es perfecto  para olvidar las prisas y encontrarte a ti mismo.
description.space: Desde él se pueden observar interesantes formaciones geológicas, así como agrupaciones boscosas de acebuches, es, además, un emplazamiento idóneo para la observación de diversas especies de aves entre las que destacaríamos a las rapaces, aguiluchos, cernícalos, corujas, y otras frugívoras e insectívoras, mirlos, herrerillos, petirrojos, vencejos,…
description.access:
Su interior es luminoso y ventilado, siendo sus habitaciones acogedoras y silenciosas, tal y como corresponde a las características constructivas de las casas cuevas que, siguiendo las técnicas ancestrales de los primeros pobladores de la isla, consiguen mantener una temperatura media de 19 grados C,  durante todo el año, con lo que sus moradores se sienten abrigados en invierno y frescos en verano.
El exterior dispone de un jardín con diversos rincones de sol y de sombra. Desde él y dada su orientación paralela al curso E-W del barranco, se pueden contemplar las cumbres de la isla y, a lo lejos, hacia su desembocadura, el mar.
description.neighborhood:
El barrio de la Atalaya está a 15 minutos caminando desde la casa, en el puedes encontrar, supermercados, restaurantes, farmacias, etc...
También hay muchos senderos para caminar
description.house_rules:
- Se ofrece servicio de Limpieza y lavandería con coste
- Se ofrece servicio de desayuno y cenas a petición
- Hay aparcamiento exterior
- Los propietarios viven  cerca
- Hay que bajar desde el aparcamiento hasta la casa unos 25 metros
- Se recomienda calzado cómodo

hosts.about: Hola, soy Marta y estoy aquí para ayudaros en todo lo que necesitéis antes y durante vuestra estancia, trabajo en Sunkey Rents Tenerife y somos un grupo de personas apasionadas que tenemos como objetivo que paséis unas vacaciones perfectas e inolvidables ¡os esperamos!

recent.comments: This is a fabulous, unique stay. Owners passionate about ecology and biodiversity. The road leading to it is very narrow and there is no place to pull in if/when you meet another car. Not for the faint hearted. Very relaxing place and welcoming host, generous with produce, potatoes, lemons,  eggs. Amazing views and the star's light up the night sky.

items.comments: This is a fabulous, unique stay. Owners passionate about ecology and biodiversity. The road leading to it is very narrow and there is no place to pull in if/when you meet another car. Not for the faint hearted. Very relaxing place and welcoming host, generous with produce, potatoes, lemons,  eggs. Amazing views and the star's light up the night sky.

Nous avons reçu un accueil très chaleureux. Cette maison est décorée avec soin et située dans un petit coin de paradis. Nous avons apprécié toutes les gentilles attention. N'hésitez surtout pas à réserver cette location si vous souhaitez vous déconnecter et rencontrer des hôtes très sympathiques !

description.summary:
Welcome to this wonder of a place where you can enjoy a completely different stay, the interior is all sculpted inside the mountain, and outside you can enjoy wonderful sunsets, a pond with ducks, corners to eat or relax in the sun. .. all in an indigenous desert garden.
It is on the top of the mountain so a car is needed to move on the area. We recommend you to do the shopping before arrive to the house.
description.space:
This house is more than a rural house, it is a charming place, a different experience, to enjoy nature in its purest form.
The accommodation has:
- A bedroom with a double bed, a small elevated corner to lie down to read or rest, dressing table, window and bathroom with shower inside.
- A double bedroom, with two single beds, a window, a shelf carved in stone, a wardrobe and a desk.
- Kitchen area with fridge, stove, coffee maker, toaster, oven inside the fireplace and mineral water fountain.
- Living room with sofa, TV and dining area.
- Magnificent exterior with an area with a pool, sun loungers and a large table in the shade, an area with a coffee table and an umbrella, another area with an outdoor swing sofa, all with incredible views and the privacy of not sharing it with other guests.

Ideal for family trips or groups of friends, to travel with children or for a romantic getaway, or for teleworkers, as there is an internet connection. Here you will find much more than what you are looking for, a surprising and unique experience at your fingertips. Do not hesitate and be encouraged to come! We wait for you!
description.access: Being an independent house you can enjoy everything privately, without sharing it with other guests.
description.notes:
We have a babysitting service, upon request and payment.
There is a baby pack at your disposal for €5 a day, with a cot, high chair, bathtub, car lift and car seat up to 18 kg.
description.neighborhood: The area of La Zarza is a rural space, with native vegetation of Tenerife, beautiful views of the east coast of the island and the island of Gran Canaria, which seems to accompany you in its beautiful sunrises, making your holidays an idyllic stay, with a unique experience in the middle of nature.
description.transit: It is necessary to rent a car to access the house independently and move around the area.
description.interaction: We want your island vacation to be perfect, which is why we are available 24 hours a day to answer your questions before and during your trip.
description.house_rules:
A la salida del alojamiento debe retirar la basura, y depositarla en los contenedores habilitados para ello en la calle.
La casa tiene que quedar recogida, a falta de la limpieza, teniendo que quedar los utensilios de cocina fregados y colocados.
No están permitidas las fiestas, ni hacer ruido durante la noche.
El incumplimiento de estas normas podría conllevar una penalización en la devolución de la fianza.

name: Casa cueva El Balcón del Cortijo
title: Teror, Spain

gallery.caption: Salón comedor. Sin duda ¡¡PRECIOSO!! Ideal para desconectar y relajarte después de un día de ruta o de playa en la isla.

Dormitorio principal en cueva, cómodo y comfortable 
cama 1,35 x 2,00 
Viene el verano y las temperaturas elevadas. Descansa como un niño sin preocuparte del tiempo que pueda haber durante tus vacaciones.
La cueva cuenta con ventilación en la parte alta de la puerta y cortina opaca.
Salón comedor con luz natural que invita a leer, disfrutar de una buena película o dormir una buena siesta. Sin olvidar el aire acondicionado si lo necesitas
Hoy degustamos las primeras uvas del Balcón del Cortijo.

Segundo dormitorio en cueva 2 camas 0,90 x 2,00.
Que el clima no estropee tu descanso
Baño con mucha luz, sencillo  y bien equipado

Cocina luz natural y bien equipada.
¿Te gusta cocinar?
Nuestra huésped Jolanda, creó este zona del café y algo más. Me encanta!!
Terraza ideal para tomar el sol, hacer yoga o estiramientos. Además podrás disfrutar de las vistas  y el sonido natural del entorno tanto en el día como en la noche.
Al abrir la puerta me encuentro con este lindo momento
Zona de barbacoa techada para poder disfrutar de desayunos y tardes interminables.....
recogiendo los productos de la casa
LAS PAPAS, uno de los productos estrella de nuestra agricultura. Cuidadas con esmero por nuestro vecinos, seguro tendrán buena cosecha.
"El Balcón del Cortijo" te dejará huella
A escasos 15 minutos en coche podrás darte un buen baño en "Los charcones de Arucas" donde además  disfrutarás de la gastronomía típica que ofrecen los  restaurantes de la zona.
A 15 minutos en coche, anexa a  "Los Charcones de Arucas se encuentra " La Playa del Portillo". Playa muy familiar para disfrutar con tranquilidad de un día de verano.
" Playa de Las Canteras" a tan sólo 20 minutos en coche puedes disfruta del baño, de la amplia oferta gastronómica, así como practicar diferentes deportes náuticos a diferentes horas del día.

hosts.about: Hola, me considero una persona responsable y dada a ayudar a los demás en aquello que está en mi mano. Soy familiar y me gusta pasar buenos momentos con la familia y la gente que quiero.  Me gusta el campo, los animales, la playa el baile y hacer algún viaje al año.

recent.comments:
Una casa maravillosa con unos dueños muy amables, sobretodo dando recomendaciones de la isla y estando pendiente de nosotros.
Los detalles marcan la diferencia del alojamiento: limpieza de 10, detalles básicos como gel y champú, café, azúcar etc, que no todos los lugares ofrecen.
Recomendación al 100%.
