recent.comments: BRUTAL TREMENDA EXPERIENCIA NOS ENCANTO VOLVEREMOS DLB

items.comments: BRUTAL TREMENDA EXPERIENCIA NOS ENCANTO VOLVEREMOS DLB

This was such an amazing experience. It was our first time ever camping and we felt safe the entire time there. It is a pretty difficult hike up to the campsites if you aren’t experienced. The house rules help keep your campsite safe and clean especially your tent, so just make sure you read it thoroughly.

The backyard, bathroom, and campsite were all aesthetically nice. The tent, air mattress, and hammock at the site were in good condition. 

Be careful sitting on the picnic table, as there are some staples that ended up ripping our clothes. 

The hike is difficult; you should bring a backpack, so that you can have 2 hands to hold onto the ropes along the trail. 

The campsite is not much of a “sacred refuge”. There is a highway quite close that is very loud. We did not get a feeling of “backpacking”, as advertised. We were disappointed by the lack of maintenance of the campsite—the floor is so slanted, that it was difficult to get deep, comfortable rest. 

Check-out is at 9 AM. We received messages in the minutes leading up to this checkout threatening additional costs. Typically, when sharing space with a host, it would be nice to get face-to-face communication rather than consistent messages trying to charge us before we leave.
me encanto el lugar una aventura brutal super 🤙🏻💪🏻
Very comfy and clean!  Did some rock climbing and stayed the night. Very chill and nice couple. Got great recommendations from them.

C'était magique! On a même vu des lucioles! 
Mais attendez-vous à entendre l'autoroute si vous dormez à Refugio Sagrada. Ça change un peu le charme de l'endroit.
Pour tout le reste, c'était impeccable! Plein de petites surprises vous attendent :)

Kenneth and Marianela’s place is a gem. Their backyard is paradise. The camping is cozy and exactly what I was looking for. However, if your injured, elderly or simply not very good with difficult walks I would think twice before I went camping. Rock climbing was such an awesome experience. It was my first time and I couldn’t have asked for a better place to do it. They are truly amazing souls ❤️

description.summary:
Our property is a rock climbing spot and a camping area.

To get to the rock shelter you need to do a short hike in a rocky trail, sometimes steep and muddy. You should be in the adventurous and flexible mood. 

Includes: shared full bathroom, private tent area in rock shelter with set up,  1 parking spot and more.

Price includes 2 guests, 2 more guest can be added in a second tent for an additional fee. 

Check in: 4-6pm
Check out: 9am
description.space:
The uniqueness of this place is that the owners backyard’s property is a FOREST 🌳 with a natural rock climbing wall 🧗‍♂️ for NON climbers AND climbers.

You will sleep in a natural rock shelter as your private room!. This is the way our natives used to sleep and made rituals. The zone is a famous archaeological site. 

WHATS INCLUDED? ⛺️🍽🚽

It includes:

👉🏼 2-person backpacking style tent
👉🏼full size air mattress set up
👉🏼pillows and bed sheets
👉🏼1 parking spot
👉🏼full shared bathroom
👉🏼a battery operated fan
👉🏼storage box 
👉🏼camping stove with coffee maker in the cave
👉🏼 hammock
👉🏼 chairs
👉🏼 swing
👉🏼 campfire area

Price also includes 2 guests, but a 3rd and 4th guest can be accommodated in a second tent very close to this rock shelter (20 feet away). 

Maximum persons: 4


ACCESS details: 🗺

Your rock shelter name is Refugio Sagrado. You will have a video in your self check in instructions to make it easier for you to get there on your own. You need to bring good grip shoes for the trail and your hands should be totally free. 

Bathroom and parking spot are located at the entrance of our property, at about 6-7 minutes hiking from the rock shelter.

Check in time: 4pm-8pm ⏰
Check out is before 9:00am 
Late check out: 15$ per additional hour


INTERESTED IN ROCK CLIMBING? 🧗‍♂️(beginners or climbers)

Reservations are required 
Enter here:
www.rocanortepr. com



Since this is also a rock climbing area please notice that few climbers (1-3) may be present or may enter to access the rock wall. However, your designated tent area is only for you and your companion, in very secluded area.



OTHER SERVICES WE CAN OFFER: 

1- Casabe Bread workshop to learn how our Taíno natives prepared their bread (cost: 1 person 20$, 2 or more 15$pp).

2- Geology and fossil workshop to understand the geology of the area (20-30min) Price: 1 person 20$, 2 or more 15$pp. (also good for kids)

(Need to tell us just after your reservation)


Suggestions for a better stay/What to bring: 📝

1- We sell campfire logs at 10$ (last for 1.5 hrs). Let us know in advance to have it available for you.
2- Bring your towel / or we can provide it at no additional cost.
3- Since you need to hike for about 5-6 minutes to get there you need: boots or similar good grip shoes and it will be easier if you get here before sunset.
4- Bring in a backpack only items you will use at the cave such as water, food, phone, headlamps or flashlight, etc. Keep it simple! and you will enjoy it better!
5- Bathroom is located close to the entrance at about 5-6 minutes from the cave. Plan and pack accordingly.
6- You need to download the Airbnb app to have access to all the details and messages at real time. 
7- See our guidebook to see all the good restaurants, bakeries, coffee shops and more that we have compiled for you:
https://abnb.me/GLyu66KvOeb



RULES: ✨

1- Do not leave any trash or micro trash in the forest and camping area. 
2-If you have organic wastes such as food remains do not leave in the camping area or trail. You can either bury at 6 inches or more in the soil or put it somewhere invisible to others.
3- If you are planning to make a campfire remember to also carry enough water to pour it over.
4- Do NOT flush toilet paper because it will get clogged in the pipes.
5- Keep the bathroom door locked after you’re done.
6-If you are close to the entrance or near our property at 10pm or later remember to have noises at a minimum.
7-The main gate is never locked, however it should remain closed especially after 8pm. Please help us on that.



SPECIAL NOTE: 👀

If you don’t frequently do camping, you should know these type of experiences may take you out of your comfort zone.
However, you open your mind for new and unique experiences to happen and that otherwise you will not get. This is the closest thing to a backpacking experience but much more easy since everything is already set up for your convenience. 



CAMPSITES WE MANAGE: ⛺️⛺️⛺️

1- Located in Cayey town. Great  for couples who want to camp much more comfortable Includes everything you need.

www.airbnb.com/h/enjoytiny 




2- Located also in Roca Norte Vega Baja another rock shelter at about 3-4 minutes hike from the entrance.  

www.airbnb.com/h/rocanorte5



3- Located in Cayey town. This one if for people who need the whole property to camp for themselves. Need to bring your tents. 

www.airbnb.com/h/cayey3
description.access: Backyard, Full bathroom, trail and rock shelters. To access the walls for climbers you need a reservation.
description.notes:
We are passionate naturalists and we like that people embrace simplicity and the beauty of this place as much as we do. Please behave accordingly and come with the best attitude to enjoy it.

We don’t allow smoking cigarettes in the property. You would have to go outside of the property.

Pets are not allowed in this stay.
description.neighborhood: Neighborhood is quiet, three other houses are close to our home. A bakery is located at about two minutes which can also be reached by walking.
description.transit: At this town there are no bike lanes, the safest way to get around would be to rent a car. You can also get Taxi Services. Very limited or none Uber cars around.
description.interaction: Im available to help in any way!
description.house_rules:
Do not flush toilet paper.
Always close the gate when leaving.
If you are not an experienced climber you should hire us as rock climbing guides.
Be responsible with wastes and recycling.
Do not smoke.

name: Casa Cueva Azul: Höhlenhaus mit Traumblick
title: Gáldar, Spain

gallery.caption: Sonnenuntergang mit Blick auf den Teide/Teneriffa
Blick auf die Cueva Azul von der Panoramastraße
Hoja de Pineda und der Barranco de Anzoe
Blick auf den Berg von Gáldar auf dem Wanderweg ins Tal
Blick vom Tal auf das Haus
Blick vom Montaña de Guía auf den Ort Hoja de Pineda

recent.comments:
We really loved Ria‘s place! The little cave apartment is really beautiful furnished and is located on top of a mountain in a very peaceful valley. 
The rooftop terrace was so amazing! We enjoyed our evenings having a glass of wine and watching the sunset set.

We really loved it here and were weary sad when we had to leave.

items.comments:
We really loved Ria‘s place! The little cave apartment is really beautiful furnished and is located on top of a mountain in a very peaceful valley. 
The rooftop terrace was so amazing! We enjoyed our evenings having a glass of wine and watching the sunset set.

We really loved it here and were weary sad when we had to leave.

Die Unterkunft ist wundervoll und wirklich was besonderes. Wer seine Erholung sucht, findet mit dieser Wohnung den Schlüssel. Beim Kochen hat man einen super Ausblick auf die Stadt und im Schlafzimmer sind immer angenehm kühle Temperaturen. 
Ria ist super erreichbar, gibt einem Ausflugstips und hilft einem sofort bei aufkommenden Fragen. Das ganze ist wirklich super persönlich und herzlich. 

Die Städte Galdar und Agaete sind mit dem Auto in 15-20 zu erreichen. Die Hauptstadt Las Palmas in ca. 30 min. 
Man hat aus Agaete die Möglichkeit einen Tagesausflug nach Teneriffa zu machen. Von der Wohnung aus kann man sofort mit einer Wandertour starten und muss nicht erst weit ins Landesinnere fahren. Demnach hat die Unterkunft eine super Lage, was durch den super Ausblick zusätzlich unterstrichen wird. 

Von mir eine absolute Empfehlung!
Die Unterkunft war sehr schön eingerichtet und sauber! Die Kommunikation mit Ria war ohne Probleme und man hat gute Informationen zum Haus und Tipps für die Umgebung bekommen.

Eine tolle Höhlen-Wohnung, mit Liebe eingerichtet. Die Aussicht von der Dachterrasse ist grandios. Man ist etwas abgelegen, aber das ist mit der Lage ja offensichtlich und wir fanden es gut, da wir vorher auch das Gegenteil hatten. Hier kann man wunderbar entspannen. Die Anfahrt zum Parkplatz ist eng, aber daran gewöhnt man sich schnell. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Restaurants erreicht man in 15-20min viele.

Die Insel hat landschaftlich einiges zu bieten, wenn man sich nicht gerade in Maspalomas zusammen mit anderen am Strand grillen lassen möchte.
Allerdings muss man etwas Zeit für einen Ausflug in die Berge einplanen. Wenn der Navi für eine Strecke von 30 Kilometern knapp über eine Stunde berechnet, weißte Bescheid. Das wird dann aber mit wunderschönen Aussichten belohnt. Wir waren im April da und genossen die blühende Vielfalt.
Die "Cueva" von Ria hat alles, was man benötigt. Was wir vermisst haben, waren gute Restaurants in der Nähe - man muss auf jeden Fall zuerst eine kurvige Strecke bewältigen. Dafür haben wir dann öfter gegrillt und auf der Terrasse den lustigen Geräuschen der Sepiasturmtaucher gelauscht.
Ria ist superfreundlich und antwortet sehr zeitnah auf Anfragen.
Wir haben uns schnell an die 82 Stufen vom Parkplatz zum Haus gewöhnt. Es hört sich schlimmer an als es ist. Für alle, die etwas Außergewöhnliches und Ruhe suchen, ist es ideal.
Ria est une très bonne hôte . L’appartement est superbe et très propre. Elle s’est toujours tenue disponible pour nous aider. Merci pour tout ☺️

We loved our stay in the cave house. Everything was clean and comfortable inside and we enjoyed dinner on the roof terrace. Parking is tricky but that’s to be expected due to the location. Great for exploring the north of the island. We hope to return.

description.summary:
Das Höhlenhaus hängt wie Schwalbennest am Hang. Es besticht besonders durch seinen traumhaften Meerblick und Süd-West Ausrichtung. Bei gutem Wetter sieht man bis zur Nachbarinsel Teneriffa. 
Beide Schlafzimmer sowie das Wohnzimmer sind im Höhlenteil des Hauses untergebracht. Im Anbau befinden sich die Wohnküche, ein Bad mit Badewanne, Panoramafenster und Dusche sowie die separate Toilette/Waschraum.
Es gibt eine kleine Terrasse und eine Dachterrasse  mit Chillout-Bereich und Barbeque.
description.space:
Das Haus  wurde vor Kurzem liebevoll renoviert, und eingerichtet. Dabei wurde darauf geachtet den ursprünglichen Höhlencharcter zu erhalten.
Es gibt eine komplette Küchenausstattung mit Toaster, Kaffeemaschine, Mixer.  
Der Fernseher ist ein Smart-TV und mit dem WIFI verbunden.
description.neighborhood: Im kleinen Ort Hoja de Pineda gibt es ein nettes, kleines und super günstiges Dorf-Restaurant.
description.transit:
in ca. 500 m gibt es eine Bushaltestelle.
Direkt am Haus führt ein offizieller Wanderweg vorbei, auf dem man nach Guia oder Pinar de Galdar kommt. 3 weiter Touren kann man direkt am Haus beginnen.
description.interaction: Die Gäste können mich jederzeit anrufen oder über Whatsapp kommunizieren in deutsch/englisch/spanisch. Ein Nachbar istimmer verfügbar, wenn irgendein Problem auftreten sollte, z.B. etwas nicht funktioniert.

name: FINCA RURAL CASA Y CABAÑA Y CUEVA Y PISCINA
title: Granadilla, Spain

recent.comments: Buen sitio para grupos grandes de despedida de soltero. Anfitrión muy atento para hacer que la estancia en un plan de ese estilo sea lo más agradable posible.

items.comments: Buen sitio para grupos grandes de despedida de soltero. Anfitrión muy atento para hacer que la estancia en un plan de ese estilo sea lo más agradable posible.

This is a very unique property that is great for a group looking for a relaxed break out of the busyness of the south west coast. Despite not having no pool, the grounds are lovely for lounging and there’s even a turtle pool at the back which is enjoyable to sit by and watch the turtles and fish swimming about. 

The local town has a couple of really good restaurants, when I say good I mean fantastic! With delicious Spanish food and wines for really reasonable prices. We went to one of them twice it was so good. 

The only downside of this property is the bedroom space. When we looked it said it sleeps up to 16 but the reality is 10-11 comfortably. The other beds aren’t really appropriate to use. 

The hosts were great onsite and helped with arranging taxis etc. They do have a couple of cats and dogs that like to wander down too, which is lovely if you’re an animal lover. 

We were a group of 10 girls away for my 40th and totally embraced the quirkiness of this property. We had a great time. 

Thank you Vincent! :)

description.summary:
Finca entera con casa de 5 habitaciones, una cueva y  una cabaña. 
En la casa, hay 2 cocinas totalmente equipadas, 3 baños completos y un aseo. Salón amplio y luminoso con sofa cama, pantalla de TV, conexión WIFI, equipo de música... 
Cocina exterior, barbacoa doble, terrazas, baño completo exterior, piscina, toldos, cueva para eventos, ... Entorno idilico muy florecido, con vistas a mar y montaña. Perfecto para vacaciones en familia o amigos, eventos, grupos de empresa, etc.
description.space: Casa moderna en entorno rural con muchos arboles, flores, caminos, naturaleza, animales... Vistas impresionantes al mar y a la montaña.
description.neighborhood:
Granadilla de Abona es uno de los pueblos de Tenerife donde mejor se pueden observar las estrellas.

El centro ciudad se encuentra a 2 minutos en coche, hay comercios y supermercados.
description.transit:
Parada de autobus a 2km aprox.
Aparcamiento en la parcela.
description.interaction: Les enseñamos la casa, les explicamos como funciona todo, y ya pueden disfrutar del sitio para su celebración o sus vacaciones. Si nos necesitan, podemos acudir en unos minutos.

name: Casita Zen Garden, Great Location, Walk To All
title: San Miguel de Allende, Mexico

location.address: San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato, Mexico

gallery.caption: Studio bedroom overlooks the Zen tranquil garden

Spectacular downtown Garden Casita, lots of natural light with private garden. Kitchen with Whirlpool Hob 4 burner, walk in bathroom, queen bed. Very private and secure, walk to all within 5 - 10 minutes. great location, no need for car.
Zen garden studio, walk to all attractions within minutes.

Cosy kitchen for light cooking.
Whirlpool Hob 4 burner, microwave oven and a mini fridge. No oven or dishwasher.
Guests are welcome to join the weekly classes, schedule personal wellness program and energy balancing therapy sessions.
Guests are welcome to join the weekly classes, schedule personal wellness program and energy balancing therapy sessions.
Evening concert at the main square El Jardin.

hosts.about: Architect and Design.

recent.comments: I would highly recommend this garden studio. It is super zen and peaceful and makes you feel right at home. The outdoor garden is private and beautiful. Lydia is a great host. I recommend you check out her other experience offerings as well-I tried and really enjoyed. This location is walkable to many things-I liked going to Live Aqua hotel next door for a spa treatment and going around the corner to Mercado de artesanias for local goods, fruits and veggies, and cheap eats in a huge multi block market. Directly across from the garden studio, there was a small bodega that sold fresh bread, drinks, medicines and basic toiletries  -I went there every day to get some essentials and my breakfast.

items.comments: I would highly recommend this garden studio. It is super zen and peaceful and makes you feel right at home. The outdoor garden is private and beautiful. Lydia is a great host. I recommend you check out her other experience offerings as well-I tried and really enjoyed. This location is walkable to many things-I liked going to Live Aqua hotel next door for a spa treatment and going around the corner to Mercado de artesanias for local goods, fruits and veggies, and cheap eats in a huge multi block market. Directly across from the garden studio, there was a small bodega that sold fresh bread, drinks, medicines and basic toiletries  -I went there every day to get some essentials and my breakfast.

This is an amazing place. The beauty, the energy, the functionality, are excellent. 
Lydia was very friendly and accommodating. I was surprised to see how well the place was built and the materials chosen. The location was also great. There’s a perfect contrast between the noise and the movement of the city and the peace and harmony of this place. I highly recommend this jewel in San Miguel de Allende.

Lydia’s place is very peaceful, does not face the street, is very well designed and full of light. It remains cool because it is on the bottom floor. The simple decor and natural materials are calming. I loved attending Lydia’s tai chi classes upstairs. The bed is super comfortable and the shower has high pressure and immediate hot water . 
The most wonderful thing about this BnB is the garden , which feels like an extension of the apartment .  It makes the place feel much bigger and the butterflies and hummingbirds are magical. Lydia made me feel right at home. I had a wonderful two month stay.
Nice little spot, beautiful yard, lovely nature spot in middle of city. Lydia is a healer and Tai chi teacher and lovely host.

Lydia was a lovely host. She cared about my experience. I attended her tai chi classes, which were excellent. Also benefited from a few sessions of energy work. I loved the location. It was a comfortable and healthy walk to el Centro. It also felt very safe for a single woman.

What you see is what you get! A marvelous quiet, serene, beautiful, lovely, inclusive space with an incredibly friendly host. The outdoor back yard is such a bonus too! The bed was luxurious, water pressure and temperature was wonderful and the lighting was really magical. 

My suggestions would be to add a wall ac/heat unit that one sees in upgraded studios. They work great. A clunky roll around propane unit is the current option. If it runs outs of fuel, it is the guests’ responsibility to pay for a new tank (roughly $17). In general, I found all the homes in San Miguel to be very cold. Also, be prepared to pay for trash and laundry unless you choose to do it off site yourself. 
I would also consider installing locks on the sliding glass doors rather than use “bamboo stick door stoppers”. Multiple people had access to the backyard. It was a bit unnerving at times. 

However, with that said, Lydia is very accommodating and accessible. When the woman who was does the laundry was not available, Lydia did it herself. We went to breakfast together and she welcomed me into her home for tea. I enjoyed my stay and would certainly recommend it as so already have. Great location as well!
Great, convenient & walkable location in centro near Live Aqua resort. Beautiful garden, lots of light. Lydia was very responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

description.summary: Casita Zen Garden is open concept, private with stylish decor. This charming casita with tall windows frame the Zen garden and turns the  L shape interior into a "bright chamber" of light. 1 Queen bed suitable for 1-2 guests only. Downtown yet surrounded by nature, perfect as a writing retreat for an author or for vacationers to unwind. Good wifi service, purified water, maid service, easy walk to all attractions. Live Aqua Hotel to attend weddings. Walk to stores and small tacos restaurant.
description.space:
What Guests Say:

A pristine and peaceful space. You enter and feel as if you're passing through a cave, with parts of the underlying rock exposed within the casita entrance. As you walk further it opens up with soft light coming through the rear of the casita made entirely of sliding glass doors that open into a beautiful garden. The architecture is at the same time airy and light, yet grounded and connected to the earth. Cozy and yet spacious, with everything needed for a short or long stay exploring SMA. I highly recommend and can't wait to return someday." DJ, LA Nov 2019.

Enjoy this beautiful light and airy garden studio offers a great alternative to a hotel. Why not have your own cosy casita, 1 queen bed with all amenities and housekeeper. The casita is airy and cool in the summer. The location is in Zona Centro, yet away from the hustle and bustle of the main square. Walk to many friendly neighborhood stores, the local market, cafes, restaurants.

The location is a 10 minute walk to El Jardin (the main square), Parroquia Church, spanish schools, art galleries, boutiques, and all the best restaurants, which make San Miguel a World Cultural Location.

- The casita is located at the back of the building with no sound of traffic.
The casita private entrance from the street is next to our private garage.

- Maid service once a week

- Secure WiFI

- Flat screen 40 inch TV

- Purified water

- 10 - 15 minute walk to the main plaza, El Jardin

- Walk to the Live Aqua Hotel, restaurants and shops of the Aurora shopping center.

- No washer / dryer in the Studio.
description.access:
Guests with keys will enter from the side garage street door, pass our garage space on the left and walk through a covered passage to the private casita and garden. 


There is a public parking location at the corner of LiveAqua Hotel and Calzada de la Luz Calle. Our garage is not included with the rental, please enquire if it's available during your weekend dates.

We live above the casita in the main building with our own separate entrance.
description.notes:
- We welcome our guests to enjoy our casita and zen garden. 

- Closest Landmarks
Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende 0.8 km
Church of St. Michael the Archangel 0.8 km

- The luxurious LiveAqua Hotel has Sunday brunch, Spice market restaurant, spa and shopping. 

Energize with AM Tai Chi With Lydia
- Guests can reserve holistic therapies and enroll in the San Miguel Tai Chi classes taught by your host Lydia. AM Tai Chi held on Monday, Wednesday & Friday at 9:30am - 10:30am.

Laundry:
Directions to the local  laundry service will be given on arrival.

Garage for 1 medium size car may be available depending on your vacation dates, please enquire.
description.neighborhood:
San Miguel is a very lively city with countless celebrations especially on weekends. The neighborhood is a 10- minute walk and easy to get taxis. It is in the central part of San Miguel and close to everything. 

Safe and family oriented neighborhood.

Steps from a Spanish school, Art school. restaurants, cafes, music and entertainment, fresh fruit, vegetable market and grocery stores, laundry service and tai chi yoga studio.

Public library 0.6 km

Benito Juarez Park 1.3 km

Allende´s Institute 1.5 km

Sanctuary of Atotonilco 11 km

Las Monjas Temple 0.8 km

The view point 1.1 km
description.transit:
San Miguel is a very lively city with countless celebrations especially on weekends. The neighborhood is a 5-10- minute walk to all attractions. It is in the central part of San Miguel, walk within 1 block to LiveAqua Hotel for Sunday brunch, conferences, Spice Market restaurant, cafes, downtown fruit market etc. Safe and family oriented neighborhood. Across the street is a friendly grocery store.

Closest Landmarks

Church of St. Michael the Archangel 0.8 km
Public library 0.6 km
Benito Juarez Park 1.3 km
Allende´s Institute 1.5 km
Sanctuary of Atotonilco 11 km
Las Monjas Temple 0.8 km
The view point 1.1 km
description.interaction:
We will be happy to assist you with useful information and good ideas about what is happening in the city that can not be found in guidebooks. maps, restaurant guides and taxi information available. 

WiFI is Fiber Optics. 

Sorry but we do not accept pets of any size.
description.house_rules:
Check in times at the weekend is flexible. During the week arrival time must be confirmed. *We work during the day and can be flexible depending on the arrival day.

Check out is at 11am.

Noises In Mexico
The owner is not responsible for excessive noises near rental homes, such as church bells ringing, dogs barking, neighborhood music, construction, city street work, roosters crowing, firecrackers or fiestas.

No unregistered guests allowed or an extra fee of $50 US per night per person will be charged.

Garage is not included, please enquire if it's available during your stay.

No compensation will be given for any temporary outage of electricity, gas, water, internet or TV service.  

No washer or dryer provided.
Information for Laundry service will be provided on arrival.

If you have any questions or concerns about the area, we are here to help and want to provide you with the best 5 Star Airbnb experience possible.  

Reglas adicionales en español

Los horarios de registro en el fin de semana son flexibles. Durante la semana la hora de llegada debe ser confirmada. * Trabajamos durante el día y podemos ser flexibles dependiendo del día de llegada. 

La salida es a las 11 am. 

Ruidos en México El propietario no se hace responsable de los ruidos excesivos cerca de las casas de alquiler, como el sonido de las campanas de las iglesias, los ladridos de los perros, la construcción del vecindario, el trabajo en las calles de la ciudad, el canto de los gallos, los petardos o las fiestas.

No se permiten huéspedes no registrados, cargo de $50 US por noche.

No hay lavadora ni secadora. 
La información para el servicio de lavandería se proporcionará a la llegada. 

Si tiene alguna pregunta o inquietud sobre el área, estamos aquí para ayudarlo y queremos brindarle la mejor experiencia de Airbnb de 5 estrellas posible. 

No se otorgará ninguna compensación por cualquier corte temporal de electricidad, gas, agua, internet o servicio de televisión.

name: CAVE HOUSE & SILENCE | Remote Working | Hiking
title: Artenara, Spain

gallery.caption: LIVING ARTENARA offers the best views of the Caldera de Tejeda. Nature at its purest.
The covered terrace offers magnificent views, and is intended for the exclusive use of the guests of this cave house.
Ideal for those looking to combine remote work and outdoor leisure, no detail is missing in this cave house.
Sit back. Pay attention to your senses. Don't you see? Just peace. Comfortable reading in front of the Roque Bentayga.
The cave house is equipped with a height-adjustable standing desk and a work chair, a computer screen and a reading lamp. Ideal for remote workers.
LIVING ARTENARA, top quality accommodation. Your rest is our pride!
Are you working remotely and looking for a change of scenery? High speed FIBER internet connection in our apartments and cave houses.
Desk in high position. Standing up relieves your back. If you alternate it with sitting work, you increase your productivity.
Focus on your rest. If you want, we can clean the cave house during your stay. For further information, contact us!
Cave houses are painted white to enhance the effect of natural light. In this one, everything is strategically at hand.
Comfortable mattresses guarantee your rest. The large wardrobe ensures sufficient storage space.
We were committed to creating a comfortable and convenient atmosphere, without losing its rustic feel.
Although the cave house is ideal for two people, we have arranged a sofa bed for a third guest. Let us know in advance!
A nice little corner for your meals at home. Recharge after a tiring hiking day!
Parcheesi, chess, checkers, cards ... you will find board games in our cave house for fun times.

Would you cook a Canarian specialty? In the kitchen there is everything you need for that special dinner you both deserve.
Tell us in a comment how it went! ;-)
See the amazing view from the kitchen. Cooking with a view is sure an added value to your creativity!
The kitchen is equipped with a variety of small appliances, so that you feel at home.
Although not seen in the photo, we have installed a dispenser of gel and shampoo in the bathroom. That's handy!
Some other 'creature comforts' in the bathroom. Travel light! ;-)
The terrace is perfect to unwind in silence ... or to enjoy the fantastic local cuisine in good company.
We would love to welcome you to LIVING ARTENARA. Ask us any questions! We will respond to you in the shortest possible time!
Roque Bentayga, exceptional witness of your stay at LIVING ARTENARA. How was your visit? Don't forget to leave a comment!
In the cave house you will find a set of brochures of the 8 most recommended hiking routes in the area.
Laundry room available for stays longer than 4 days. We provide you with detergent and fabric softener for free.
For your safety, we limit interpersonal contact. You will find the keys to the cave house in a box at the entrance.
LIVING ARTENARA is just 200 metres from the town. It is sheltered from the north breeze due to its strategic location.
Cave House & Silence in LIVING ARTENARA. It is a very quiet area with hardly any cars. Ideal to disconnect.
South-facing strategic location: more hours of sunlight and sheltered from the northern air that blows in the area.
Located on a south-facing slope, the property receives direct sunlight almost all day.
Artenara Cave Houses Museum shows the characteristics of this type of ancestral Canarian dwelling. A must see!
Artenara stands out for its small town, cave houses, viewpoints, dams and routes. It's perfect to get around on foot! Photo by www.strohhut-pictures.com.
Tourists hotspots such as the town of Tejeda, the Pinar de Tamabada or Acusa Seca are nearby. A taxi? Ask us for it!
You will be amazed by the Church of San Matías, with its neo-Mudejar coffered ceiling and its wall paintings.
Plaza de San Matías is the highest urban square in Gran Canaria. The main festivities of Artenara are held here.
Taste Artenara's delicious food. Visit its restaurants or buy in any of its stores. And at night, you can go to Tejeda (about 15 minutes by car). There you will find a wide range of restaurants!
The low light pollution and its good accessibility make Artenara an ideal place for stargazing.
Wonderful photo of the Milky Way taken from the terrace of Cave House & Silence, courtesy of Danny Jüngling, owner of www.strohhut-pictures.com, and our guest!
The sea of clouds covers the valley, in a night view taken from the LIVING ARTENARA building. Photo by www.strohhut-pictures.com.
Artenara has a large number of viewpoints, most of them a few steps from the centre of town.
The rich cultural heritage of Artenara includes impressive walking routes through its territory. It is a natural paradise.
Balcony of Unamuno, built in homage to the visit that the popular writer made to the village back in 1910.
Beautiful panoramic view of the Barranco Grande. Another photo taken from the LIVING ARTENARA building and courtesy of Danny Jüngling, owner of www.strohhut-pictures.com.
Viewpoint overlooking the Parque Rural del Nublo, the largest Protected Natural Area on the island of Gran Canaria.
Impressive night view of the 'Heart of Jesus Monument', located at the top of La Cilla mountain, Artenara. Photo by www.strohhut-pictures.com.
Artenara is a place of exuberant nature and a calm environment. Soak up the atmosphere without limitations!
LIVING ARTENARA is surrounded by trails that reach hotspots such as the town of Tejeda or Acusa Seca archaeological sites.
Hiking, mountain running or cycling. If you prefer to return by car, we provide taxi service at a competitive price.
On clear days we see Mount Teide crowning the island of Tenerife. Photograph taken on the route to the Altavista Mountain.
Interpretation Centre of Risco Caído, a must to learn about the life and customs of the ancient inhabitants of Gran Canaria.

Soy una amante del senderismo y la tranquilidad y no encuentro mejor lugar. Estoy muy contenta de que Living Las Canteras gestione y cuide de nuestras casas desde Marzo 2021. Si las visitas, espero que las disfrutes tanto como yo.

recent.comments:
Beautiful location - couldn’t ask for a better place to stay & the view from the balcony is truly unbeatable. 

The apartment was very well equipped and had everything that we could need. The only downside was the hot water in the bathroom - boiling hot from the sink and the shower would sometimes turn freezing cold very quickly. 

Juan, the host, was very helpful, frequently in contact and was able to help with any issues. 
 
I can definitely recommend staying here!

AMAZING place to stay in Gran Canaria! If you like nature, incredible views, hiking, sunsets and star gazing don’t hesitate to book this place. We loved it - was our favourite spot in GC and the cave house was just lovely! Definitely recommend and hope to be back again 🙂
This is a realy beautiful and special place. Perfect for anyone who wants to chill or work in peace. The Apartment gas everything you need. And the view is fantastic!

Very scenic and great quiet place to stay even for a long time. We spend enjoyable weeks living in Nature and Silence apartments and would definitely return next time for calm and silent atmosphere. There are almost every kitchen utensils needed in the kitchen, average-size fridge, a good bathroom, great table to work at etc in room. There were some minor problems with access to the laundry room, but it totally compensated by the rest of the service. I also would like one more time say thanks to the Owner,  Juan, and the team for giving us a chance to experience that kind of service, and for helping us in this not easy times! I hope one day we shall return again!

Super verblijf voor de rustzoeker en de natuurliefhebber. Geweldige mooie uitzichten vanaf het balkon, hier zijn geen woorden voor. Heerlijk huisje, lekkere bedden en een fijne douche. Super goede communicatie met de eigenaar. Gewoon top.
Great, but not many restaurants around

A perfect base for exploring the island’s interior. 
Stunning views, great outdoor space, wonderful location, easy communication. 
Would strongly recommend.

description.summary:
★ Cosy CAVE HOUSE excavated in the rock following the legacy of the Canarian aborigines.

★ CANARIAN TRADITION: accommodation in a CAVE HOUSE prepared for your comfort and HIKING along the trails used by the aborigenes.

★ It includes an adjustable standing desk and a work chair, computer screen,  reading lamp and high speed FIBRE internet connection. Work without stress and recharge your batteries!

★ Discounts available from 1 (5%), 2 (15%), 4 (40%), 8 (45%) and 12 (50%) weeks of stay.
description.space:
★ Located on a south-facing hillside, the property receives direct sunlight almost all day and is sheltered from the northern air that blows in the area.

★ Our accommodation mantains a relatively constant internal temperature all year round. A modern mechanical VENTILATION and AIR DEHUMIDIFICATION system guarantees maximum comfort. In addition, we have included an electric heater, to help warm the room up on colder nights.

★ Open plan BEDROOM, LIVING ROOM and DINING ROOM layout. The whitewashed walls amplify the brightness of the room.

★ The LIVING area has a large and comfortable 3-seater sofa-bed, for a possible third guest.

★ Feel at home: 2 comfortable 90 x 200 cm mattresses, rustic but light decoration, warm lighting, board games for family fun...

★ In the BATHROOM we have placed body gel and shampoo dispensers for your convenience. 15 litre water heater (it is necessary to wait about 15 minutes between showers).

★ The KITCHEN is equipped with a ceramic hob, microwave, refrigerator, electric and Italian coffee makers, kettle ... as well as all the necessary utensils to cook comfortably.

★ The accommodation offers access to the LAUNDRY ROOM only for stays of more than 4 nights, every TUESDAY, from 08:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. and FRIDAY, from 4:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.

★ Have you seen its INCREDIBLE TERRACE? It is covered and completely OPEN TO THE OUTSIDE. It is the ideal place to read a good book... or to enjoy the fantastic local cuisine washed down with a good wine and in great company.

★ The VIEWS of Barranco Grande, Roque Nublo and Roque Bentayga are AWESOME.

★ The property is surrounded by incredible walking trails. Some of them give access to interesting touristic sites, such as the town of Tejeda, the Pinar de Tamadaba, or Acusa Seca archaeological sites.

★ ADULTS ONLY: The facilities at LIVING ARTENARA have been designed for REST, offering a TRANQUIL and RELAXING environment to our guests. Destining them to people over 18 years of age creates a serene and distraction-free atmosphere, which is ideal for travellers looking to either rest and disconnect from daily stress or work remotely in a noise-free environment surrounded by nature.
★ The accommodation is located next to the Cave Houses Ethnographic Museum and the Artenara Tourist Information Office. Very quiet area with hardly any cars. Easy to park.

★ Ideal for those who seek to disconnect from the routine and get closer to nature, for remote workers seeking a change of scenery, for outdoor sports enthusiasts, for those longing for silence.

★ It makes the PERFECT ADDITION to your sun-and-sand stay in Gran Canaria.

★ Important: Artenara is the municipality located at the highest altitude in Gran Canaria. The roads that reach the town are tortuous, so we advise against driving on them after the sunset.
description.access:
★ LIVING ARTENARA consists of 2 cave houses and 2 apartments, all located in the same building. Cave House & Silence is one of the two cave houses.

★ In STAYS longer than 5 DAYS, our guests have access to the LAUNDRY ROOM, which has a state-of-the-art washer and dryer, as well as detergent and fabric softener, all free of charge.
description.notes:
★ LIVING ARTENARA is LIVING LAS CANTERAS' new brand, which was created in March 2021 to manage these four exceptional properties in Artenara.

★ Experiencing nature, respecting and living in harmony with the environment is part of the DNA of every inhabitant of Artenara. Those are the principles that sustain the vision of LIVING ARTENARA.

★ Artenara is not a nightlife destination. Restaurants are closed for dinner from Sunday to Thursday  most of the year. Buy local products in the supermarkets of the village! Several of them remain open 7 days a week; They are well stocked and offer very competitive prices! In addition, our accommodations have a perfectly EQUIPPED KITCHEN to cook comfortably. In any case, near Artenara you will find Tejeda (about 15 minutes by car), where you will find a wide range of restaurants, for lunch or dinner.

★ There is a UNESCO WORLD HERITAGE site in Artenara: Risco Caido and the Sacred Mountains of Gran Canaria Cultural Landscape. It is the perfect place to learn about the spiritual beliefs of the first inhabitants of Gran Canaria. The visit to its Interpretation Centre, in the village, is highly recommended.

★ NO RESERVATIONS FROM INTERMEDIARIES
To reserve any of our accommodations, it is an essential requirement that the NAME and CONTACT DETAILS in the reservation are those of one of the guests.

★ VISIT OUR SOCIAL MEDIA PAGES
We inform you of the latest news, offers, new releases and the experiences that our guests share with us during their stay in the accommodations.

★ Combine your holidays in Artenara with a few days in Las Canteras, one of the best urban beaches in the world! Our brand LIVING LAS CANTERAS offers you a set of very nice and comfortable accommodations, ideal for relaxation. Check availability on the LIVING LAS CANTERAS website.

If you are staying at LIVING LAS CANTERAS and right after that you want to spend a few days with us at LIVING ARTENARA, we will give you a 10% discount for your stay in Artenara! Send us an email and we will generate the promotional code for you.
description.neighborhood:
★ Artenara is about 57 kms by road from Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. It is the island's head of municipality located at the HIGHEST ALTITUDE, as well as Gran Canaria's LEAST POPULATED municipality.

★ Artenara means 'place hidden among rocks' in the Aboriginal language. It is a privileged viewpoint of the 2 most impressive geological elements of Gran Canaria: Roque Nublo and Roque Bentayga.

★ It is a sought-after destination for those who go hiking, trail running, or biking. The town is surrounded by PERFECTLY MARKED walking trails.

★ The municipality is one of the greatest exponents of the CAVE HOUSES tradition in Gran Canaria. Their use dates back to the first aborigines and was common until the middle of the last century. We recommend you visit the Artenara Cave Houses Ethnographic Museum, right next to LIVING ARTENARA.

★ In Artenara, the temperature generally ranges from 9°C to 21°C and rarely drops below 7°C or rises above 23°C thoughout the year. Bring something WARM to wear in the evenings!

★ Artenara is part of Gran Canaria BIOSPHERE RESERVE. It is a recognition of the effort and work of its inhabitants in demonstrating their respect and good work for generations in areas such as gastronomy, crafts, archeology, etc.
description.transit:
★ Artenara is a small village, everything is close at hand. Forget about cars! It is the ideal place to get around on foot.

★ Several beautiful villages are accessible by hiking trails. But if you prefer to do part or all of the journey by car, LIVING ARTENARA offers you a taxi service at a competitive price. We will send you detailed information as soon as you confirm your reservation.
description.interaction: ★ LIVING ARTENARA set all standards in order to limit unnecessary human contact. Thanks to the self-check-in process, you won´t need to meet us upon arrival. But still, we will be of course available 24/7 during your stay.
description.house_rules:
The accommodation has been decorated, furnished and cleaned so that you can enjoy it to its fullest potential. We ask you to treat it with love and dedication so that its future guests can enjoy it in the same way. Thank you!

- When you arrive at the property, it is MANDATORY that you do the CHECK IN ONLINE, as in any tourist accommodation in Spain. We will give you the precise instructions by email 1 day before your arrival.
- At LIVING ARTENARA we attach great importance to the good coexistence of our guests with the other NEIGHBOURS of the building. We appreciate that you are kind and respectful to them.
- The MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY at all times is 3 people.
- SMOKING is strictly FORBIDDEN in the entire property.
- LIVING ARTENARA does not provide the service of changing dirty sheets and towels in the accommodations. However, in all of them you will find a spare set of sheets + a spare set of towels per guest. The building has a washing machine, the use of which is restricted for stays of 5 days or more.
- PARTIES AND NOISES that may disturb neighbours are prohibited from 10pm to 8am.
- PETS are not allowed.

name: Naum | Secluded Villa with Pvt Cenote | 12 Guests
title: Tulum, Mexico

gallery.caption: Welcome to our cozy living room overlooking the jungle
Wander into the hidden gem of the property, the cenote, a world on its own
Surreal celebrations and rituals in the on site cave
In the middle of the jungle
Restore balance with a private yoga class
Breathwork and ice baths to calm and regulate the nervous system
Second floor mezzanine area, for lazy hammock naps and a gentle jungle breeze
Second floor mezzanine surrounded by jungle green. Climb the wooden stairs to get all the way to the top
Third floor, rooftop deck for sunrises, sunsets and stargazing
Third floor, rooftop deck for sunrises, sunsets and stargazing
King room. There are two of these rooms (exact copies), each with its own private ensuite bathroom.
King room shower overlooking the jungle
The 3 bedrooms (2 Kings, 1 Shared room) are located on the first floor
The Jungle Cabin is just a short 30 meter walk from the main villa
Temazcal: a powerful prehispanic steam bath ritual. In essence, the ceremony symbolizes death and rebirth wherein the temazcal itself represents the womb of the mother
Stony stairs descend into the two cenote areas, first the open part with ample space for swimming, and then the cave part, with a wooden deck for gathering, rituals and celebrations.
Refreshing dips in the blue cenote waters
The two cenote areas are connected with a small river. You can either swim or walk between the two.

hosts.about:
Hi fellow traveler,

My name is Margaux. I am a Dutchie living in Tulum. 
I have a passion for traveling, people, nature, music and wellbeing. 

It was a dream come true when we built our beautiful place in the jungle of Tulum. 
By mainly using local products, doing everything in our power to take care of nature and work with the most passionate people we created a special place. 


We are looking forward to share this magical place with you.

recent.comments: We hebben met een groep meiden onwijs genoten bij Margaux in Naum. We zijn enorm in de watten gelegd met lekker eten en een lichaamsmassage. Op het dakterras heb je prachtig uitzicht en in de cenote kijk je ook je ogen uit. Vergeet niet een duik te nemen ;) Verder was het huis superschoon en is Margaux mega vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Al met al: een enorme aanrader en beleving en toevoegang aan je reis door Mexico!

items.comments: We hebben met een groep meiden onwijs genoten bij Margaux in Naum. We zijn enorm in de watten gelegd met lekker eten en een lichaamsmassage. Op het dakterras heb je prachtig uitzicht en in de cenote kijk je ook je ogen uit. Vergeet niet een duik te nemen ;) Verder was het huis superschoon en is Margaux mega vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Al met al: een enorme aanrader en beleving en toevoegang aan je reis door Mexico!

Absolutely beyond expectations!

This jungle abode feels more like a full service boutique hotel than an Airbnb. The whole entire trip was incredibly well managed by the host Margaux to make sure we were able to fully enjoy, rather than maintain a rental property.

The food was spectacular, the staff incredibly friendly and the space was beyond.

The cenote is one of the main attractors to this property, and I didn’t realize how much attention to detail the host placed into it. It was candle lit throughout our trip, with places to lounge and just take in the beauty of calmness of it.

Will be one of the memorable trips in the books. A total gem in the jungle of Tulum.

Margaux was an absolute dream host! I was planning a bachelorette wellness retreat and her place ticked every box. To be able to coordinate 9 different girl's itinerary and flight details was challenging but with Margaux it was an absolute delight. She was SO organized and her entire staff was perfection. They cleaned our rooms, very kind and so professional.  Her personal chef's meals were immaculate and so creative! Incredible food, activities and more! Margaux has thought of everything and it was was such a gem to even find this place. It was hard to be stressed with such a well run team. We made memories for a lifetime and wish we could go back already. More than an Airbnb it was truly a unique experience. 100% would go again a thousand times over and I think all the girls who came would also agree!

The pictures don’t do this beautiful jungle retreat justice! The property is gorgeous, the cenote is magical, the private chef (!) is a gem… we went to celebrate a birthday expecting to go out and about in Tulum and had such a good time we never left the property.

By far the most unique and extraordinary Airbnb experience I’ve ever booked. The cenote is tranquil and visually stunning behind words—as close to a spiritual experience as Tulum has to offer. The photos, while beautiful, simply don’t do it justice. 

Equally impressive are the accommodations themselves. The unique, modern design is perfectly compatible with jungle lounging—whether that’s sipping on mezcal by one of the fire pits, watching  monkeys performing acrobatics in the jungle canopy, or enjoying a locally-inspired meal by the private chef. 

My only hesitancy in providing an honest assessment of my time at Nuam is that the secret will get out, and it’ll be more difficult and expensive to book in the future 😉

Last but certainly not least, Margaux was everything one could want in a host—kind, laidback, hospitable, flexible, and accommodating. She went out of her way to taxi our group from Tulum to Nuam, not once but twice and then back again. Her sister-in-law, May and Chef Oscar were also terrific. 

May anyone reading this be fortunate enough to enjoy this majestic little sliver of paradise for a few days!
Margaux was amazing the place was spectaculars the private Cenote was amazing. They served us breakfast every morning. Lit candles for the Cenote. The villa was beautiful.

We had such an amazing time at Naum.
Being in the jungle with a group of friends on this beautiful property was a very special experience.
The cenote was out of this world, we enjoyed relaxing, swimming and especially the sound healing experience in the cave.
Margaux was really thoughtful and reacted immediately when we had a question. The breakfast was perfect, everything was fresh and healthy.
I would definitely recommend this accommodation to anyone looking for a special place.
Thank you again Margaux. You have an amazing place and it was a true pleasure staying there.

description.summary:
Welcome to our secluded off-grid luxury villa in the jungle of Tulum.

An intimate and adventurous setting immersed by natural surroundings.

Wake up to the sounds of the jungle. Enjoy yoga on the deck or relax and wander the jungle paths until you find the hidden gem on the property. Enjoy an acoustic concert in one of the most magical cenotes in Tulum. After a refreshing dip in the crystal clear blue waters, watch the sunset on the rooftop and gather around the fire pit for a cosy night.
description.space:
There is high speed WIFI (starlink) in the villa.

𝐀𝐝𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲

description.notes:
The place is located in the middle of one of the most beautiful parts of the Tulum jungle.  

The road can be a bit bumpy, you will meet some jungle insects and a monkey if you are lucky.

It is all part of the great adventure you are up for.

(For those who like to stay connected, the villa has high speed (Starlink) wifi.)
description.neighborhood:
The property is located in the jungle 8 km's from the centre of Tulum. 

The property is secluded and there are no shops or convenience stores on site or within walking distance. So don't forget to stock up on your favorite snacks/drinks at one of the big supermarkets in town before your arrival. 

Reminder: breakfast is included. 
Lunch and dinner can be pre booked.
description.transit:
It's best to have a car or motor to get around, as the Villa is located in the Jungle. There is a designated road,  just be aware that it is a jungle road that might be a bit bumpy.

The property offers free parking.

In addition we can arrange transportation from Tulum Center to the villa. Contact us for more info on transport.

gallery.caption: Accommodation with incredible views of Roque Bentayga and Roque Nublo. Very bright and equipped for a memorable stay.
Roque Bentayga, exceptional witness of your stay at LIVING ARTENARA. How was your visit? Do not forget to leave a comment! ;-)
South-facing strategic location: more hours of sunlight and sheltered from the northern air that blows in the area.
Sit back. Pay attention to your senses. Don't you see? Just peace. Glass of wine and reading in front of the Roque Nublo.
We have placed a height-adjustable standing desk, so you can alternate your body posture between standing and sitting.
LIVING ARTENARA, top quality accommodation. Your rest is our pride!
Are you working remotely and looking for a change of scenery? High speed FIBER internet connection in our apartments and cave houses.
Artenara is a paradise for hiking, mountain running and/or cycling lovers. It is nature at its purest.
Standing up relieves your back. If you alternate it with sitting work, you increase your productivity.
Focus on your rest. If you want, we can clean the accommodation during your stay. For further information, contact us!
Have you seen the NATURAL STONE on which the accommodation sits? A comfortable three-seater sofa presides over the living area.
Our accommodation mantains a relatively constant internal temperature all year round!
The accommodation is equipped with work desk and chair, computer screen and reading lamp. Ideal for remote workers.
Parcheesi, chess, checkers, cards ... you will find board games in our apartment for fun times.
Would you cook a Canarian specialty? In the kitchen there is everything you need for that special dinner you both deserve. Tell us in a comment how it went!
The kitchen is equipped with a variety of small appliances, so that you feel at home.
Although not seen in the photo, we have installed a dispenser of gel and shampoo in the bathroom. That's handy!
Some other 'creature comforts' in the bathroom. Travel light! ;-)
A little corner to witness wonderful sunsets with Roque Nublo and Roque Bentayga in the leading roles.
In the apartment you will find a set of brochures of the 8 most recommended hiking routes in the area.
View of the Caldera de Tejeda from the apartment, with Roque Bentayga, in the foreground, and Roque Nublo, in the background.
Laundry room available for stays longer than 4 days. We provide you with detergent and fabric softener for free.
For your safety, we limit interpersonal contact. You will find the keys to the apartment in a box at the entrance.
LIVING ARTENARA is just 200 metres from the town. It is sheltered from the north breeze due to its strategic location.
Nature Apartment in LIVING ARTENARA. It is a very quiet area with hardly any cars. Ideal to disconnect.
Located on a south-facing slope, the property receives direct sunlight almost all day.
Artenara stands out for its small town, cave houses, viewpoints, dams and routes. It's perfect to get around on foot! Photo taken by Danny Jüngling, owner of www.strohhut-pictures.com, and our guest!
Tourists hotspots such as the town of Tejeda, the Pinar de Tamabada or Acusa Seca are nearby. A taxi? Ask us for it!
You will be amazed by the Church of San Matías, with its neo-Mudejar coffered ceiling and its wall paintings.
Artenara Cave Houses Museum shows the characteristics of this type of ancestral Canarian dwelling. A must see!
Plaza de San Matías is the highest urban square in Gran Canaria. The main festivities of Artenara are held here.
Taste Artenara's delicious food. Visit its restaurants or buy in any of its stores. And at night, you can go to Tejeda (about 15 minutes by car). There you will find a wide range of restaurants!
Viewpoint overlooking the Parque Rural del Nublo, the largest Protected Natural Area on the island of Gran Canaria.
The low light pollution and its good accessibility make Artenara an ideal place for stargazing.
Wonderful photo of the Milky Way taken from LIVING ARTENARA. Another picture courtesy of www.strohhut-pictures.com.
The sea of clouds covers the valley, in a night view taken from the LIVING ARTENARA building. Photo by www.strohhut-pictures.com.
The rich cultural heritage of Artenara includes impressive walking routes through its territory. It is a natural paradise.
Beautiful panoramic view of the Barranco Grande. Another photo taken from the LIVING ARTENARA building and courtesy of Danny Jüngling, owner of www.strohhut-pictures.com.
Balcony of Unamuno, built in homage to the visit that the popular writer made to the village back in 1910.
Impressive night view of the 'Heart of Jesus Monument', located at the top of La Cilla mountain, Artenara. Photo by www.strohhut-pictures.com.
Artenara has a large number of viewpoints, most of them a few steps from the centre of town.
Artenara is a place of exuberant nature and a calm environment. Soak up the atmosphere without limitations!
LIVING ARTENARA is surrounded by trails that reach hotspots such as the town of Tejeda or Acusa Seca archaeological sites.
Hiking, mountain running or cycling. If you prefer to return by car, we provide taxi service at a competitive price.
On clear days we see Mount Teide crowning the island of Tenerife. Photograph taken on the route to the Altavista Mountain.
Interpretation Centre of Risco Caído, a must to learn about the life and customs of the ancient inhabitants of Gran Canaria.

hosts.about:
Muchas gracias por tu interés. Soy Juan Betancor, la persona detrás de LIVING LAS CANTERAS HOMES desde 2010. 
En el siguiente link puedes ver todos nuestros alojamientos y valoraciones en Airbnb: www.airbnb.es/p/livinglascanteras

Thank you very much for your interest. I am Juan Betancor, founder of LIVING LAS CANTERAS HOMES in 2010. 
In the following link you can see our accommodations and reviews on Airbnb: www.airbnb.co.uk/p/livinglascanteras

Me siento afortunada de haber nacido y crecido junto a mi familia en estas casas cueva de Artenara. Hace mucho años que vivimos en Lanzarote, pero regresamos cada vez que podemos. Soy una amante del senderismo y la tranquilidad y no encuentro mejor lugar. Estoy muy contenta de que Living Las Canteras gestione y cuide de nuestras casas desde Marzo 2021. Si las visitas, espero que las disfrutes tanto como yo.

recent.comments: The apartment is ideal for living) there is absolutely everything you need. very clean and very nice)

items.comments: The apartment is ideal for living) there is absolutely everything you need. very clean and very nice)

Amazing spot with perfect views for Barranco de Tejeda. Peaceful surroundings even there is a construction in front of the house (the Casas Cuevas museum is improving their spot, it will finish before this summer). Totally recommend to stay here and enjoy the nature and the local vibe.
Juan and his team has curated an amazing spot in the mountains and the attention to detail, service and communication is perfect. You will enjoy so much your stay, totally recommend it!
A great place to stay for a quiet retreat. Superb if into running/hiking. Nice local restaurants and away from tonnes of tourists
Alles super! Netter Kontakt, unkompliziert und ein schöner Ort um einige Tage zu verbringen!

I stayed at this awesome rustic cave house by Juan for a week, located in Artenara, which is the highest village in Gran Canaria. The views were absolutely gorgeous, especially the sunset view. Just wow! 

The place was perfect for remote working with an adjustable standing desk, and high-speed internet. There are a couple of high-rated restaurants around, such as Bar Restaurante La Majada and Biocrepería RiscoCaido (require booking!)

The property is surrounded by walking trails, which was perfect for hiking. Highly recommend it if you're looking to disconnect (from urban areas) and get closer to nature!
Belle vue depuis la coursive. Calme malgré les routes proches

Property was in a stunning location and despite our spending a week hiking in the region, there few views throughout the hikes that were better than the view from the balcony. We visited during a cold February, so the area was very quiet and parking was easy. On the downside, some restaurants were not fully open and it did get cold at night, though adequate heaters were provided in the apartment. The apartment was adequately equipped for basic self catering. Because of the time of year, we did not spend long on the balcony. However, it is quite narrow (about 80cm) and also serves as the walkway to serve the adjacent apartment, so probably would have felt a bit cramped if spending time outside in warmer months. That said, the view was amazing...

description.summary:
★ Cosy RUSTIC STYLE accommodation with panoramic views of Barranco Grande, Roque Bentayga and Roque Nublo.

★ ENJOY some time in the middle of NATURE. An unbeatable network of walking trails & routes awaits you.

★ The accommodation has an adjustable standing desk and a work chair, computer screen,  reading lamp and high speed FIBRE internet connection. Work without stress and recharge your batteries!

★ Discounts available from 1 (5%), 2 (15%), 4 (40%), 8 (45%) and 12 (50%) weeks of stay.
description.space:
★ Located on a south-facing hillside, the property receives direct sunlight most of the day and is sheltered from the northern breeze that blows in the area.

★ Our accommodation mantains a relatively constant internal temperature all year round. In addition, we have included a state-of-the-art DEHUMIDIFIER as well as an electric heater, to help warm the space up on colder nights.

★ VERY BRIGHT accommodation, open to the outside and EQUIPPED to the smallest detail.

★ BEDROOM-LIVING ROOM combo with two 90 x 190 cm SINGLE BEDS and a comfortable 3-seater sofa. 

★ The KITCHEN is equipped with an induction hob, microwave, refrigerator, electric and Italian coffee makers, kettle ... as well as all the necessary utensils for you to cook comfortably.

★ In the BATHROOM you will find shower gel and shampoo dispensers.

★ The accommodation offers access to the LAUNDRY ROOM only for stays of more than 4 nights, every TUESDAY and SATURDAY, from 4:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.

★ This accommodation is accessed through an open roofed corridor, which has a privileged view of the two most emblematic volcanic formations of Gran Canaria: Roque Nublo and Roque Bentayga. Enjoy them with a good wine in hand, sitting at the table of the wonderful set of outdoor furniture. This corridor is also used by guests accessing two other accommodations: “Earth | Remote Working | Hiking” and “Cave House & Silence| Remote Working | Hiking”.

★ ADULTS ONLY: The facilities at LIVING ARTENARA have been designed for REST, offering a TRANQUIL and RELAXING environment to our guests. Destining them to people over 18 years of age creates a serene and distraction-free atmosphere, which is ideal for travellers looking to either rest and disconnect from daily stress or work remotely in a noise-free environment surrounded by nature.

★ The property is surrounded by incredible walking trails. Some of them give access to interesting touristic sites, such as the town of Tejeda, the Pinar de Tamadaba, or Acusa Seca archaeological sites.

★ The accommodation is located next to the Cave Houses Ethnographic Museum and the Artenara Tourist Information Office. Very quiet area with hardly any cars. Easy to park.

★ Ideal for those who seek to disconnect from the routine and get closer to nature, for remote workers seeking a change of scenery, for outdoor sports enthusiasts, for those longing for silence.

★ It makes the PERFECT ADDITION to your sun-and-sand stay in Gran Canaria.

★ Important: Artenara is the municipality located at the highest altitude in Gran Canaria. The roads that reach the town are tortuous, so we advise against driving on them after the sunset.
description.access:
★ LIVING ARTENARA consists of 2 cave houses and 2 apartments, all located in the same building. Nature is one of the two apartments.

★ In STAYS longer than 5 DAYS, our guests have access to the LAUNDRY ROOM, which has a state-of-the-art washer and dryer, as well as detergent and fabric softener, all free of charge.
description.notes:
★ LIVING ARTENARA is LIVING LAS CANTERAS' new brand, which was created in March 2021 to manage these four exceptional properties in Artenara.

★ Experiencing nature, respecting and living in harmony with the environment is part of the DNA of every inhabitant of Artenara. Those are the principles that sustain the vision of LIVING ARTENARA.

★ Artenara is not a nightlife destination. Restaurants are closed for dinner from Sunday to Thursday  most of the year. Buy local products in the supermarkets of the village! Several of them remain open 7 days a week; They are well stocked and offer very competitive prices! In addition, our accommodations have a perfectly EQUIPPED KITCHEN to cook comfortably. In any case, near Artenara you will find Tejeda (about 15 minutes by car), where you will find a wide range of restaurants, for lunch or dinner.

★ There is a UNESCO WORLD HERITAGE site in Artenara: Risco Caido and the Sacred Mountains of Gran Canaria Cultural Landscape. It is the perfect place to learn about the spiritual beliefs of the first inhabitants of Gran Canaria. The visit to its Interpretation Centre, in the village, is highly recommended.

★ NO RESERVATIONS FROM INTERMEDIARIES
To reserve any of our accommodations, it is an essential requirement that the NAME and CONTACT DETAILS in the reservation are those of one of the guests.

★ VISIT OUR SOCIAL MEDIA PAGES
We inform you of the latest news, offers, new releases and the experiences that our guests share with us during their stay in the accommodations.

★ Combine your holidays in Artenara with a few days in Las Canteras, one of the best urban beaches in the world! Our brand LIVING LAS CANTERAS offers you a set of very nice and comfortable accommodations, ideal for relaxation. Check availability on the LIVING LAS CANTERAS website.

If you are staying at LIVING LAS CANTERAS and right after that you want to spend a few days with us at LIVING ARTENARA, we will give you a 10% discount for your stay in Artenara! Send us an email and we will generate the promotional code for you.
description.neighborhood:
★ Artenara is about 57 kms by road from Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. It is the island's head of municipality located at the HIGHEST ALTITUDE, as well as Gran Canaria's LEAST POPULATED municipality.

★ Artenara means 'place hidden among rocks' in the Aboriginal language. It is a privileged viewpoint of the 2 most impressive geological elements of Gran Canaria: Roque Nublo and Roque Bentayga.

★ It is a sought-after destination for those who go hiking, trail running, or biking. The town is surrounded by PERFECTLY MARKED walking trails.

★ The municipality is one of the greatest exponents of the CAVE HOUSES tradition in Gran Canaria. Their use dates back to the first aborigines and was common until the middle of the last century. We recommend you visit the Artenara Cave Houses Ethnographic Museum, right next to LIVING ARTENARA.

★ In Artenara, the temperature generally ranges from 9°C to 21°C and rarely drops below 7°C or rises above 23°C throughout the year. Bring something WARM to wear in the evenings!

★ Artenara is part of Gran Canaria BIOSPHERE RESERVE. It is a recognition of the effort and work of its inhabitants in demonstrating their respect and good work for generations in areas such as gastronomy, crafts, archeology, etc.
description.transit:
★ Artenara is a small village, everything is close at hand. Forget about cars! It is the ideal place to get around on foot.

★ Several beautiful villages are accessible by hiking trails. But if you prefer to do part or all of the journey by car, LIVING ARTENARA offers you a taxi service at a competitive price. We will send you detailed information as soon as you confirm your reservation.
description.interaction: ★ LIVING ARTENARA set all standards in order to limit unnecessary human contact. Thanks to the self-check-in process, you won´t need to meet us upon arrival. But still, we will be of course available 24/7 during your stay.
description.house_rules:
The accommodation has been decorated, furnished and cleaned so that you can enjoy it to its fullest potential. We ask you to treat it with love and dedication so that its future guests can enjoy it in the same way. Thank you!

- When you arrive at the property, it is MANDATORY that you do the CHECK IN ONLINE, as in any tourist accommodation in Spain. We will give you the precise instructions by email 1 day before your arrival.
- At LIVING ARTENARA we attach great importance to the good coexistence of our guests with the other NEIGHBOURS of the building. We appreciate that you are kind and respectful to them.
- The MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY at all times is 2 people.
- SMOKING is strictly FORBIDDEN in the entire property.
- LIVING ARTENARA does not provide the service of changing dirty sheets and towels in the accommodations. However, in all of them you will find a spare set of sheets + a spare set of towels per guest. The building has a washing machine, the use of which is restricted for stays of 5 days or more.
- PARTIES AND NOISES that may disturb neighbours are prohibited from 10pm to 8am.
- PETS are not allowed.

gallery.caption: La parte más especial de la casa, un pasillo-cueva que conecta el salón con la cocina. Sin duda, el gran atractivo de la casa.
La piscina está cubierta y no es climatizada.
Nuestras ocas, son preciosas, les encanta estar mojándose en  una pequeña charca que tenemos. Además, son muy territoriales.
Nuestros pavos reales, son preciosos cuando abren sus grandes plumas para atraer a las pavas hembras.
Nuestra poni, se llama Carmelo, es muy simpático y sociable!
Una de nuestras cerdas, fue criada a biberón por nosotros, se llama Carolina, es muy mona, se pasa el día comiendo y durmiendo!
Una de nuestras mascotas de nuestra casa, ella va cada día a la finca con mis abuelos. Se llama Gemma y es un poco rabiosa.
Una de nuestras mascotas de nuestra casa, se llama Tula, tiene 15 años y es una perrita adorable, es muy buena y amistosa.
Este es nuestro jardín, con palmeras canarias, hamacas y juguetes para los más pequeños/as.
En el jardín exterior de la finca, tenemos un gran atractivo para los más pequeños y son los juguetes. En el jardín hay una casita grande y diferentes juguetes para los niños/as.
Este es otro patio exterior que tenemos en la propiedad y la casa del fondo es esta casa que estamos anunciando.
Estas son las vistas que dan al barranco de la propiedad, donde tenemos un cultivo extenso de papas y viñedos. También tenemos naranjos, aguacateros, guayaberos, higuera, mangas, pinos canarios ...
Tenemos nuestra propia de cosecha de papas.
Nuestras papas cosechadas en la finca.
